prompt:
Topic:
"The average standard of people’s health is likely to be lower in the future than it is now. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?"
Essay:
"It is argued that the people's health is more and more lower than in the future compared with people's health nowadays. l totally agree with this statement.
On the one hand, people nowadays are very busy with their work and family. Firstly, they sometime feel stress with their work but they can not live that they don't work. Most people work hard even overtime in order to earn money. So, they don't have much time to exercise such as play sports, do yoga or go to the gym. Secondly, a lot of family use the fast food and street food for their life. Although it's very convenient but fast food or street food are not good for health. 
On the other hand, the environment is much worse day by day. The first reason is that the forest on the world continued fell in a few year ago and it will be continue decline in the next year later. If trees is chopped, the CO2 will be increase. Also, a lot of factory were built in order to serve people life but if the water waste and the garbage were not handled, it will be a source that will pollute the environment. That's why the average standard of people's will be lower. The second reason is that the vehicle of the world also increased on the world, especially in the big city.
In conclusion, although people in the word interested their health but a lot of factors will be decrease the average standard of people's health."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, bạn còn một vài lỗi về từ vựng, gây khó hiểu cho người đọc. Dưới đây là một số lỗi mà tôi nhận thấy:

- "l totally agree" nên sửa thành "I totally agree".
- "Sometime feel stress" nên đổi thành "Sometimes feel stressed".
- "Use the fast food and street food" nên đổi thành "rely on fast food and street food".
- "Although it's very convenient but" nên xóa bỏ từ "but" và sửa thành "Although it is very convenient, fast food and street food are not good for health".
- "The forest on the world continued fell" nên đổi thành "Deforestation continues to occur worldwide".
- "If trees is chopped" nên đổi thành "If trees are chopped down".
- "a lot of factory were built" nên sửa thành "a lot of factories have been built".
- "it will be a source that will pollute the environment" nên sửa thành "it will become a source of pollution for the environment".
- "The second reason is that the vehicle of the world also increased on the world" nên sửa thành "Secondly, the number of vehicles worldwide has also increased".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"More developing countries are being given aid by international organisations to help them in their development plan. Some people argue that financial aid is important but others suggest that practical aid and advice are more important. Discuss both view and give your opinion."
Essay:
"Multinational cooperations give development aid to many second-world countries with the aim of promoting their improvement plans. Although supplying monetary assistance can uplift countries' economic situation and it is able to induce to decline unemployment rate I believe that practical support and receiving advice on sustainable development may assist them to find out better solution for their problems and those states may show efficient performance in every sector.
On the one hand, ensuring development assistance to those nations that are on the way of progress would assist them to use the money to formulate such policies that can be beneficial in terms of economic growth and decreasing unemployment problem to a certain extend. In order to eliminate economic barriers which can bring about weakening developing countries' improvement those states may spend foreign aid on underdeveloped sectors on the purpose of providing to generate more income that underpin sustainable development through rising of countries' total earnings. Along with, recovering economic situation may create condition for small enterprenuers to take loans with the intention of establishing a succesful business which leads to decreament in unemployment rate. As a result, developing countries may spur their economic growth through overseas aid. For examlpe, In Egypt vast majority of small business owners set up a business by the help of international aid. However, I believe that this is not effective method because these states increase their dependence on international entites and they would not try to work on their development.
On the other hand, advising those states on how to form policies and what techniques should be followed to carry out them efficiently can result in coming up with better solution and efficient performance in different sectors. If transnational organizations explain the method of successful development to those nations, they try to learn their problems and bring about novel way as they investigate states' matter in depth and take on responsibility for solving their challanges on their own, as well as eliciting of  immediate concerns and dealing with them in distinctive sector causes development in those sectors. As a consequence, without being depended on any organizations, progressing countries can solve their problems owing to searching fundamental problems in their economy. For instance, 50% of less developed countries are provided by advisory services of World Bank with the aim of performing better improvement. I believe this approach is better as it teaches them independence to grow.
In conclusion, although giving development aid to progressing countries by multinational entites can help them to use this money their development by providing training on making efficient policies might be more effective approach."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, bạn đã sử dụng từ vựng phù hợp với chủ đề và trình độ của bài viết. Bạn kết hợp sử dụng từ vựng thông thường và từ vựng cao cấp như "multinational cooperations," "sustainable development," "economic barriers," và "transnational organizations." Bạn cũng sử dụng các từ đồng nghĩa và diễn đạt lại nội dung một cách hiệu quả, chẳng hạn như "monetary assistance" và "financial aid." 

Tuy nhiên, có một số lỗi nhỏ về từ vựng và cách sử dụng từ. Ví dụ, trong câu "recovering economic situation," từ "recovering" không được sử dụng chính xác và nên được thay thế bằng từ "improving." Trong câu "eliciting of immediate concerns," từ "eliciting" phải được thay bằng từ "addressing" để tránh sự lặp lại của dạng động từ.

Một số lỗi khác như "induce to decline" nên là "help to reduce," và "less developed countries are provided by advisory services" nên là "advisory services are provided to less developed countries."
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Discuss the differences between the way of life in your country now and the way of life in the past"
Essay:
"During the last years, Colombia has undergone many positive changes in different aspects that make the city much better now than in the past. In this essay, I will discuss some of the transformation in my country now and the way of life in the past.

In the first place, the advance in the technological aspect. At present, people have access to a lot of technological infrastructures that helps and contributes in a positive way to the general development of the country. For example, communications between countries and cities are now done via the internet through different platforms such as Google, Instagram, etc. quickly and in real-time. 

Another big change in a positive way is the modern infrastructure developed. In the current time, Colombia has been growing in all the aspects relative to the modern construction,  making more access vias and generated more public entertainment places. For instance, now there are more places where people can go and have fun with their friends like theatres, casinos, shopping centres, etc.

The last but not the less important change is women participation in the labour market.  In the past, the women paper in the society was mostly taking care of her children and the home tasks but, actually women can go to the universities and can be professionals that are prepare for participating in different laboral places and they are  contributing to the economy in the country.

To conclude, Colombia is a better country now than in the past. The country has had to many changes in a very good way and its changes have favoured the development of the place in aspects as an economy, infrastructure, culture and others."

###
completion:
Chúng ta sẽ đánh giá chi tiết hơn về Lexical Resource trong bài viết của bạn:
- Bài viết của bạn sử dụng một số từ ngữ tốt để trình bày ý tưởng và suy nghĩ của mình. Ví dụ: technological infrastructure, communications, access vias, public entertainment places, labour market, etc.
- Tuy nhiên, trong quá trình viết, bạn còn sử dụng một số từ trùng lặp (repetition) và không đa dạng hóa ngữ pháp. Dưới đây là một số ví dụ cụ thể:
  + "technological infrastructures" và "technological aspect" - từ "technological" được sử dụng nhiều lần, có thể thay thế bằng những từ khác như "digital", "cyber", "virtual",...
  + "contributing" được sử dụng cho 2 ý khác nhau trong văn bản của bạn - nên dùng từ khác như "adding to", "enhancing", "improving",... để tránh việc lặp lại.
  + "women paper" - từ này không chính xác, đây có thể là một lỗi chính tả (nên là "women's role").
- Một số từ không được sử dụng đúng cách, ví dụ:
  + "at present" được dùng để thay thế cho "now" trong bài viết nhưng sẽ tốt hơn nếu bạn tận dụng các từ ngữ khác như "currently", "presently", "these days",... để tránh lặp lại.
  + "generating public entertainment places" - từ "generating" không được sử dụng đúng cách trong trường hợp này. Bạn có thể thay bằng "creating" để biểu thị ý nghĩa tốt hơn.
  
Tóm lại, bài viết của bạn có nhiều từ ngữ tốt khi trình bày những suy nghĩ và ý tưởng của mình, nhưng bạn cần cải thiện phần đa dạng của từ và tránh việc sử dụng từ trùng lặp. Hơn nữa, chú ý sử dụng các từ theo cách đúng để giúp cho bài viết của bạn trở nên trôi chảy hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"The government is responsible for protecting a nation's cultural identity. Thus, some people believe new buildings should be built in traditional styles. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this opinion?"
Essay:
"Culture is the core foundation of any country. Ancient buildings and monuments are strong symbols which indicate the richness of the culture. Hence, some believe that the new constructions should be alligned in a manner which preserve the true identity of the culture. In my view, I am partially agreed with the afforementioned statment and I will further illustrate my ideology in the next few paragraphs. 

The proposed practice is already inplace in several countires. The most popular example is Italy where the new constructions are throughly governed with several laws specially in the areas with the ancient values. The positive trend is most of the other countries are also adhereing to the same practice and government and law makers are in a process of imposing new rules. The preservation of cultural values would highly important to the countries which are relying largely on tourism income. 

In the contrary, the world is constantly enriching with new and effective engineering and architectural concepts. Thus new constructions could be planned to attain great level of effectiveness and space management. Moreover, it would be ideal to use the latest technologies and designs in new constructions rather than adhereing to old designs. The said notions is also very crucial aspect to be looked at considering the significance of space management to cater to the demands of the growing population. 

In conclusion, it is agreed that preserving the ancient values when constructing the new buildings are imparative. However, the said practice should be limited to the areas which has significant ancient values while in other cases to use the most updated technology and designs."

###
completion:
Trong bài luận của bạn, đã có sử dụng một số từ vựng chuyên môn như "richness of the culture", "preservation of cultural values", "ancient values", "space management" và "updated technology and designs", thể hiện được khả năng sử dụng từ vựng đúng và đa dạng.

Tuy nhiên, tôi nhận thấy một số lỗi về cách sử dụng từ vựng trong bài luận của bạn. Ví dụ, bạn đã sử dụng từ "alligned" trong câu này "the new constructions should be alligned in a manner which preserve the true identity of the culture" nhưng từ này thường được đánh vần là "aligned". Tuy nhiên, "aligned" thường được sử dụng để miêu tả việc sắp xếp đồng phẳng các vật liệu trong cùng một mặt phẳng, trong khi trong trường hợp này, bạn có thể sử dụng từ "built" để diễn đạt ý của mình. Ngoài ra, bạn cũng đã lặp lại từ "ancient values" quá nhiều lần trong bài luận của mình, có thể sử dụng thay thế bằng những từ khác như "cultural heritage", "historical significance" hoặc "architectural legacy".

Một số lỗi khác như "throughly" phải chuyển sang "thoroughly" và "implicative" nên được thay bằng "imperative" để diễn đạt ý tưởng của bạn một cách chính xác hơn
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people think that the teenage years are the happiest time of most people's lives. Others think that adult life brings more happiness, in spite of greater responsibility. Discuss both views and give your opinion"
Essay:
"Some say that youngsters can enjoy their life to the fullest, while others opine that adulthood is the most charming period, even
though some duties are to be fulfilled. This essay will argue that although grown-up people enjoy family support, I reckon that young age is the most happening time when teenagers can relish the
freedom.
On one hand, matured individuals have emotional support of their family, resultantly they can share their feelings and troubles with their spouse. Moreover, life partners also act as an helping hand in order
to provide financial support. It is often seen that the biggest enemy of an individual is its loneliness. Therefore, motivating partner and
mature offsprings complete a human being. To epitomize, a research conducted by Oxford University revealed that grown-up individuals who are not married often lead isolated lives. However, I ponder that
youth can have more pleasure owing to more liberty.
On the other hand, in teenage age children are not required to fulfil family commitments, consequently they can easily migrate from one place to another in search of better future. Juveniles are not worried
about undertaking family responsibility, as a result they fully enjoy their present life without considering future savings. Furthermore, guardians are always available in order to guide their immature child
and to eclipse their mistakes. To exemplify, a research conducted by colleges revealed that teenage age is the most delighted age due to less pressure.
To conclude, despite adults can have mental and economic support from their families, youngsters are more happy as they are free to live their life. thus it is lack of responsibility that make adolescent joyous."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, các từ vựng được sử dụng phù hợp với chủ đề và hoàn toàn đáp ứng yêu cầu của đề bài. Tuy nhiên, một số lỗi từ vựng và phương pháp sử dụng từ vựng vẫn còn tồn tại trong bài viết của bạn. 

Ví dụ, trong câu "juveniles are not worried about undertaking family responsibility", từ "juveniles" có thể dẫn đến sự khó hiểu, nên có thể sử dụng từ "teenagers" hoặc "adolescents" thay thế cho từ này. 

Có một số cụm từ hoặc thuật ngữ có thể dẫn đến hiểu lầm hoặc không phù hợp với chủ đề của bài viết. Ví dụ "most charming period" có thể thay bằng "most fulfilling period" để phù hợp hơn với ý kiến. Tương tự, trong câu "However, I ponder that youth can have more pleasure owing to more liberty", từ "pleasure" nên thay bằng từ "happiness" để phù hợp với ngữ nghĩa của câu. 

Một số lỗi khác như:

- "enjoy family support, resultantly" -> Cần sửa thành "enjoy the support of their family, so they can".
- "resultantly they can share their feelings and troubles with their spouse" -> Cần sửa lại thành "thus they can share their feelings and troubles with their spouse".
- "helping hand in order to provide financial support" -> Cần bỏ từ "in order" để câu có cấu trúc đúng.
- "it is lack of responsibility that make adolescent joyous" -> Cần sửa lại thành "it is the lack of responsibility that makes adolescents joyful".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Nowadays, experience is more valued in the workplace than knowledge in many countries.
Do you think the advantages of this outweigh the disadvantages?"
Essay:
"It is an irrefutable that In this era, The professionals have more benefit as compared to highly skilled person. In some nation, the companies would like to hire the experienced person, rather than other folks. In my opinion, it is unfair for the knowledgeable man got less preference whether they have innovative, and in this essay, I would shed light on both in details.

There are several reasons why some countries, competent have more benefits. The region,  like India, most of the Multi national plants provide the jobs to those who had at least 2 years experience and also pay the high salary. Sometimes, Novice person loss the opportunity because of less experience. Moreover, If they hire by someone, but definitely on low wages, either they have more skills and productive than experts. For an example, According to the survey, which is conducted by The Indian University found that economy level has been reduced in last year, because the work followed by experienced guys with traditional method.

On the contrary side, the country’s such as Canada followed by the different criteria. This country always gives a chance to recently graduated students to show their skills. Therefore, the economy level of this country always on the peak point. For an instance, In 2019, the Canada offers around 85000 permanent residency to the immigrants of other nationalities who have a more technical brain.

To put in a nutshell, I pen down and say that more expertise have lots of options, but the government should give opportunity to the youngster, so that they can improve the methods in a creative way."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, có một số lỗi sai và vấn đề với từ vựng được sử dụng. Dưới đây là một số lỗi cụ thể:

1. "It is an irrefutable that In this era": không cần thiết phải sử dụng "an" trước irrefutable và "in this era" không phù hợp với ý bạn muốn truyền tải. Câu này nên được viết lại thành "It is irrefutable that nowadays..."

2. "The professionals have more benefit as compared to highly skilled person": "benefit" là danh từ, trong khi bạn cần một tính từ ở đây. Câu này nên được viết lại thành "Professionals have more benefits compared to highly skilled individuals."

3. "In some nation": nên sử dụng "nations" thay vì "nation".

4. "Multi national plants": câu này không rõ ràng vì không nêu rõ rằng những người có kinh nghiệm làm việc ở những công ty của những công ty đa quốc gia.

5. "loss the opportunity": nên sử dụng "lose" thay vì "loss".

6. "high salary": nên sử dụng "higher salary" để so sánh với mức lương thấp hơn.

7. "productive than experts": từ này nên được sửa thành "more productive than experienced individuals."

8. "techcnical brain": từ này không phù hợp với ngữ cảnh. Nên sử dụng "technical skills" thay vì "technical brain".

9. "more expertise": từ này không phù hợp với ngữ cảnh. Nên sử dụng "those with more experience" hoặc "experienced individuals" thay vì "more expertise".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people say that the main environmental problem of our time is the loss of particular species of plants and animals. Others say that there are more important environmental problems.
Discuss both of these views and give your own opinion."
Essay:
"In this modern era, people are faced many surroundings trouble in day-to-day life. However, a fair amount of people believe that threat of flora and fauna extinction is the main issue of environmental problem but others say that there are more paramount atmosphere obstacles. Viewing from a general perspective, the essay discusses both viewpoints, I persnonally agree with rhe former opinion for the following reasons.

On the one hand, many species are eradicated can lead to causes of envionmental irrefutably such as break the food chain. For example, when pretatory animals  like Tigers and Lions are eliminating while increase the large amount of herbivores. This situation will affect the farm yield as animal like rabbit, pig, and deer as a result, these animals will eat up all farm produce consequendly, this trend can lead to food scarcity all around the world.

On the other hand, climate change is the fundamental threat of habitat headache such as pollution, green house gas effect and global tempreature are rising. Polar ice are melted heavly in nowadays a result, many coastal cities are submerged to the global. Moreover, climate change causes frequently occurances drought and flooding. Other resson of health diseases both human and animals. when highly polluted are the folks are being lived while they will get many diseases like Ashthma, cancer and many birds also affect such as no longer survive where polluted region.

To conclude, In my opinion about this  obviously, climate change is a bigger threat than the extinction of wildlife. If the twmpreature are rising to this pace the planet may become inhabitable two or three centuries down the lane."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, tổng thể thì bạn đã sử dụng một số từ vựng phù hợp và đa dạng để mô tả ý của mình. Tuy nhiên, còn một số sai sót trong việc sử dụng từ vựng, ví dụ như:

1. "surroundings trouble" - từ "trouble" ở đây không phải là tính từ mà phải là danh từ, nên từ chính xác phải là "environmental problems" hoặc "surrounding issues".

2. "flora and fauna extinction" - cách sử dụng của bạn không hoàn toàn chính xác, cách hợp lý hơn là "extinction of flora and fauna".

3. "break the food chain" - từ này hơi khó hiểu và không phù hợp, bạn có thể sử dụng "disrupt the food chain" hoặc "disturb the ecological balance" để thể hiện ý tưởng một cách chính xác hơn.

4. "eradicated" - từ này có nghĩa là "tiêu diệt triệt để", bạn có thể sử dụng từ "extinct" để thể hiện ý tưởng một cách chính xác hơn.

5. "farm yield" - từ này khá lạ lẫm, bạn có thể sử dụng từ "crop production" để thể hiện ý tưởng một cách chính xác hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Unhealthy food has negative effect on both individuals and on the society they live in.  Some people think that the government should tax the unhealthy food while others say that fat tax is unfair an unnecessary.  Discuss both views and give your opinion."
Essay:
"In the fast-moving world, people don't have enough time to spend on eating. The importance of cooking healthy foods is decreasing. Many people just want to fill their stomach rather than having healthy and sensible eating. In order to make it habitual, some people think to impose levy on these unhealthy foods, therefore the effect on individual as well as on the society can be controlled. This essay goes through the for and against of tax implementation. 

One group of people strongly stands to tariff fast foods like sandwiches, burgers, packed foods, canned drinks, etc. As it affects the health of the growing children, they came up with the one possible solution, like that of a similar measure had been taken on vanishing/reducing plastic usage in society. Eye problems, insomnia, obesity, lazy attitude are the problems mostly find within the children at their very early age, because of giving fast foods to them. Not only children but also the grown-ups, suffering from many health issues, like food and work imbalance, fertility problems for both women and men (surprisingly), overweight, digestion problems etc. I can depict this with a real case example. A child is very adamant and sticks to a branded noodle. He wants to have it almost daily. As a result, he got digestion problem which led him to a major kidney operation. So, if 'The fat tax' has been implemented, the price of these unhealthy foods’ increases, and in such a way that the consumption decreases. Followed by that the future society will be health-conscious and disease-free generation. 

On the other hand, another group of people oppose the implementation of the fat tax. These people are mostly the wholesalers, salesperson, mall owners, food and beverage producers, who are all money-minded, I can say. when the price of these products increases, their sales and profit decreases. They will face economic kind of problems. As a result, it may affect the prevailing economic situations. 

To conclude the discussion, I suggest my opinions here. Children are getting attracted towards the Ad campaigns which virtually gives a feast to them. And therefore, either the telecast timing should be rescheduled or that particular company have to pay some amount as telecast fee to the government on hourly basis. Youngsters can create awareness regarding this issue. The Food safety department should tighten rules still more."

###
completion:
Về mặt từ vựng, bài viết của bạn sử dụng các từ và cụm từ khá đa dạng và hợp lý để trình bày ý tưởng của mình. Nhiều từ được sử dụng phù hợp và tự nhiên, giúp tăng tính thuyết phục và sự hiểu rõ của nội dung. Ví dụ, bạn sử dụng từ "levy" để chỉ thuế đối với thực phẩm không lành mạnh và từ "disease-free" để mô tả một xã hội không bị bệnh.

Tuy nhiên, vẫn có một số lỗi liên quan đến từ vựng. Ví dụ, bạn viết "major kidney operation" thay vì "kidney transplant" hoặc "kidney surgery". Ngoài ra, từ "rescheduled" trong câu "either the telecast timing should be rescheduled" không phải là từ đúng để miêu tả việc thay đổi lịch phát sóng. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "adjusted" hoặc "changed" để thay thế.

Thêm vào đó, trong đoạn thứ hai, "food and work imbalance" không phải là một thuật ngữ phù hợp và không rõ ràng về ý nghĩa của nó trong ngữ cảnh của đoạn văn. Câu "I can depict this with a real case example" cũng không được sử dụng đúng cách và có thể thay thế bằng "For example" hoặc "To illustrate my point".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"An increasing number of people are buying what they need online. What are the advantages and disadvantages for both individuals and companies to shopping online?
Discuss both sides and give your opinion."
Essay:
"For the last couple of years, online shopping has become the favourite purchasing method of many customers, mostly because of the restraint order during the pandemic and its convenience. To give people multi-dimentional views about online shopping, this essay will provide some benefits and downsides that this method possesses and conclude with a personal opinion.

Purchasing products via social media can bring plenty of advantages to both customers and retailers. First of all, online shopping can reduce a considerable amount of time for individuals. For instance, if a person decides to use the traditional way of shopping, they will go to the store, look for  suitable products among the shelves, and purchase them, thus it will take them a lot of effort and time in order to find the goods that meet their expectation. This is entirely opposite to online shopping, which is extremely easy to buy any product. Secondly, especially for retailers, they can cut down many expenses through the social network. 

However, despite the benefits that this method brings, there are some disadvantages that people should be aware about. The quality of the products is not guaranteed to satisfied the customers. Moreover, the confidential protection is another factor that customers should consider before deciding to purchasing through the social network.

In conclusion, every method have their own exemplaries and inauspiciousnesses, but I personally believe that the online shopping market will continue to grow in the future."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, Lexical Resource được sử dụng với sự linh hoạt và đa dạng. Có sự sử dụng đúng các từ ngữ và thuật ngữ liên quan đến chủ đề "mua sắm trực tuyến". Tuy nhiên, vẫn còn một số lỗi nhỏ và cách diễn đạt có thể cải thiện, dưới đây là một số gợi ý để bạn cân nhắc:

1. "the number of people turning to online shopping" - Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "embracing" thay cho "turning to" để thể hiện sự chấp nhận và ủng hộ của người mua hàng đối với mua sắm trực tuyến.

2. "the convenience offered by online shopping" - Bạn có thể mở rộng mô tả bằng cách nói rõ cụ thể những tiện ích cụ thể của mua sắm trực tuyến, ví dụ như tiết kiệm thời gian, sự linh hoạt trong việc so sánh giá và lựa chọn sản phẩm.

3. "the recent social distancing protocols" - Có thể thay "protocols" bằng "measures" để tránh lặp lại từ ngữ.

4. "Online shopping has numerous benefits" - Để tránh lặp lại "has", bạn có thể sử dụng "offers" thay cho "has" để mô tả sự hưởng lợi.

5. "save individuals a significant amount of time" - Bạn có thể thêm "considerable" trước "amount of time" để làm nổi bật hơn sự tiết kiệm thời gian.

6. "search the shelves for the product" - Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "browse" (đọc qua nhanh) thay vì "search" để hợp ngữ cảnh hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Living in a country where you have to speak a foreign language can cause serious social problems as well as practical problems. 

To what extent do you agree or disagree?"
Essay:
"It is a common belief that people residing in foreign countries have lots of difficulties in both their social and practical life. However, I don’t agree with this opinion that thanks to the development of education and technology, individuals can easily get used to the living conditions in other nations.

To start with, social problems are not as serious as we all have thought. Foreigners always welcome people from other countries to come and live with them so that they can broaden their horizon about differences in cultures and lifestyles. Moreover, they are usually hospitable and cordial so it seems quite easy to have a talk and make friends with them. For example, when you come to Vietnam, people here are very enthusiastic, they are willing to answer any questions from you or even help you take a tour and understand more about their beautiful country. Additionally, unlike the past, humans nowadays have higher education and more experience, so that they have more awareness of language barriers, thus really appreciating foreigners’ effort to get acquainted with the life in their country. Particularly, some adversities for exchange students while studying in other countries were racism, misconception and discrimination, so they felt antipathy towards surrounding people and just wanted to segregate themselves from the community. But now, those problems have gradually disappeared and been replaced by the harmony with their foreign friends.

Besides, difficulties in practical activities have not been too severe to be nervous. Thanks to the development of technology, residents in foreign countries can do everything by themselves without too much help from others. For example, with technical devices, when they want to find the correct directions, all they need to do is to search the location on Google map and receive instructions in their own language just in seconds. Furthermore, there are thousands of useful apps to learn languages, so they can try and improve their understanding and speaking skills of the common language of the countries they are living in. They have available environments to practice and enhance their abilities, so with some effort and their phones accompanying them, they can gradually adapt to other countries’ culture and people’s attitudes there. Thanks to that, they have opportunities to enhance their capacities day by day to become the most satisfied and best version of themselves.

In conclusion, from my perspective, I think that living in a foreign country and having to speak its national language are not as severe as we used to think thanks to the help of state-of-the-art education and modern technology."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, có một số từ vựng và cách sử dụng từ có thể được cải thiện để tăng cường Lexical Resource. Dưới đây là danh sách các lỗi cụ thể và giải thích về những lỗi này:

1. "thanks to the development of education and technology" - Câu này có một cấu trúc từ 'thanks to' nhưng được sử dụng không phù hợp với văn phong IELTS. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng cụm từ "due to" hoặc "because of" để diễn tả ý của bạn một cách chính xác hơn.

2. "For example, when you come to Vietnam, people here are very enthusiastic, they are willing to answer any questions from you or even help you take a tour" - Câu này có thể sử dụng từ vựng tốt hơn để diễn đạt ý của bạn. Thay vì sử dụng "take a tour", bạn có thể sử dụng cụm từ "show you around" hoặc "give you a tour".

3. "some adversities for exchange students while studying in other countries were racism" - từ "adversities" không phù hợp trong trường hợp này. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "challenges" hoặc "difficulties" thay cho từ "adversities".

4. "they felt antipathy towards surrounding people and just wanted to segregate themselves from the community" - Từ "antipathy" không phù hợp ở đây. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "hostility" hoặc "animosity" để thể hiện ý của bạn một cách chính xác hơn.

5. "Thanks to that, they have opportunities to enhance their capacities day by day to become the most satisfied and best version of themselves" - Từ "capacities" sử dụng không phù hợp.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Lack of fresh water is becoming a global issue of increasing importance. What problems does this shortage cause? What measures could be taken to overcome these problems?"
Essay:
"It is thought by some people that there is an increasing depletion of fresh water across countries, and that it can raise many adversities. In my opinion, the health sector is particularly affected. To solve this issue, government and citizens must acknowledge this problem and its root cause, and act according to their responsibilities.

Firstly, the major area that is affected by this loss is the health of the communities. This is due to the fact that water is an essential need of all human beings, it is used for drinking to sustain bodily functions, and to take a bath or wash hands to clean us from microorganisms. If clean water is decreasing, basic functions like those are disturbed, and a reduction of sanitation and hygiene level happened. We know that those can lead to diseases, namely infectious diseases. For example, clean uncontaminated water is necessary for making formula milk for babies, without it, babies are prone to contracting ailments such as diarrhea and malnutrition.

The solution for this is to create a collective effort between the government and the people. The government must create a task force consisting members of different backgrounds to create a solution that will tackle the root of the lack of the water. The main root, I believe, is the pollution of the sources of rivers and seas by industrial corporations. An example of solving this is the strict laws created by many nations to prevent spilling industrial wastes to open water. On the other hand, the individuals of the country must be aware that some of their actions, such as throwing trash in the body of waters, are also part of the problem. The example of this can be found in teaching children to put trash in trash cans in school.

In conclusion, the decrease of fresh water in all countries globally can cause an increase of infectious diseases. The measure to be taken is by making sure every parts of each countries aware of the problem and prevent further contamination of the scarce resource."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, sử dụng một số từ vựng có chuyên ngành như "sanitation and hygiene level" hoặc "contaminated water" để mô tả vấn đề của thiếu nước sạch toàn cầu. Bạn cũng sử dụng các từ vựng phổ biến như "solution" hay "collective effort" để giải quyết tình trạng này.

Tuy nhiên, cần đề cập đến một số lỗi sai như sử dụng từ "adversities" thay vì "problems" và từ "pollution" chưa đầy đủ thể hiện vấn đề được đề cập. Bên cạnh đó, bạn có thể sử dụng các từ vựng đồng nghĩa hoặc mô tả cụ thể hơn về vấn đề này, để giải thích rõ hơn cho người đọc hiểu được nội dung của bài viết. Ví dụ như thay vì "the major area that is affected" bạn có thể sử dụng "the most affected areas" để mô tả rõ hơn về tác động của thiếu nước sạch đến sức khỏe con người.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Having more money and less free time is better than earning less money and having more free time. Discuss both views and give your opinion"
Essay:
"In this day and age, people have different visions about time and money. Some of them believe that having more money and less leisure time is better than low income and having more free time. From my perspective, people should work hard to earn more money which is a better than having more time with low salary because value of money bring us more benefits.

Although people can spend more time to take care of themselves or enhance value of spiritual fife, having life with the low income and too much time is boring. Everything need money and life is not much comfortable if people don’t earn enough money to live. We can not hang out with friends or enjoy own pleasure and it is an easy way which leads stress. And in period when Covid-19 impact negatively on the national economy, senior student which have just graduated  could land in an impasse if they don’t find a job. Or having more free time could bring people bad emotions and negative thinks. People could take notice of something which nothing to pay attention. For instance, some invidual feel less confident when everybody around they have good work except him.

On the other hand, having more money and less free time is better. As an illustration, some invidual earn much money and spend time for his family hardly, so he will respect time when he can together with his family or friends. People can enjoy the service in the best way with corresponding money, this is a benefit of money. People can not have much time with family, but any time they are together, they feel satisfied and always keep beautiful memories.

In conclusion, having more money and less free time can bring convenience and prosperous for people. They will try their best to dedicate for work and respect time when they can enjoy with family."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, ngữ cảnh từ vựng được sử dụng chủ yếu phù hợp với chủ đề và nội dung. Một số từ vựng hợp ngữ cảnh đã được sử dụng đúng cách và mang ý nghĩa rõ ràng. Tuy nhiên, tôi nhận thấy một số lỗi sai về từ vựng và đề xuất cách sửa như sau:

1. "Value of money bring us more benefits" -> "The value of money brings us more benefits" (nên dùng mạo từ "the")

2. "Enhance value of spiritual fife" -> "Enhance the value of spiritual life" hoặc "Enhance one's spiritual well-being" (thay đổi cấu trúc câu và dùng danh từ một cách chính xác)

3. "Having life with the low income" -> "Living with a low income" (sử dụng "living" và "a" để diễn đạt ý nghĩa chính xác hơn)

4. "It is an easy way which leads stress" -> "It is a leading cause of stress" (thay đổi cấu trúc câu và sử dụng cụm danh từ "leading cause")

5. "Bad emotions and negative thinks" -> "Negative emotions and thoughts" (sử dụng tính từ "negative" chính xác và sửa từ "thinks" thành "thoughts")

6. "People could take notice of something which nothing to pay attention" -> "People could notice things that are not worth paying attention to" (thay đổi câu trúc và sử dụng cụm từ "not worth paying attention to" để diễn đạt ý nghĩa rõ ràng hơn)

7. "Senior student which have just graduated" -> "Recent graduates" hoặc "Fresh graduates" (thay đổi từ "senior student which have just graduated" thành cụm danh từ một cách chính xác hơn)
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people believe  that eventually all jobs will be done by artificially intelligence Roberts.What is your opinion?"
Essay:
"Artificially intelligent robots will take over the human workforce in the future. Although, all the easy skill jobs will be done by robots, but still some skillfull work will require human contacts. This essay will discuss why some jobs will still be undertaken manually. 

Robots may be replaced to carry forward the jobs that are not too complex and can easily perform without much involvement by humans.As it will be beneficial for multinational companies and industries to gain profits through artificial intellect instead of spending highly on hiring, training and employing the human. For instance, in may metropolitan cities the traffic personnel are replaced by an automatic traffic control system which is far more cost effective. In addition, this system works around the clock and require no holiday.

For these reasons computers and robots will be involved in human lives more frequently in the upcoming future.

Conversely, there are some skillfull jobs that are interdependent on human relations and emotions, and that this job cannot be handled by automated robots. Likewise, the jobs where the human mind, soul and his own natural brilliance is more crucial rather than only the profit conquered by the artificial brilliance. These jobs include psychology, education, medicines and some social jobs needed for the betterment of the society. All in all, robots cannot perceive human nature that has performed this social evolution since hundred and thousands of years ago. 

To sum up, a significant number of jobs will be control of the artificial intellect in the future. Despite the fact that advanced technologies will take over the market; however I still believe that some sophisticated jobs will require human agility. Ultimately, skillfull jobs that require people excellence cannot be effectively carried out by artificial intelligence."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn sử dụng từ vựng phù hợp với chủ đề được thảo luận. Tuy nhiên, một số tiếng Anh không chính xác và cách sử dụng từ có thể gây hiểu lầm cho người đọc, dưới đây là những lỗi liên quan đến từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn:

1. "Easy skill jobs" nên sử dụng "entry-level jobs" hoặc "low-skilled jobs" sẽ phù hợp hơn.
2. Sử dụng "automated robots" sẽ trùng lặp vì "robot" đã bao gồm khái niệm "automated", nên nên chỉ sử dụng "robots".
3. Trong câu "These jobs include psychology, education, medicines and some social jobs needed for the betterment of the society." nên sửa lại từ "medicines" thành "medical professions" hoặc "healthcare professions" để nói rõ hơn và chính xác hơn.
4. Trong câu "All in all, robots cannot perceive human nature that has performed this social evolution since hundred and thousands of years ago." "perceive" không phù hợp với ngữ cảnh, bạn nên sử dụng "understand" để bài viết được dễ hiểu hơn.

Tổng quan, bên cạnh việc sử dụng từ vựng phù hợp với chủ đề, bạn cần chú ý đến cách dùng, cách sắp xếp từ của bạn cũng như kiểm tra lại viết tắt, in hoa và chính tả để tăng tính chính xác của bài viết.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people say that music is a good way of bringing people of different

cultures and ages together.

To what extent do you agree or disagree with this opinion?"
Essay:
"Music is a tool by which people from different cultures and age groups can unify together, this is a common belief by some people. In my opinion, I strongly agree. 

For many years, music was one of the criteria by which you can know and understand some people’s culture or background. For example, if you hear a particular melody, you can relate it to a specific group of people or culture. The music of South Egypt differs from the Mediterranean. On the other hand, the music of South Egypt is so close to the music of many African countries. Moreover, you can unify people under the music umbrella.

However, you can find different kinds of music in the same country. Not only does each type identify  the environmental nature of these people, but also it reflects their culture and belonging. Today, I watched a concert for Mohamed Mounir, one of the most famous singers in Egypt. The orchestra contains musicians from different countries. The singer himself is Egyptian Nubian, however, the orchestra has people from 10 different countries. Some of them were from Germany, others were Arabs and, surprisingly, the solo violin musician was from Tokyo. Years back, Mounir used to make concerts in Berlin, although most of the attendees could not understand Arabic,  his concerts had been fully booked months before.

Music is an easy language that brings people together. For example, I myself enjoy French classical music a lot, but I cannot understand French well. Some instruments belong to a special culture more than others. The harp is a symbol of  ancient Egyptian music. On the other hand, the tambourine belongs to the Nubian and Sudanese cultures.

To sum up, In my opinion, we can use music to unify nations. The arts in general, is a great opportunity to dissolve the conflicts and differences between us. It makes us feel uniquely dissolved in each other."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, việc sử dụng từ vựng phù hợp với ngữ cảnh và chủ đề được thể hiện khá tốt. Tuy nhiên, vẫn có một số lỗi và cải tiến mà bạn có thể áp dụng để cải thiện Lexical Resource của bài viết. Dưới đây là danh sách các lỗi và cải tiến:

1. "unify together" - Lỗi dư từ "together".
Giải thích: "Unify" đã chứa ý nghĩa của từ "together" trong câu. Bạn có thể sửa lại thành "unify" hoặc "bring together" để tránh sự lặp lại.

2. "For many years" - Có thể sử dụng từ ngữ mạnh mẽ hơn.
Giải thích: Thay vì sử dụng "For many years," bạn có thể sử dụng cụm từ như "Throughout history" hoặc "For centuries" để tăng tính mạnh mẽ và phong cách cho câu.

3. "you can know and understand some people’s culture or background" - Sử dụng từ "recognize" thích hợp hơn.
Giải thích: Thay vì sử dụng "know and understand," bạn có thể sử dụng từ "recognize" để diễn đạt ý nghĩa một cách chính xác hơn.

4. "South Egypt" - Sử dụng "Southern Egypt" thể hiện ý nghĩa vùng miền hơn.
Giải thích: Việc sử dụng "Southern Egypt" sẽ diễn đạt rõ ràng hơn về sự đề cập đến vùng miền cụ thể, hơn là chỉ gọi là "South Egypt."
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people are fond of buying new gadgets, phones, or laptops. Is this a good thing or a bad thing? Discuss your opinion"
Essay:
"Owning latest electronic devices has become a trend. It is observed that some people like to purchase latest electronics devices, mobile phone or laptops. In my opinion, this is detrimental to the individual as it might impact their financial stability and personal life.

Firstly, any electronic device comes with a hefty price tag. The frequency with which companies launch mobile phones and laptops is frantic. Every single day a new phone or a gadget is launched in some part of the world. People who are fond of buying new products end up selling older products so that they can fund the new purchase. However, as the resale price of these goods is low, they recover only a fraction of the original cost and hence end up putting in more money for purchasing the device. Spending too much money on new gadgets can put individuals under tremendous financial distress.

Secondly, the compulsive urge to buy the latest version of gadgets is not good for the environment. When people update the devices frequently, a lot of older devices will end up in landfills. From there they will pollute the land and water. They could even emit harmful radiations.

Thirdly, most electronic gadgets have different operating procedures. Hence it becomes essential for the buyer to spend a significant amount of time to familiarize themselves with the new device. This wastes precious time that could be used for other useful purposes.

In conclusion, I believe the practice / habit of buying latest devices, mobile phones or laptops has a detrimental effect on the personal life and financial condition of an individual."

###
completion:
Từ vựng của bài viết của bạn là khá đa dạng và khá phong phú. Tuy nhiên, có một số từ vựng phổ biến có thể được thay thế bằng các từ vựng phức tạp hơn nhằm nâng cao chất lượng bài viết.

Ví dụ: 

- "Frantic" có thể được thay thế bằng các từ như "hectic" hoặc "frenzied". 

- "Compulsive urge" có thể được thay thế bằng "irresistible urge" hoặc "strong inclination".

Ngoài ra, còn một số lỗi về từ vựng mà bạn có thể cần lưu ý. 

- Trong câu "People who are fond of buying new products end up selling older products so that they can fund the new purchase", "fund" không được sử dụng chính xác ở đây. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "finance" để diễn tả ý của mình một cách chính xác hơn. 

- Trong câu "Spending too much money on new gadgets can put individuals under tremendous financial distress", "distress" không phù hợp với bối cảnh. Bạn có thể sử dụng các từ như "difficulty" hoặc "hardship" để diễn tả ý của mình một cách chính xác hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people say that advertising encourages us to buy things that we really do not need. Others say that advertisements tell us about new products that may improve our lives.


Which viewpoint do you agree with?

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience."
Essay:
"To promote the business,companies choose effective ways to reach customers as publications.Many people believe that promotional adverts attract  people to purchase the commodity even those that are not useful to them.Some opine that those broadcast help us to introduce a new variety of stuff to improve their lifestyles.In my opinion, I agree with the statement.In the forthcoming paragraphs, I shall explain my point of view.

Firstly, several studies have suggested that  literature, which remains the most effective means of increasing sales for many varieties, can manipulate customers into buying goods that they don't actually need because their bottom line is to uplift the overall sales for a company. For example, in the realm of cosmetics, once the new innovation became stagnant, companies started to move towards misleading marketing tactics to increase their sales, which differentiate the quality with little to no actual difference, in terms of day Vs night, men's Vs women's and kid's Vs adult's. It changes the whole narrative into having a personal product for each household, then having a common consumption trend.

Secondly, it is observed that the recent rise in consumer behaviour studies, which focuses on the emotional element behind a purchase decision, has enabled varieties to manipulate buyers by forming stories that can tap into their feelings and emotions, and create desires that never existed. For instance, several luxury brands like Gucci and Ferrari create a sense of success and exclusivity around their products by using exotic locations and extremely attractive models in their commercials. It consequently creates a desire to get these limited products so that one can also become a part of these exclusive clubs.

In conclusion, I think advertisements do have the power to pursue us into buying unnecessary goods. We as consumers need to be more vigilant, and authorities need to regulate the advertisements more tightly to counter this issue."

###
completion:
Từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn phong phú và đa dạng, nhưng vẫn có một vài lỗi sai phát sinh. Dưới đây là một số lỗi và gợi ý để sửa chữa:

1. "publications" -> sử dụng từ "mediums" để diễn tả các kênh thông tin hiệu quả hơn.
2. "commodity" -> thay bằng từ "product" sẽ phù hợp hơn.
3. "broadcast" -> sử dụng từ "advertisement" hoặc "ad" sẽ chính xác hơn.

7. "actual difference" -> thay bằng từ "real distinction" sẽ phù hợp hơn.

prompt:
Topic:
"Do you think it is better for students to work before their university study? Why? Use reasons and specific examples to support your choice."
Essay:
"Critics said that students shouldn't work before enrolling in university as they will have plenty of time to do so sooner or later. I am strongly against  this affirmation for two reasons, firstly taking a gap year provides youngsterswith  a more thorough career-plan beforehand, and ,secondly it can propose an alternative plan for those who perform not so well at school .

To embark on, teenagers can make a better career plan following the internship. Realizing how cruel the workplace is only after they graduate, students have no clues on how to prepare themselves at school in an attempt to fit in the commercial world. For instance, they don't know how to excel the knowledge they learnt from school to the society. Additionally,  discovering the differences between reality and the classroom, it can serve as a driving force for striving for a better grade at school and thus offer a better job in future. 

Apart from that, this can provide an exit plan for those who hate study. Not everyone likes learning, some may be just not suitable for it innately. Through the experiences of working, students with no interest in school can leave school earlier and stop wasting their time. Instead of doing something they may feel suffering and with no promising outcomes, they could explore more possibilities by trying something totally new. A typical case in point, Bill Gates, the founder of apple didn't finish university and still made a fortune afterwards through countless trials in the work setting.  

To conclude, by citing two reasons, as more proper career plans and more possibilities, I strongly encourage students to work before the commencement of college. I believe a gap year internship would definitely bring more good than harm to our students."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, tôi thấy rằng bạn đã sử dụng một số từ không chính xác hoặc không phù hợp trong một số trường hợp. Ví dụ, trong đoạn thứ nhất, bạn sử dụng từ "affirmation" để chỉ "statement" hay "saying" - hai từ phù hợp hơn để diễn đạt ý của bạn.

Trong đoạn thứ hai, bạn đã sử dụng từ "excel" để chỉ "apply" hoặc "utilize" - hai từ phù hợp hơn để truyền tải ý của bạn một cách chính xác hơn. Đồng thời, trong đoạn này, bạn cũng sử dụng từ "innately", nhưng từ này có thể không được phổ biến trong IELTS, vì vậy nếu bạn muốn dùng một từ tương tự, bạn nên sử dụng từ "inherently" thay vì "innately".

Cuối cùng, trong đoạn cuối cùng, bạn đã sử dụng "make a fortune afterwards" để chỉ "become successful later on", nhưng từ này có thể không phù hợp, vì vậy, bạn nên sử dụng một cách diễn đạt khác để tránh sử dụng các từ không phù hợp hoặc không chính xác.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"It has been seen that these days, some workplaces tend to employ equal numbers of men and women workers. Do you think it is a positive or negative development."
Essay:
"It is now a trend in multinational companies and large organizations to give equal roles to women employees in the workplace.  This is a very healthy initiative which has led to an increase in the number of women being employed and the numbers are now catching up with that of the male employees in such organizations.  In my view, this is a highly positive development which has got a plethora of merits for our nation.

Firstly,  talent and hard work of any individual needs to be appreciated and awarded without any discrimination.  Such policies help organizations realize the potential of their employees and achieve their business goals faster.  For example, the turnaround story of Pepsico from crisis by choosing a non-board-member women to be their chief illustrates the point. 

Secondly, a recent study by the University of California on the workplace gender ratio showed that teams with an equal proportion of men and women tend to be more productive than those dominated by one gender. NASA, the most successful space exploration agency, uses the results of this study in structuring their teams and to plan even their interplanetary mission crews.   

Although it is understandable that women are physically weak as compared to men and that they are not completely out of the age-old social stigma which makes them take up more responsibilities towards their families, they have made up for such negative factors by their sheer hard work and persistence.  So, women being treated and employed just like any other human being is one of the biggest revolutions which is happening in our times and it holds the key for the sustainable development of any nation in the world."

###
completion:
Bạn đã sử dụng một số từ vựng tốt trong bài viết của mình. Tuy nhiên, một số lỗi các từ đã được sử dụng sai hoặc không phù hợp với từng ngữ cảnh cụ thể. Dưới đây là một số gợi ý để cải thiện Lexical Resource của bạn:

- Từ "revolutions" trong câu "So, women being treated and employed just like any other human being is one of the biggest revolutions which is happening in our times and it holds the key for the sustainable development of any nation in the world" không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh này, vì nó khá mạnh và không phù hợp với đối tượng mà bạn đang nói đến (phụ nữ). Giải pháp cho vấn đề này là bạn có thể sử dụng các từ khác bằng cách sử dụng từ vựng chuyên môn chính xác.

- Từ "talent" trong câu "Firstly, talent and hard work of any individual needs to be appreciated and awarded without any discrimination" nên được thay bằng "ability" để phù hợp hơn với nghĩa của câu.

- Từ "crisis" trong câu "For example, the turnaround story of Pepsico from crisis by choosing a non-board-member women to be their chief illustrates the point" không sử dụng đúng cách, vì Pepsico không có hình dung tác động của cuộc khủng hoảng nào trong câu chuyện của họ. Sử dụng từ "challenges" sẽ giúp câu trở nên rỏ hơn và chính xác hơn.

- Từ "dominated" trong câu "teams with an equal proportion of men and women tend to be more productive than those dominated by one gender" nên được thay thế bằng "heavily skewed" để đưa ra nghĩa chính xác hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Nowadays the way many people interact with each other has changed because of technology. In what ways has technology affected the types of relationships that people make? Has this been a positive or negative development?"
Essay:
"In the last 10 years, technological advancement in the internet and multimedia has increased significantly and influences how people communicate and interact with others effectively and less costly without direct meet. In this essay, I will outline the advantages and disadvantages of these issues in our society.

It is true that people's interaction with others is no longer limited by distance, and in our daily work we can attend online training provided by our employer in real-time and it will minimize companies' budget to increase efficiency. In 2005 IBM save millions of dollars to enhance human resource quality by cutting expenses in travel and accommodation for their employees. Nevertheless, this method requires a corporation to prepare cutting-edge platforms and equipment which is relatively expensive, and companies with a limited budget such as small and medium enterprises do not have adequate resources to satisfy this requirement. Besides, the topics conveyed by the trainers sometimes do not understand clearly by the audience due to network disruption.

On the other hand, people can make new friends from different parts of the world through media social like Facebook and Instagram which enable them to know other countries' cultures and values. They also can share their knowledge and experience and obtain various information on business opportunities and scholarships overseas to pursue higher education, but this will cause a new problem if people do not choose wisely friends they know from social media. They will be victims of crimes like sextortion which occurred around the world several years ago and loss of money after transferring a lot of money to buy certain items by fake accounts.

In conclusion, I contend that technological development facilitates us to interact with other people because much more efficient, cheaper and faster. However, we are also cautious regarding its risk when we meet new people on social media."

###
completion:
Về phần Lexical Resource, bài viết của bạn đã trình bày các ý kiến của mình bằng cách sử dụng kho từ vựng đa dạng và phù hợp, có nhiều từ vựng trình độ cao như "multimedia", "cutting-edge", "network disruption", "sextortion". Tuy nhiên, trong một số trường hợp bạn đã sử dụng từ không chính xác hoặc lặp lại từ quá nhiều lần, có thể ảnh hưởng tới điểm số của Lexical Resource. Dưới đây là một số lỗi cụ thể mà tôi thấy trong bài viết của bạn:

- "potential pitfalls" -> thay bằng "possible dangers" để tránh sự lặp lại từ "potential".
- "ones in which we can encounter" -> thay bằng "the ones that we may encounter" để cải thiện độ chính xác ngữ pháp.
- "technological innovation in the internet" -> sử dụng "technological advancement in the internet" thay cho cách dùng cụm từ không chính xác.
- "do not understand clearly by the audience" -> thay bằng "are not clearly understood by the audience" để sử dụng đúng dạng passives.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Many people today are worried about ‘cybercrime’ such as hacking and identity theft. What problems does ‘cybercrime’ cause, and what solutions can you suggest for ordinary people and businesses to take?"
Essay:
"There is no  doubt, that the number of cybercrimes has been constantly rising over the last decade. The most obvious reason for this phenomenon is severe deficiency of secure software in comparison with malicious soft. In this essay I would like to discuss some outcomes and solutions for this issue.

To begin with, while IT-specialists unsuccessfully atepmt to catch up hackers, ordinary users scarely take benefits from existing software due to IT-illiteracy. Individuals browse suspicious web-sites and receive unsolicited messages without realizing probable consequences. As a result, they provide hackers with an acces to  personal data, such as name, bank account number or even chattings.Moreover,  victims of cybercrimes often face with psychological abusement, such as cyber bulling or exploitation. As for corporations, the main reason for being endangered is an increased number of persons with an acces to corporation's data. Particularly, each corporation with remote branches has to use share servers, and each computer with an authorized acces can be crashed. Finally, a remarkable ammount of data thefs occurs due to improper usage of official gadgets.

Overall, some steps shoud be implemented in order to manage more relevant security politics. Firstly, goverments should shift theirs focuses onto development of legal framework in cyberspace.Some kind of management authority in privacy also might be created. Clear terms of investigations and conprehensible punishment politics would  trigger a sustaintial decline in cybercrime. Another one measure would be reinforcing of privacy politics among corporations. For instance, each employee who receives an access to corporation's data should be scrupulously testified in cyber security knowledge and skills. In addition, a prohibition ro use official gadgets for personal purposes might also reduce a number of random data thefts.

To conclude, I would say, that despite various causes for cybercrime, such measures, as creating privacy policy and reconsideration of privacy rules for users, might be highly effective in both categories."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, bạn đã sử dụng một loạt các từ vựng phổ biến và thường được sử dụng. Bạn cũng đã thể hiện sự linh hoạt và đa dạng trong việc sử dụng các từ ngữ để diễn tả suy nghĩ của mình. Dưới đây là một số lỗi sai và nhận xét về sử dụng từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn:

1. "severe deficiency" không phải là từ cụ thể để diễn tả sự khác biệt giữa phần mềm bảo mật và phần mềm độc hại. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "disproportionate" hoặc "unbalanced".

2. Từ "scarely" không phải là từ tiếng Anh chính xác. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "rarely".

3. Từ "acces" viết sai chính tả. Ý của bạn trong câu này là "access".

4. Từ "exploitation" không phù hợp để mô tả tình trạng bị tấn công trên mạng. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng từ "vulnerability" để diễn tả tình trạng bị xâm nhập.

5. Từ "conprehensible" không phù hợp. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng từ "clear" hoặc "understandable".

6. Bạn đã sử dụng từ "reinforcing" đúng cách trong câu của mình. Tuy nhiên, nếu bạn muốn thể hiện ý nghĩa một cách rõ ràng hơn, bạn có thể sử dụng "strengthening" thay vì "reinforcing".

7. Từ "scrupulously" đã được sử dụng đúng về mặt ngữ nghĩa, nhưng nó có thể không phù hợp với ngữ cảnh. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "thoroughly" để diễn đạt ý của mình một cách rõ ràng hơn.

8. Từ "prohibition ro" viết sai chính tả. Ý của bạn trong câu này là "prohibition of".
 END

Nevertheless,  others think that zoological garden are most for significant for drilling and protection. Viewing from a general perspective, the essay discusses both viewpoints, I personally agree with the former opinion for the  following reasons. 

To begin with, there are many reasons for this is illegal activity to keep wild animals in zoos. Firstly, this can affect to the beast irrefutably how they can not live to freedom life where cage as a result, they are lived only few square meter space compard to forest. On the other hand, Zoologocal garden is the best place for keeping brutal in order to avoid many things. Firstly, when the beast hold on to wild park the public have a chance to know and see about their lifestyle because the population never go to visit forest in order to learn about this. Secondly, the most important of the menagerie can help to presevation of some endangered fauna therefore, the researcher are able to do their higher studies in wild life such as documentary film. ###
completion:
Có một số vấn đề về Lexical Resource (từ vựng) trong bài viết của bạn. Dưới đây là một số lỗi và giải thích:

1. "species have a rights": Thay vì "have a rights", bạn có thể sử dụng "have the right" để biểu đạt ý tưởng đúng hơn.

2. "brutal" (Ủy mị) - Thay vì "brutal", bạn có thể sử dụng "wild" hay "wild animals" để biểu đạt ý tưởng chính xác hơn.

3. "drilling" (Khoan) - Từ này không liên quan đến ngữ cảnh. Có thể bạn muốn sử dụng từ "learning" hay "education" để biểu đạt ý tưởng một cách chính xác hơn.

4. "significant" (Quan trọng) - Từ này không phù hợp trong trường hợp này. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "important" (Quan trọng) hay "crucial" (Quyết định) để miêu tả ý tưởng một cách chính xác hơn.

5. "beast" (Quái vật) - Từ này không phù hợp để nói về động vật. Thay vào đó, hãy sử dụng từ "animals" để biểu đạt ý tưởng chính xác hơn.

6. "irrefutably" (Không thể bác bỏ) - Từ này không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh này. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "negatively" (Một cách tiêu cực) hay "adversely" (Một cách xấu) để miêu tả ảnh hưởng đến động vật
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people think that professional athletes make good role models for young people, while others believe they don’t.

Discuss both these points of views and give your own opinion."
Essay:
"Every famous person's activity has an effect somewhere on other people. Some people say that professional players make good role models for the younger generation, while others think that this is not right. Through this essay I will discuss both of the points in detail and then will come to a reasonable conclusion comprising of my opinion.

Famous players can play a vital role in the youth development. They are followed by many people, because of their reputation and hence their every action has a direct effect on their followers. For instance, the increasing change in fashion and the lifestyle of the youth, is caused by the specialist sports person because of their renowned status. Thus, it this clear that how important role they can play in order to alter the attitude of people.

On the other hand, there are people, who argue that this saying is not right, because they believe that every person is capable enough to make the difference between right and wrong. It is further added that, though, such distinguished players have the reputation and respect in society, but this does not mean that they must be followed in every moment of life. However, this is not always true, because it is difficult to control the youngster from adopting their style as a fan can do anything for his / her followers. Thus, this thought is refused because of such reason.

In conclusion, it is clear that professional sports persons can play a vital role in order to affect the lives of youth positively, because they have fans and followers everywhere. Thus, I believe that it is right to say that esteemed sports person can make a good role model for the younger generation of a community."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, cách sử dụng từ vựng đã khá đa dạng và phong phú. Tuy nhiên, vẫn còn một số lỗi sai về từ vựng và sự phù hợp với ngữ cảnh như sau:

1. "Every famous person's activity has an effect somewhere on other people." 
Lỗi: "somewhere" không phù hợp với ngữ cảnh này. Bạn có thể sử dụng "somewhere" để chỉ một vị trí không xác định, nhưng trong câu này nên sử dụng từ thích hợp hơn như "on" hoặc "upon" để chỉ tác động của hoạt động của người nổi tiếng lên người khác.

2. "Their every action has a direct effect on their followers." 
Lỗi: Từ ngữ "action" không rõ ràng và không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh này. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "behaviors" để diễn đạt ý tưởng một cách chính xác hơn.

3. "The increasing change in fashion and the lifestyle of the youth, is caused by the specialist sports person because of their renowned status." 
Lỗi: Cấu trúc câu này không chính xác. Bạn có thể thay "the specialist sports person" thành "professional athletes" để sử dụng một cách tổng quát hơn. Ngoài ra, câu này cũng có thể được viết lại để tránh lặp từ "the" sau "because of": "The renowned status of professional athletes can lead to significant changes in the fashion and lifestyle of the youth."

4. "It is further added that, though, such distinguished players have the reputation and respect in society..."
Lỗi: Từ "further" không phù hợp ở đây, nên xóa từ này đi. Ngoài ra, nên viết liền "It is added that such distinguished players..." để giúp câu văn suôn sẻ hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Describe an interesting conversation you had with other people."
Essay:
"I have to admit that I’m not much of a social person – I mean, I am quite shy and inhibited, so most of the time I tend to avoid talking to strangers. But I do remember a time when I had to talk to a complete stranger, and as I remember it was around 5 years ago, on my very first trip to Ho Chi Minh City. It was just a short conversation, but I can still remember it quite well.

I was a 20-year-old freshman back then, and I was unable to navigate my way to the HCMC University of Education where I was about to start studying. Back then Google Map’s wasn’t as popular as it is nowadays, so the only way I could figure out the way was by asking a local. So after hours of wandering around, I finally resorted to asking a lady who was selling noodles at a food cart near where I was standing. I asked the lady if she would be so kind to tell me the way to the HCMC University of Education and she kindly replied by pointing to the big building across the road and saying ’it’s over there’.

The university was being renovated back then, so I was unable to recognise it, but before I went off to study I decided to sit down and order some noodles from the old lady and have a chat with her. It turns out that she was also from Ninh Thuan, which is my hometown. So we ended up chatting for ages about our lives and about how and why we had come to HCMC.

You know, I think I found this conversation so interesting simply because I found Mrs Kim to be such a nice lady.  As the conversation went on and I got to know her better I realized that she had had quite a tough life, yet she had managed to maintain such a sweet and gentle personality that many other women who have been through similar struggles to her would have lost by now."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, việc sử dụng từ vựng là khá đa dạng và phù hợp với ngữ cảnh của câu chuyện. Tuy nhiên, có một số điểm nhỏ cần chú ý:

1. "...so most of the time I tend to avoid talking to strangers" - Từ "strangers" nên có số nhiều là "strangers" để phù hợp với "most of the time".

2. "...on my very first trip to Ho Chi Minh City" - "Very first" cần được chia thành hai từ riêng rẽ để trở thành "my first" để tránh sự lặp lại.

3. "...but before I went off to study I decided to sit down and order some noodles" - Từ "study" có thể thay thế bằng "attend classes" để mô tả hành động cụ thể hơn.

4. "As the conversation went on and I got to know her better I realized that she had had quite a tough life" - Bạn đã sử dụng cấu trúc "had had" để diễn tả quá khứ hoàn thành trong câu này. Bạn có thể sử dụng cấu trúc khác để tránh lặp lại từ "had", ví dụ: "I realized that she had faced significant hardships in her life".

Ngoài các điểm trên, bài viết của bạn có sử dụng từ vựng phong phú và phù hợp với ngữ cảnh của câu chuyện.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"International marketing is sometimes seen as invasive and an intrusion into the country in question. Others argue that it is a necessary and economical form of education in addition to spreading ideas, language and culture. Discuss both sides and give your opinion."
Essay:
"One of the most interesting topics to discuss in current times is, global marketing is spreading all over the world without any limitations while some people argue that global marketing is coming into the nation at rapid speed. On the other hand, some argue that it is important to see global marketing is expanding in every nation because, this adds exchange of ideas, languages, and cultures among the nations. In this essay, we will discuss both sides of the question and I will give my opinion. 

One group of people strongly argue that global marketing is a major threat to the nation because, if everyone is interested in buying products from big companies, the local business will go into a huge loss. Perhaps, this will affect the nation's economy. Moreover, global marketing is coming into small towns where there is no place to earn profits. However, this is not recommended. Lastly, the government is also trying to spread global marketing into every corner of the nation without asking public opinion. Despite, this will cause a major impact on the local business. 

On the other hand, some people argue that spreading global marketing will help the nation to improve its economy and give strong competition to other countries. In the same way, international marketing will help the nation to expose various languages, cultures, and technology. In the same way, it will give a lot of employment to the graduates. As a result, we can see a strong economic nation in a short time. 

In conclusion, I suggest that international marketing is important to spread in the nation, but with some limitations, where the local businesses should not be affected."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, bạn đã sử dụng được một số từ vựng phù hợp như "global marketing", "exchange of ideas, languages, and cultures", "nation's economy" và "employment to the graduates". 

Tuy nhiên, trong một số trường hợp, bạn đã lặp lại từ quá nhiều, ví dụ như từ "nation" (xuất hiện 8 lần) và từ "global marketing" (xuất hiện 5 lần). Điều này có thể làm mất tính đa dạng của từ vựng và ảnh hưởng đến mức điểm của bạn.

Bạn có thể cải thiện bài viết của bạn bằng cách sử dụng nhiều từ đồng nghĩa hoặc các cụm từ khác để diễn đạt các ý tưởng của mình một cách đa dạng hơn và hấp dẫn hơn cho người đọc. Ví dụ, thay vì lặp lại từ "nation", bạn có thể sử dụng các từ như "country", "state", "region" hoặc "territory" tùy thuộc vào ngữ cảnh của văn bản.

Ngoài ra, trong bài viết của bạn còn một vài lỗi từ vựng như từ "add" không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh "add exchange of ideas" mà nên sử dụng "facilitate" hoặc "encourage" thay vì "add". 

Tổng quan, bạn có các từ vựng tốt trong bài viết, tuy nhiên có thể cải thiện bằng cách đa dạng hóa từ vựng và lựa chọn các từ phù hợp nhất trong ngữ cảnh của văn bản của mình.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Extreme sports such as sky diving and skiing are very dangerous and should be banned.

To what extent do you agree or disagree with this view?

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience."
Essay:
"It is believed that dangerous activities such as skiing and diving are threatening and should be brought to a stop. In this essay I shall share my thoughts and opinions regarding the topic.

Firstly, let's discuss as to why these sports are considered to be risky. One of the reasons that comes first to mind is that taking part in such activities which are highly dependent on related equipment which are not necessarily always reliable. Faults in devices used for such sports could even lead on to be fatal. Though backup equipment might be present for the user to make use of in case of an emergency, it needn't be one hundred per cent reliable cause it depends on how quick the user is to react to emergency situations. He or she should be able to demonstrate good presence of mind and agility. Another reason could be that all of these are individual sports, meaning you have no companions nor any sort of lifeguard to save you in a trouble situation. 

With all that being said it is also important to consider the desires and interests of the people. There are plethora of people who love carrying out such activities. These are the type of people who are constantly in search of adventure and thrill in their lives. They are bored of their daily routine qnd want to experience some twists and turns in life even if it means involving a lot of danger.

I am of the opinion that it is not right to be banning such activities because it is the choice of the individuals as to what they want to do. If they prefer playing such sports involving such high risks then let it be so. Everyone in this world has the right to choose to perform these sports and if it is his or her choice, then it must be respected. 

To conclude with I would like to mention one of my thoughts. Danger can be in the form of anything and everything one does. Even if someone is cycling, running or maybe even just walking then that person could still be in some or the other sort of danger. So, it is not possible to prevent all sorts of dangers instead one should try and enjoy every part of his or her life as long as he or she can. It would most apt to end this essay with an example. A few months back I was at the football stadium viewing an intense match between Argentina and Iran. The match was going on all fine just when one of the players shot the ball really hard which ended up hitting a kid in the stands. I thought to myself,  could viewing a football match turn out to be dangerous as well? I had realised that I had found the answer to my question in the question itself that is anything and everything involves a risk factor,  so all finally depends on your fate. Your fate is what depends whether something turns out to be dangerous to you or not."

###
completion:
Từ vựng của bạn khá đa dạng và tương đối chính xác, tuy nhiên, vẫn còn một số lỗi như sau:

1. "It is believed that dangerous activities such as skiing and diving are threatening and should be brought to a stop." - Lỗi: "threatening" không phù hợp với văn phong chính quy trong IELTS, nên sử dụng "dangerous" hoặc "risky" thay cho nó.

2. "Faults in devices used for such sports could even lead on to be fatal.
