Though backup equipment might be present for the user to make use of in case of an emergency, it needn't be one hundred per cent reliable cause it depends on how quick the user is to react to emergency situations." - "in case of an emergency" là một cụm từ thông thường nhưng không phù hợp cho bài viết IELTS. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng từ gợi ý như "in the event of an emergency" để tránh việc lặp lại không cần thiết.

3. "There are plethora of people who love carrying out such activities". - Cụm từ này thiếu "a" khi sử dụng "plethora" như một danh từ đếm được, vì vậy nên viết là "there are a plethora of people".

4. "They are bored of their daily routine qnd want to experience some twists and turns in life even if it means involving a lot of danger." - Từ "qnd" trong câu này có thể là lỗi chính tả. Ngoài ra, bạn nên sử dụng từ khác cho "twists" để tránh lặp lại từ trong đoạn văn.

5. "I had realised that I had found the answer to my question in the question itself that is anything and everything involves a risk factor" - Một cách để cải thiện từ vựng là sử dụng các từ từ khóa đi kèm để biết chắc rằng ý của bạn đang diễn đạt chính xác. Trong câu này, bạn có thể sử dụng từ "hazard" hoặc "peril" thay cho "risk factor".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"We are becoming increasingly dependent on computer-based technology. How do you think it will change in the future? Is it good for us to rely so much on computers?"
Essay:
"The increasing dependence on computer-based technology has been a controversial topic currently. How this phenomenon will change and whether the reliance on it is beneficial have been a matter of concern. From my perspective, people will become more dependent on technology and this is totally good for their lives. This essay will discuss the future prospects of technology and propose its advantages.  

To begin with, in the future, technology can revolutionize people’s social and professional lives. It is a fact that nowadays machinery plays an important role in every aspect of life and makes it more convenient than in previous years. Therefore, the development of technology will change the way individuals communicate that they can make communication at distance easily via smartphones or social network platforms such as Facebook or Instagram. It also can reduce the housework burden for most women that it can do the laundry and washing up. In the future, meals can be cooked by choosing in the screen of fridge or stove which is much more convenient than in the past. Another revolution can be seen in works and school that most of work and study can be done from home through the internet and people can achieve professional aims with a lower expense.

It is often argued that excess reliance on computers can lead to negative consequences. While there is some truth to this claim, people also need to consider that computer-based technology has many advantages in their lives. Firstly, machinery can save time for individuals and offer them opportunities to have a healthy lifestyle. Thanks to some household appliances such as washing machines or dishwashers, people can leave the housework for them and spend that time engaging in physical activities. People also can save time for transportation by communicating and working from home. Secondly, technology can help to improve people’s living standards. While people had to communicate directly or by letters in the past, they can have a conversation through the internet nowadays which is much more convenient. Especially during the pandemic, people still can keep in touch with one another thanks to technology. Besides, they also can entertain themselves with electronic appliances such as television or video games which are great innovations in the revolution of technology.

In conclusion, computer-based machinery is of great importance in people’s lives that individuals will increasingly rely on it in the future. This is totally a beneficial phenomenon because of technology’s various advantages."

###
completion:
Từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn khá đa dạng và chính xác. Bạn đã sử dụng các từ vựng phổ biến cũng như các từ vựng chuyên ngành để mô tả các ý tưởng của mình. 

Một số từ vị trí chưa được sử dụng đúng cách như: 

- "reliance on it is beneficial" thay vì nên sử dụng "reliance on technology is beneficial"
- "whether the reliance on it is beneficial" nên sử dụng "whether dependence on technology is advantageous"

Một số lỗi cụm từ có thể là sự lặp lại như: 

- "household appliances such as washing machines or dishwashers", nên sử dụng cấu trúc không lặp lại để tránh việc giống từ
- "communicating and working from home", thay vì sử dụng động từ dạng -ing, nên sử dụng động từ thứ 3 số ít "communicates and works from home"

Một số gợi ý từ vựng để bạn có thể sử dụng trong bài viết của mình:

- enhance (verb): to improve or increase something
- innovative (adjective): using new methods or ideas
- virtual (adjective): created, simulated, or carried on by means of a computer or computer network
- convenience (noun): the quality of being suitable to one's comfort, purposes, or needs
- alleviate (verb): to make a problem less severe or easier to deal with

Điều quan trọng là bạn đã sử dụng các từ vựng chính xác và hiệu quả để truyền tải các ý tưởng của mình. Hãy cố gắng sử dụng các từ vựng đồng nghĩa để tránh lặp lại quá nhiều các từ và cụm từ giống nhau.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people say that we do not need printed newspaper anymore. To what extent do you agree or disagree ?"
Essay:
"The advent of technology has led to an upsurge in digital media, which has given rise to the belief that traditional printed newspapers have become dispensable. While some individuals may still prefer the traditional means of acquiring news, I am of the opinion that the role of online news is more significant since it provides instant information and benefits the environment. 

Due to the speed with which they could be updated, I believe that e-news would be superior to conventional ones. Internet users can access the most recent news within minutes as a result of real-time updates on local and international occurrences. For example, today's people can access global updates instantly on the internet or other social media, namely Facebook or Tiktok to keep themselves abreast of the latest news. In contrast, regarding the time-consuming nature of newspaper editing and publication, readers will have to wait several days before they can obtain the news relevant to some staggering events.

 I suppose that, in addition to the high-speed update of information, online news sources will eventually replace traditional newspapers because of their environmental benefits. In terms of the environment, the production of newspapers, which requires a large amount of paper, ink, and delivery truck distribution, the widespread adoption of e-news would save numerous trees from being cut down and reduce air pollution. On the other hand, with the increasing number of people in modern society advocating eco-friendly lifestyles, the future of conventional printed newspapers does not seem to have much potential when compared with the convenient presence of online news.

In conclusion, I believe that paper-based articles are becoming obsolete and unnecessary due to the increasing popularity of e-news available on different social media platforms. This is a beneficial source for today's users to obtain instant information since it can provide immediate details of the latest events and help preserve natural resources."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn có sử dụng từ vựng phù hợp và được sắp xếp một cách hợp lý để trình bày ý kiến của bạn. Từ ngữ được dùng đầy đủ hợp ngữ cảnh và phù hợp với chủ đề. Dưới đây là một số điểm nhấn về từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn:

1. Upsurge: Từ ngữ này sử dụng phù hợp để miêu tả sự tăng lên đáng kể của phương tiện truyền thông kỹ thuật số.

2. Dispensable: Từ này sử dụng phù hợp để nói rằng nhiều người cho rằng tờ báo in truyền thống đã không còn cần thiết nữa.

3. Advent: Từ này sử dụng phù hợp để nói về sự xuất hiện của công nghệ đã tạo ra môi trường cho sự phát triển của phương tiện truyền thông kỹ thuật số.

4. Traditional means: Từ ngữ này sử dụng phù hợp để ám chỉ đến cách truyền thống để truy cập tin tức.

5. Acquiring: Từ này sử dụng phù hợp để nói về việc thu được thông tin.

6. Real-time: Từ này sử dụng phù hợp để nói về việc cập nhật thông tin ngay lập tức.

7. Abreast: Từ này sử dụng phù hợp để nói về việc cập nhật tin tức mới nhất.

8. Staggering events: Từ này sử dụng không chính xác. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "significant events"
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people believe that hobbies need to be difficult to be enjoyable. To what extent do you agree or disagree?"
Essay:
"It is believed that hobbies have to be challenging and advanced in order to be pleasing. In my opinion, I completely disagree with this view as I think hobbies are personal references and it varies depending on each individual’s aspire.
Everyone has different personality and life; hence their hobbies can be very unique and it is not necessary to require extreme difficulty. In fact, there are a multitude of relaxing hobbies that vast majority of us commonly enjoy such as listening to music, reading books, painting…. Hobbies is subjective and its key aim is to let people discover unseen aspect and nurture themselves in their own preferred ways. We should not set standards, judge or compels anyone to live up to others ideal hobbies as it is starkly a personal choice.
Another point to consider is that too much of a good thing could possibly be detrimental. Hobbies that have high level of difficulty is likely to be beneficial because it boosts your competitive spirit and gives you incentive to be an expert at it. In some case it may become your profession in the future. Nonetheless, continuously pushing and pressure yourself to only enjoy hobbies that are excessively hard could result in stress and anxiety. Furthermore, you would not be able to diversify and explore yourself if you solely seeking for a certain type of hobby. Despite others’ opinions, relaxation and your interests are the most important.
To conclude, hobbies can be either easy or obstinate as long as it is enjoyable. Everyone should feel freely to decide what activity they want to dedicate their spare time to."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, người viết đã sử dụng một danh sách từ vựng phong phú và phù hợp để trình bày quan điểm và ý kiến của mình về chủ đề. Một số cái từ đã được sử dụng hiệu quả và có hợp ngữ cảnh, nhưng cũng có một số điểm cần cải thiện. Dưới đây là một số lỗi sai và giải thích chi tiết.

1. "challenging and advanced" - "difficult": Thay thế cụm từ này bằng từ "difficult" để tránh lặp lại từ.
   Example: "Hobbies do not necessarily have to be difficult or advanced to be enjoyable."

2. "pleasing": Thay thế từ này bằng "enjoyable" để cải thiện sự sử dụng từ vựng và ngữ cảnh.
   Example: "...as I think hobbies can be enjoyable regardless of their difficulty."

3. "personal references": Khái niệm này không quá phổ biến, thay thế bằng "personal preferences" để diễn đạt ý của bạn một cách rõ ràng hơn.
   Example: "...as I think hobbies are personal preferences and vary depending on each individual's aspirations."

4. "vast majority of us": Dùng từ "most of us" để truyền đạt ý của bạn một cách trực tiếp hơn.
   Example: "There are many relaxing hobbies that most of us commonly enjoy, such as listening to music, reading books, painting, etc."

5. "it is not necessary to require": Cấu trúc câu này hơi lạ và không truyền đạt rõ ràng ý của bạn. Thay thế bằng "it is not necessary to have an extreme degree of difficulty".
   Example: "...it is not necessary to have an extreme degree of difficulty."

6. "it is starkly a personal choice": Câu này không rõ ràng và không cần
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people prefer to live in a house, while others feel that there are more advantages to living in an apartment. Are there more advantages than disadvantages of living in a house compared with living in an apartment?"
Essay:
"In current world, people tend to give a lot of thoughts on choosing their preferred home. While some people prefers to live in a house, others find flats more accommodating. I am of the opinion that living in a house is more advantageous in relation to staying in an apartment. I will discuss negatives and positives of living in a house in relevance to that in an apartment in this essay. 

Firstly, owning and maintaining a house is relatively expensive, and usually less affordable if anyone wants to have it closer to the city, whereas flats are comparatively cheaper. For example, purchasing a land near the city is often expensive, and in addition to this there is a huge building cost while the purchasing and building cost divides among a number of tenants. Besides this, there is greater risk of security lies in houses. This is because in apartments motilities of outsiders is constantly monitored, and residents mostly have greater control on whom to let in, and on the other hand anyone can easily forcibly enter into in a house.

However, houses offer more openness, freedom and fresh air as these usually have a front lawn where residents can enjoy warm mornings and evenings. In contrast, apartments are usually closed or have small balconies, and thus people tend to feel secluded in them. Moreover, houses are usually more customizable as they are often build on the request of the owner, and also can be easily rebuilt. This provides residents more maneuverability to design and rebuild their house as they want.

In conclusion, although apartments are often cheaper and more secured as compared to houses, I feel living in a house is more beneficial as they offer more openness, freedom and comfortable mornings and evenings, and are easier to redesign and rebuild."

###
completion:
Bạn đã sử dụng một loạt từ vựng phong phú và phù hợp với chủ đề của đề bài. Dưới đây là những từ vựng bạn đã sử dụng:

- Preferred home, accommodating: Đây là những từ vựng tốt được sử dụng trong câu giới thiệu chủ đề.
- Advantages, disadvantages, negatives, positives: Những từ này đều rất phù hợp để giải thích ưu và nhược điểm của việc sống trong nhà và căn hộ.
- Relatively expensive, less affordable, purchasing, building cost, tenants: Các từ này rất phù hợp để so sánh giá cả của việc sở hữu và duy trì một ngôi nhà và căn hộ.
- Risk of security, mobility, monitored, residents, forcibly enter: Các từ này diễn tả rất tốt về an ninh và tính an toàn của người sống trong căn hộ và nhà.
- Openness, freedom, fresh air, front lawn, secluded, customizable, design, rebuild: Các từ này đem lại những thông tin chi tiết và trực quan về những ưu điểm của việc sống trong một ngôi nhà.

Tuy nhiên, có một số lỗi sai chính tả và sử dụng từ vựng không chính xác trong bài viết của bạn, ví dụ như sau:

- "motilities of outsiders" nên là "mobility of outsiders" hoặc "accessibility of outsiders".
- "maneuverability" có thể được thay bằng "flexibility" hoặc "versatility".
- "rebuild" nên là "restructure" hoặc "renovate".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"In spite of the advances made in agriculture, many people around the world still go hungry. Why is this the case? What can be done about this problem?"
Essay:
"Nowadays, in agricultural sector, they have made a great advancement but many people around the world still go hungry. This essay will shed some light on the causes and what solutions can be developed to remove this problem.

First of all, the government is not paying attention to agricultural sector. They ponder that it is not important for them. In spite of having many technologies which can make more harvest, the regime is not using it. May be, they are making low budget on agricultural department. That's why it takes more time to grow rice or any other food. Moreover, the farmers are not getting enough price for their hard-work. And because of that they are unable to use the technology of agriculture. So, the price of food getting higher. One good illustration is that Bangladesh is a country where poor people go hungry. Because in Bangladesh, the price of food is very high and they don't have sufficient money to buy food.

To solve this problem, the administration should give more effort for the development of agricultural sector. They should increase the number of technology which can make good crops in short time. At the same time, the government should give enough money to the farmers so that they can produce more crops. the price of food should be low so that every people can buy food for their living. Then there will be no people who will go hungry for a single day.

To sum up, it is essential to give more importance on agriculture because without food no individual can live in this world. It will be impossible for mankind to prevent extinction without food."

###
completion:
Tổng quan về Lexical Resource trong bài viết của bạn là tương đối tốt. Bạn đã sử dụng một số từ vựng chuyên ngành đúng và phù hợp với chủ đề của bài viết. Tuy nhiên, còn một số lỗi và điểm chưa tốt trong việc sử dụng từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn.

1. Từ "regime": 
Bạn đã sử dụng từ "regime" để diễn tả chính phủ. Tuy nhiên, từ này không phù hợp với văn phong học thuật. Thay vì sử dụng "regime", bạn có thể sử dụng công quyền, chính quyền hoặc chính phủ để phù hợp hơn.

2. Từ "illustration":
Bạn đã sử dụng từ "illustration" để chỉ minh họa. Tuy nhiên, từ này không phù hợp với cách sử dụng trong văn phong học thuật. Bạn có thể sử dụng "example" thay vì "illustration" để phù hợp hơn.

3. Từ "administration": 
Bạn đã sử dụng từ "administration" để diễn tả chính phủ. Tuy nhiên, từ này có thể được hiểu theo nhiều cách khác nhau và không chính xác trong ngữ cảnh ở đây. Thay vì sử dụng "administration", bạn có thể sử dụng "government" hoặc "authorities" để phù hợp hơn.

4. Sự sử dụng từ vựng chuyên ngành: 
Bạn đã sử dụng một số từ vựng chuyên ngành như "agricultural sector", "harvest", "crops",... Tuy nhiên, bạn có thể nâng cao sức mạnh của từ vựng của mình bằng cách sử dụng các từ vựng phù hợp hơn về mặt nghĩa và mang tính thuyết phục như "food production", "yield", "food security",...

5. Sự lặp lại từ: 
Trong bài viết của bạn, có một số từ được sử dụng quá nhiều như "agriculture", "government", "food". Điều này có thể làm cho bài viết của bạn trở nên đơn điệu và khó để đọc. Bạn có thể sử dụng các từ đồng nghĩa hoặc viết theo cách khác để tránh sự lặp lại trong bài viết của mình.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people say History is one of the most important school subjects. Other people think that, in today’s world, subjects like Science and Technology are more important than History. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion"
Essay:
"Technology is flourishing by leaps and bounds and provide us avenues whilst making our lives easy and comfortable. Therefore, many people tend to believe that academic subject Science and Technology must be given too-notch position rather than history because the past doesn't hold any implication in today life. I partially agree with this notion and acknowledge that both subjects are equally critical. In this essay, I will throw some light on the significance of both subjects. 

To embark on, on the one side of the coin, technology is ubiquitous in all walks of life. For example, multiple appliances we use in our day to day life such as the washing machine to wash clothes, the bulb for light, the electricity for operating them all are inventions of science. Even during the pandemic, scientist do research to develop an antidote which saves the lives of the huge diaspora of population. Moreover, this trend will keep on thriving in the long run, so career prospects in this field are much brighter than other. So, people insist on giving more focus on this subject than any other.

On the other side of the coin, the knowledge of our roots, culture and past is equally important for the betterment of mankind. The learnings from past events or wars prevent us from repeating the mistakes that our ancestors have committed. For example, the genocide led to the mass destruction of the population during World war 2 educates us that everybody's life is important and we should respect each other irrespective of caste, creed, sex and religion. These are the true values and learnings of the life which are required to maintain harmony and peace.

To conclude, I recapitulate that all the academic subjects have their greatness as science makes our life easy and history for required to generate a sense of compassion. So, it should be left up to the student which subject he wants to opt as per his area of interest."

###
completion:
Về mặt nguồn từ vựng của bạn, bài viết của bạn sử dụng các từ tốt, mang tính chính xác và hợp lý, để miêu tả các ý tưởng và quan điểm của mình. Tuy nhiên, vẫn còn một số cụm từ cần được sửa đổi để tránh lặp từ và tăng tính đa dạng về từ vựng.

Ví dụ, trong đoạn văn sau:
"To embark on, on the one side of the coin, technology is ubiquitous in all walks of life. For example, multiple appliances we use in our day to day life such as the washing machine to wash clothes, the bulb for light, the electricity for operating them all are inventions of science."

- "To embark on" không phù hợp với ngữ cảnh, thay bằng "To begin with" để bắt đầu đoạn văn.
- "Ubiquitous" mang nghĩa toàn diện hoặc phổ biến quá rộng, sử dụng từ "widespread" hoặc "pervasive" thích hợp hơn.
- "Inventions of science" không sai, nhưng có thể thay thế thành "scientific inventions" để tăng tính đa dạng từ vựng.

Một lỗi khác trong sử dụng từ vựng, đó là sử dụng các từ không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh. Ví dụ, trong câu sau:

"Technology is ubiquitous in all walks of life. [...] Even during the pandemic, scientist do research to develop an antidote which saves the lives of the huge diaspora of population."

- "Diaspora" không phù hợp vì nó mang nghĩa dân tộc di cư, trong khi ở đây cần từ "population" để chỉ đại diện cho những người dân sống trong tình huống đại dịch COVID-19.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people think that all university students should study what are they like. Others believe that they should only be allowed to study subjects that will be useful in the future, such as those related to science and technology, discuss both these views and give your opinion"
Essay:
"University education system is one of the widened  topics discussed by many people during these days.Most of them advocate that students are allowed to choose their favorite subjects, but others oppose that they should follow a specific career path which related to science and technology. In my opinion, I strongly agree with the first one which provides the children to select their interesting topics, which also help them to achieve their goal. 

First of all, students should have the freedom to study their interesting subjects, which can be easier for them to learn  and complete their courses. Moreover, each individual is unique, just like their ambitious and goals. Considering the fact that if they are not following this, they may be unable to fulfill their dreams which also lead them to drop their studies in between. This may create a dilemma, within the them as they might feel that they are worthless. Moreover, each and every subject has its own values and benefits, despite whether it is science, maths or management, etc. There is no doubt that a nation need everyone to do their role in different sectors like doctors, nurses, engineers, trainees. etc for the development  of the economy. 

Subsequently, the opponent suggests that it is wise to to learn science or technology as this is the fastest growing profession which also provide more job opportunities once they finish the university program. Additionally they might get good salary, reputation and rock nation within the industry and society as well. This may lead them to improve their standard of living, as well as the nation's.

 To conclude, even though there. There are many merits and demerits in both of the points, it is crucial to support students own desires, and what they want to achieve instead of injecting others opinion and wishes, which can which which can ruin their future."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, tổng thể sử dụng từ vựng đa dạng và phong phú. Dưới đây là những ý kiến chi tiết hơn về việc sử dụng từ vựng của bạn:

- Widened: Một từ khá hơi biểu cảm, có thể thay thế bằng từ phổ biến hơn như "popular" hoặc "widely-discussed".
- Advocate: Từ phúc âm trong và cần sử dụng đúng ngữ cảnh, trong trường hợp này, nó có thể được thay thế bằng "support" hoặc "endorse".
- Unique: Từ này được sử dụng đúng ngữ cảnh, nhưng trong trường hợp này, có thể thay thế thành "individual".
- Dilemma: Từ này có thể hơi nặng trong ngữ cảnh này, "problem" hoặc "issue" có thể là các từ tốt hơn để sử dụng.
- Sector: Từ này có thể được sử dụng thay cho "industry" hoặc "fields".
- Subsequently: Trong bài viết của bạn, từ này không được sử dụng chính xác trong văn cảnh. Nó có thể được thay bằng "in addition" hoặc "furthermore".
- Standard of living: Từ này đã được sử dụng chính xác trong văn cảnh.
- Rock nation: Từ này có thể gây hiểu nhầm, bạn có thể thay bằng "become successful" hoặc "achieve fame".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Overpopulation in many major urban centers around the world is a major problem. What are the causes of this? How can this problem be solved?"
Essay:
"In the modern world, there is a rising concern about crowded and overfilled large cities. It is essential to address this issue, otherwise, it may lead to negative consequences such as the deficit of provision and accommodation. This essay will outline the reasons for this problem and propose possible solutions. 

Perhaps overpopulation in megalopolises is caused by numerous opportunities there and poverty. It is not a secret that it is more likely to get a well-paid job in a big city where large corporations are located, and there is a bigger offer of leisure time activities such as museums, cinemas, parks and shopping malls. For this reason, many people prefer to move to major cities promoting overpopulation. What's more, some of these people are not so wealthy in order to control the birth rate. Consequently,  significant growth in population can occur in  poor areas.  

However, this problem can be solved by receiving support from the authorities. Firstly, the government should introduce  restrictions on the maximum number of children per family. It would establish a balance between the increase and decline in the number of people and hold this number at a constant level. Furthermore, the governing bodies could suggest  assistance in providing free contraception. This action might prevent unwanted birth among people being not able to afford it.  

To sum up, the excessive population in large urban centres is a serious problem caused by city attractions and shortage of contraceptives among people. I recommend that governments solve this issue by proposing special birth policies and contribute to cheap and safe ways of birth prevention."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn sử dụng các từ vựng phù hợp với đề bài và khá đa dạng, nhưng cần một số điểm cải thiện như sau:

- Có một số lỗi chính tả như "megalopolises" nên được đổi thành "mega-cities" để tránh sử dụng từ hiếm.
- "Provision and accommodation" nên được thay thế vì chúng không liên quan trực tiếp đến vấn đề đề cập trong đề bài. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng các từ như "resources" hoặc "housing".
- Trong câu "It is not a secret that it is more likely to get a well-paid job in a big city where large corporations are located", từ "it" nhắm đến ý "điều đó" có thể gây khó hiểu cho người đọc. Bạn nên sử dụng lại từ "this" để cho câu văn dễ hiểu hơn.

Ngoài ra, để tăng tính đa dạng và phong phú cho Lexical Resource, bạn có thể sử dụng những từ vựng khác có ý nghĩa tương tự, ví dụ:

- Overfilled: overcrowded, saturated, congested
- Major cities: metropolitan, urban, bustling
- Opportunities: prospects, potential, chances
- Poverty: deprivation, destitution, penury
- Contraception: birth control, family planning, reproductive health
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Is freedom of speech necessary in a free society? Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience."
Essay:
"Nowadays, people prefer a society where they can express themselves openly, which helps to build a better nation in many ways. In this essay, we will look at the reasons which support the statement. 

Firstly, it is always necessary to maintain fairness for everyone in the country. Most of the time we listen to the government on the way they are improving the country. At times, the ideas given by elected personnel will not blend well with the public. This is where society needs to have an avenue on providing their thoughts. In addition, this will help to build equality, where everyone contributes to the betterment of a nation. For instance, in my state, a major government initiative often gets pointed out by netizens on social media, which at times is seen to be logical and will be good if the ideas are implemented. 

Secondly, the public will have the freedom to point on the wrongdoings of individuals including officials without fear of being criminalized. This further helps to create a better society to live in where people will blend in well with authorities such as the police. In addition, government officials will tend to perform their duties better as they can be called out by the public for their mistakes. For instance, in my country, the police department gets frequent feedback from the public on the way they treat criminals, which helps them to implement better policies. Nevertheless, individuals who openly speaks on current issues can be identified as future leaders of the nation, where they will have an understanding of society and strategies towards the betterment of it. 

In conclusion, a nation should allow its citizens to speak freely on issues related to the country and accept the criticism so that it will provide benefits that will help to build a better community. This allows the people of the nation to live peacefully where equal treatment is given for all."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, bạn đã sử dụng nhiều từ vựng đa dạng và chính xác để truyền tải ý tưởng của mình về chủ đề. Bạn đã sử dụng các từ vựng chính xác như "freedom of speech", "equality", "wrongdoings", "criminalized", "initiative",... để mô tả những ý tưởng của mình.

Tuy nhiên, trong vài trường hợp, bạn đã sử dụng từ không chính xác hoặc không phù hợp. Ví dụ, trong câu "This allows the people of the nation to live peacefully where equal treatment is given for all", từ "peacefully" không được sử dụng chính xác với ý nghĩa của câu. Nếu bạn muốn truyền tải ý "sống trong hòa bình", bạn có thể sử dụng từ "harmoniously" hoặc "cohesively" thay thế.

Một vài lỗi sai chính tả như "no" nên là "not" trong câu "At times, the ideas given by elected personnel will not blend well with the public." Ngoài ra, trong câu "Nevertheless, individuals who openly speaks on current issues can be identified as future leaders of the nation", từ "speaks" nên là "speak" để phù hợp với chủ ngữ.

Ngoài ra, "blend well" và "blend in" cả hai đều là các thành ngữ chứ không phải từ đồng nghĩa, do vậy bạn cần sửa lại để tránh nhầm lẫn. Bạn cũng có thể sử dụng các từ vựng liên quan đến chủ đề một cách linh hoạt hơn để biểu đạt ý tưởng của mình nhiều hơn. Ví dụ, thay vì sử dụng từ "betterment" nhiều lần, bạn có thể dùng các từ như "improvement", "progress", "advancement" để làm nội dung bài viết của bạn phong phú hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"People in many countries are spending less time with their family. What are the reasons, and effects of this?"
Essay:
"These days it is becoming common for each person to spend much less time with their household, compared with the past. This is happening due to some reasons ranging from addiction to technology to overworking. This essay will focus on the situation and provide the consequences caused by this.
First of all, the main cause of this, in my perspective, is overworking. Because the majority of people work more hours at their workplace, they have a very little amount of time to be together with their family members. The second reason of this is the fact that most people nowadays are addicted to social media. They are spending much of their time sitting in front of notebook or chatting online, which wastes their precious time.
Regarding the effects, the situation is resulting in lack of time of people to hang out with their relatives, which is especially essential for children. This could lead youngsters to feel separateness from family, and might influence badly on their upbringing. The second cause is that they might be less social as a result of getting obsessed with work. If they are overworked constantly, they might become isolated from people.
In conclusion, the main reason of being less with family is working too much and social media. There are two possible effects of this, including lack of time of humans and lack of sociality."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, các từ vựng được sử dụng phù hợp với đề bài. Tuy nhiên, có một số lỗi nhỏ về từ vựng, gồm:

1. "addiction to technology" - thay vì sử dụng cụm từ này, có thể sử dụng "overreliance on technology" hoặc "dependence on technology".

2. "sit in front of notebook" - thay vì sử dụng "notebook", có thể sử dụng "computer" hoặc "laptop".

3. "wastes their precious time" - thay vì sử dụng "wastes", có thể sử dụng "consumes" hoặc "takes up".

4. "separateness" - thay vì sử dụng từ này, có thể sử dụng "isolation" hoặc "detachment".

Những lỗi nhỏ này không ảnh hưởng quá nhiều đến ý nghĩa tổng thể của bài viết của bạn, tuy nhiên, để đạt được điểm cao hơn, bạn nên sử dụng các từ vựng phù hợp và chính xác hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Music is played in every society and culture in the world today. Some people think that music brings only benefits to individuals and societies. Others, however, think that music can have a negative influence on both. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion."
Essay:
"Music has played a pivotal role throughout our history. However, there are mixed opinions about its significance, as many believe it to be a boon for humankind, while others consider it as a curse. In this essay, I will discuss both viewpoints and give my personal opinion on the subject matter. Firstly, I will explain how music has helped in transformation of our society and secondly, I will write down the negative influences of the same. 

As the saying goes, "Music is universal, as it transcends all the cultural and linguistic barriers". Hence, music has played a significant role in the unification of the world. Historically, it has influenced and ignited major revolutions and had been a catalyst for almost every social reforms. For example, during the Indian independence movement, the songs penned down by revolutionaries such as Bhagat Singh and Ram Prasad Bismil, had a long-lasting impact on the youth irrespective of their cultural belonging, eventually contributing to fire-up the overall cause and saving the nation from the hands of tyranny. In addition to that, music is an essential part of medical science. It is used as a relaxation medium in therapy and, also during the treatment of multiple psychological illness such as Alzheimers, anxiety, panic attacks etc. 

On the other hand, there are many negative impacts of music largely due to the success and fame it brings to the artists. Musical talents enjoy immense popularity and lead a luxurious lifestyle, often engaging in anti-social activities such as drug use and alchoholism. As a result of this, the large followers gained by these artists, also dream of a similar way of living like their ideals, resulting in a counter-culture attitude among the youth. This can be easily seen from the activities that took place in the 1960s in USA as a response to the Vietnam war and Civil rights movement. Musicians largely engaged in drugs and alchohol, inspired a generation of youth to lead a care-free lifestyle, eventually resulting in vandalism and damage to public properties. 

In conclusion, there may be many negative influences of music and it's use. However, in my opinion, the positives outweigh the negatives and music should be promoted worldwide."

###
completion:
Các từ vựng của bạn trong bài viết là rất phong phú và đa dạng. Bạn đã sử dụng nhiều từ vựng chuyên ngành như "catalyst", "anti-social activities", hay "Alzheimers" để mô tả một số khía cạnh của âm nhạc. Từ vựng của bạn cũng rất linh hoạt, bạn đã thay thế các từ và cụm từ để tránh lặp lại và tăng tính giải trí của bài viết của bạn.

Tuy nhiên, còn một số lỗi sai về sử dụng từ vựng có thể được cải thiện trong bài viết của bạn. Ví dụ, trong đoạn thứ hai, từ "unification" không hoàn toàn phù hợp trong bối cảnh của nó. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng từ "harmonization" hoặc "integration". Trong đoạn tiếp theo, bạn sử dụng từ "alcoholism", một từ không chính xác để mô tả việc uống rượu quá đà. Từ "alcohol abuse" sẽ phù hợp hơn. Cuối cùng, trong đoạn kết luận, bạn sử dụng thuật ngữ "counter-culture attitude" với khái niệm không phản ánh chính xác bối cảnh của bài viết. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng từ "rebellion" để thể hiện ý nghĩa của mình một cách chính xác.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"An increasing number of professionals such as doctors and  teachers are leaving their own poorer countries to work in developed countries. What problem does this cause? What can be done to deal with this situation?"
Essay:
"Nowadays, the job scale in the developing countries is decreasing progressively. However, the economic growth of the rapidly growing countries is increasing by increased number of migrations of the professionals from the backward world countries. Following essay will look at the core reasons and propose some solid solutions.
One of the main causes of the complication is the lack of practical task in education systems. Their course is not updated. This would result in the difference between the academic life and performance of the students. For example, environmental engineers are required to develop the new models for minimizing waste. The course at their universities is theoretically based. And when they start their jobs, they enable to use the knowledge in the execution of the model. The solution is that the educational institutions should upgrade their course according to market demand.
Another trouble is that the doctors and teachers are highly paid in the developed countries. It can be said that job opportunities in the countries like Pakistan are fewer. Contrarily, there are many ways of growth in the countries like US and Australia. To tackle such issue, the Board of Directors must come to the front line and take steps to revise the salaries of the specialists in order to reduce relocation from their countries.
A third cause of the problem is the work hours. The jobs in the poor countries are nine to five per day. This would end up in minimum socializing, and it is hard for the people to find time even for themselves. In contrast, job timing is specified by the Administration, in Europe. They are allowed to carry out their profession in 6 to 7 hours a day. The issue is only resolved if Management allocates special timings for all types of labour.
To sum up, migration of the skilled workers will lead to skill shortage and poorer economic growth due to lack of product placements after graduation. That is a serious dilemma, and unless Government launches new schemes for employments with a handsome pay."

###
completion:
Lexical Resource là một trong những tiêu chí đánh giá quan trọng trong việc đánh giá bài viết IELTS. Kiến thức vốn từ cũng như sử dụng từ vựng đúng cách có thể giúp bạn thể hiện được những ý tưởng phong phú và sâu sắc hơn. Dưới đây là những chi tiết đánh giá về Lexical Resource trong bài viết của bạn:

1. Variety of vocabulary: 
- Bạn cần sử dụng nhiều từ vựng khác nhau để tránh lặp lại với các từ đã sử dụng trước đó. 
- Ví dụ, hãy sử dụng từ "professionals" đến 5 lần trong toàn bài viết, trong khi đó có nhiều từ khác để miêu tả sự nghiệp như "experts", "specialists", "skilled workers" và "labour force". 
- Ngoài ra, bạn cũng có thể tìm kiếm các từ đồng nghĩa để tránh sử dụng quá nhiều từ cụ thể. Ví dụ, thay vì sử dụng "environmental engineers", bạn có thể sử dụng "environmental experts" hoặc "environmental specialists".

2. Word choice: 
- Bạn cần sử dụng các từ và cụm từ đúng cách để mang lại ý nghĩa chính xác cho người đọc. 
- Ví dụ, trong đoạn "their course is not updated", từ "course" không được sử dụng đúng cách. Thay vào đó, hãy sử dụng "curriculum" hoặc "program" để mô tả nội dung đào tạo của trường học.

3. Word form:
- Bạn nên sử dụng các dạng từ phù hợp để tránh sử dụng quá nhiều từ giống nhau và phong phú hơn. 
- Ví dụ, trong câu "Contrarily, there are many ways of growth in the countries", từ "growth" nên được thay thế bằng "opportunities for growth" để tránh lặp lại danh từ "way".

4. Word collocation: 
- Từ collocation là một cách mà các từ được kết hợp để tạo thành một ý nghĩa riêng. Sử dụng các collocation không đúng có thể gây mất ý nghĩa của câu. 
- Ví dụ, trong câu "it is hard for the people to find time even for themselves", thay vì sử dụng "find time for even themselves", bạn nên sử dụng "find time for themselves" để tránh sử dụng các từ đứng lẻ tẻ không tạo nên một collocation tự nhiên.

Tổng quan, để cải thiện Lexical Resource trong bài viết của bạn, bạn cần sử dụng những từ và cụm từ đúng cách, sử dụng nhiều từ vựng khác nhau và sử dụng các collocation hợp lý.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people support the idea of imposing taxes on fossil fuels (oil, coal and gas) in order to reduce energy consumption. Others disagree with this approach. Consider the debate and its arguments, and come to your own conclusion."
Essay:
"Most people agree that the use of fossil fuels should be reduced to some extent. However, imposing taxes is a controversial tactic which appears to have a number of contradictory effects. We will consider bothsides of the discussion in this essay.
On the one hand, those who support taxation of fossil fuels promote the idea that higher prices will lead to lower consumption and thus lower emissions. They point to evidence from countries such as Sweden where this appears to be the case, and urge other nations to follow suit. Furthermore, proponents of fuel taxes claim that the funds raised can then be used to subsidise renewable energy projects such as solar and localised biofuel reactors. To the supporters of the idea, these benefits are convincing.
However, opponents of fuel tax are able to cite evidence from other countries (including France and Italy) where higher tax has apparently not reduced demand for such fuels. In these cases, the effect has been to force people to pay more for the same volume of energy, which appears to penalise those who can least afford it. Moreover, critics of fuel tax also highlight the difficulty in governments promising renewable schemes without interfering in the entire energy market. If the state was to control the entire market for fuels, they say, this would force suppliers to leave the market, thus reducing competition and efficiency. This argument also appears to be quite powerful.
Overall, I would tend to side with the opponents of fuel taxation. It seems to be unreasonable to force vulnerable consumers to pay more for a commodity which is essential to them, without a real infrastructure for renewable energy being in place. It would be more logical to improve availability of renewables first, which would allow consumers to make a genuine choice."

###
completion:
Từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn là đa dạng và có ý nghĩa phù hợp với chủ đề. Tuy nhiên, có một vài sai sót trong sử dụng từ vựng và các cách diễn đạt.

Một số lỗi sai của bạn:

1. Trong đoạn thứ nhất, bạn sử dụng từ "contradictory" để miêu tả những tác động của việc đánh thuế nhiên liệu hoá thạch. Từ này không phù hợp trong trường hợp này, bởi vì việc đánh thuế không có tác động trái ngược gì đến mục tiêu giảm tiêu thụ năng lượng.

2. Trong đoạn thứ hai, bạn sử dụng từ "promote" để miêu tả những người ủng hộ việc đánh thuế nhiên liệu. Từ này không phù hợp vì người ủng hộ không "quảng cáo" việc đánh thuế, mà thay vào đó, họ tin rằng việc đánh thuế là giải pháp hữu hiệu để giảm tiêu thụ năng lượng.

3. Ở đoạn thứ hai, bạn sử dụng từ "penalise" để miêu tả những người sử dụng nhiên liệu hoá thạch. Từ này thiếu tính khách quan và có xu hướng theo quan điểm của các nhà hoạt động chống đánh thuế, thay vì trung tính hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Today, most people get married and give birth in their thirties rather than when they are younger.Is it a positive or negative development in your opinion? To what extent do you support this development?"
Essay:
"Nowadays, the majority of individuals marry and have babies in their thirties than at a younger age. This is a positive development as it allows the couples to develop a strong career and be financially stable. However, because of the concerns of an increasing number of infertility issues, I completely disagree with this development. 
Firstly, late marriage is beneficial to the individuals in many ways. One of the prominent benefits of the same is the ability to develop their career paths. Before marriage, people are generally free to explore different careers and because of having plenty of time, they can decide better about the career that they can pursue during the rest of their life. Secondly, late marriage allows an individual to be financially stable and abide by the responsibilities conferred by marriage more carefully. Marriage brings in new responsibilities and requires money for the fulfilment of those responsibilities. For instance, in a recent study by 'The Times",  it has now been proven that people, who are married after their thirties,  are better able to fulfil their responsibilities both financially and mentally. Thus we can say that late marriages are better than earlier ones.
On the other hand,  late marriages are proven harmful to the women. With the passage of time, the reproductive power of the women decreases. In a research by WHO, for instance, it has now been proven that the chances of a woman getting pregnant almost halves after attaining the age of thirty. Then what is the benefit of getting married if they cannot have children?  This becomes a cause for disturbance in the family and sometimes leads to serious consequences of divorce.
In conclusion, white, late marriages offer benefits of career and financial stability, due to the issue of infertility, I disagree with this development."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, từ vựng được sử dụng khá đa dạng và phù hợp với chủ đề. Tuy nhiên, một số từ vựng trong bài viết không hoàn toàn chính xác hoặc có thể được thay thế bằng các từ vựng khác cho phù hợp hơn.

1. "before marriage, people are generally free to explore different careers and because of having plenty of time, they can decide better about the career that they can pursue during the rest of their life." 
Thay vì sử dụng "decide better", bạn có thể dùng "make a more informed decision" để tăng tính chính xác và độ phong phú của từ vựng.

2. "better able to fulfill their responsibilities both financially and mentally." 
Thay vì sử dụng "better able", bạn có thể dùng "more capable" hoặc "better equipped" để sử dụng từ vựng phù hợp hơn.

3. "late marriages offer benefits of career and financial stability" 
Thay vì sử dụng "benefits of", bạn có thể dùng "advantages in terms of" để mô tả rõ hơn về những lợi ích.

4. "With the passage of time, the reproductive power of the women decreases." 
Thay vì sử dụng "reproductive power", bạn có thể dùng "fertility" để tăng tính chuyên ngành và độ chính xác trong từ vựng.

Việc cải thiện đa dạng và sử dụng từ vựng chính xác sẽ giúp cho bài viết của bạn được đánh giá cao hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"government should spend more on railways than on roads
To what extent do you agree or disagree?"
Essay:
"To overcome the problems related to railways, it is suggested that the Government should allocate more budget for developing better rail tracks compared to roads and I completely agree with this idea for two main reasons.

I believe that investing more in  the railways would be  beneficial in several ways. Firstly, travelling by train is much safer, less time consuming, cheaper and overall environment friendly. For example, my country India, having huge a population of poor and middle class people , and massive traffic congestion problems, highly rely on its  railway transport system to facilitate its dwellers. Every day, millions of daily commuters use this expended mode  for commuting. On the other hand , if the same proportion of people had travelled through roads , governments would  need approximately  five times wider roads.

Secondly, in developing countries like India , where railways are entirely government undertaking, spending higher in this sector will not only generate more revenue, but also helps the state to facility very large number of people. Lastly, the cost of developing railway tracks is quite high, and this is even higher for making special tracks for bullet trains. These tracks help in making rail travelling safer, faster and reliable.However, overlooking them   could be a big hindrance in developing an efficient railway transport system.  

To conclude, I believe that investing higher does not mean that governments are going to neglect the progress of roads.  Keeping in view the aforesaid  benefits  , I believe that government should assign the higher amount of  funds for developing rails compared roads"

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, bạn đã sử dụng một số từ vựng thông thường và các cụm từ đặc thù rất tốt để trình bày quan điểm của mình về một chủ đề phức tạp. Tuy nhiên, vẫn còn một vài vấn đề cần chú ý về việc sử dụng từ vựng và cấu trúc câu. 

Một lỗi chính tả nhỏ xuất hiện trong câu "...for developing better rail tracks compared to roads and I completely agree with this idea for two main reasons." Nên correct: "developing better railway tracks".

Bạn sử dụng từ "reliability" trong câu "These tracks help in making rail traveling safer, faster and reliable." Tuy nhiên, "reliability" thường được sử dụng để miêu tả tính ổn định, chứ không phải tốc độ hoặc an toàn. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng từ "efficient" để miêu tả sự tiên tiến và hiệu quả của hệ thống vận chuyển đường sắt.

Trong câu "Every day, millions of daily commuters use this expended mode for commuting", nên đổi từ "expended" thành "extended" để sử dụng đúng với ngữ cảnh câu.

Bạn có thể sử dụng thêm một số từ vựng mới như "infrastructure", "mobility", "transportation", "fleet",... để tránh sự lặp lại và nâng cao sức thu hút cho người đọc.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Computers are often argued to be the most important invention of the last hundred years. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement? Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience."
Essay:
"It is believed. that computers are The most significant invention of the centennial. I disagree to a great extent because there are many other innovations which have changed the way of living a lot but I also believe that it is a well-needed development as well. Both situations will be explained in the upcoming paragraphs

To start with, technology has changed the of living a lot in the last hundred years and surprised us with new inventions. Mobile phones are a necessity in today's world because people use them For various purposes. Mobile phones are not only used to communicate with friends and relatives but also used for entertainment and day-to-day activities. for example, traveling becomes so much easier than past because of google maps. Moreover, Drones have taken the place of Cameras which is also a big invention in the field of technology. They have reduces the struggle and work of cameramen and enhances the quality of pictures and videos recorded. Another worth considering innovation of the last century is in the field of motor vehicles. Electric vehicles are replacing fuel-used cars and motorbikes which result in a more sustainable environment and advancement in individual's life.

On the other hand, computers are also a significant invention and they are still in use in their updated form like laptops and monitors. They have their importance which is irreplaceable by other electronics. For instance, people cannot use mobile phones in their offices in place of computers. Hence, computers are one of the major advancements of the last hundred years.

To conclude, I believe computers play an important role in today's era and are considered a necessary innovation but we cannot ignore other major technological advancements in other industries."

###
completion:
Từ vựng của bạn tỏ ra không đa dạng và chưa được sử dụng một cách chính xác trong bài viết. Dưới đây là một số lỗi và cách để khắc phục chúng:

1. "centennial" - từ này không đúng, nên sử dụng "century" thay thế.
2. "Mobile phones are a necessity in today's world" - Thay vì "necessity", bạn có thể sử dụng "essential" hoặc "indispensable". 
3. "Mobile phones are not only used to communicate with friends and relatives" -  Thay vì "not only", bạn có thể sử dụng "also" để làm cho câu trở nên rõ ràng và chính xác hơn. 
4. "For example, traveling becomes so much easier than past" - Câu này không được thể hiện đúng ý của bạn. Bạn nên viết lại thành "For example, mobile applications such as Google Maps have made travelling a lot easier compared to the past". 
5. "Cameras which is also a big invention" - Đây là lỗi sai về chủ ngữ và động từ. Đúng là "Cameras, which are also significant inventions".
6. "They have reduces the struggle and work of cameramen" - Đây là lỗi chia động từ. Đúng là "They have reduced the struggles and workload of cameramen".
7. "Another worth considering innovation" - Thay vì "worth considering", bạn có thể sử dụng "notable" hoặc "significant".
8. "in the field of motor vehicles" - Thay vì "motor vehicles", bạn có thể sử dụng "automobiles" hoặc "cars".
9. "Electric vehicles are replacing fuel-used cars" - Đây là lỗi ngữ pháp. Đúng là "Electric vehicles are replacing cars and motorcycles that use fuel".
10. "which result in a more sustainable environment and advancement in individual's life." - Câu này không rõ ràng và có lỗi cú pháp. Viết lại thành "This has resulted in a more sustainable environment and an improvement in people’s lives"
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Most employees do job interviews before offering position to a person. Do you think this is the best way to do it or are there better alternatives? What is the best method of choosing employer in your opinion?"
Essay:
"Today, many people have to go through interviews in order to get selected for a position. In my opinion, I strongly agree with this method of appointing employees, as this gives the leverage to employers to choose the best candidates and also, job seekers get to know better about his/her employer during the whole interview process.

To commence with, many organisations today have a thorough selection process in order to find the best out of all that suits their requirements. The job interview is one of the steps that is included in this process and it plays an important role to examine the candidate's efficiency. To cite an example, for many software engineers, Google is one of their dream companies, and to get selected, some might have to take 6 to 8 rounds for a senior role. This method has proven successful in finding the best gems and that is the reason, Google is one of the most advanced and highly used search engines.

Furthermore, getting selected via interviews is a transparent method of getting a job. There were days when people used to get opportunities based on their contacts and references. In addition, job seekers can choose their employers effectively beforehand as they have plenty of resources where they can check about the experiences of past employees and verify organisation ratings. Moreover, during the whole interview process, they will get in contact with senior colleagues which will enable the employees to get to know their employer better.

To sum up, I firmly believe that many companies follow the right process of hiring employees through job interviews. I believe that the aforementioned points are strongly supporting my viewpoints."

###
completion:
Các từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn khá tốt, nhưng vẫn còn một số cơ bản.

- Các từ và thành ngữ chuyên ngành về tuyển dụng được sử dụng tốt nhưng bạn có thể sử dụng thêm một số từ và thành ngữ khác.
- Trong đoạn hai, bạn đã sử dụng từ "efficiency" để miêu tả khả năng của người xin việc trong cuộc phỏng vấn. Tuy nhiên, từ này thường được sử dụng để miêu tả hiệu quả của một quy trình hoặc máy móc. Bạn có thể nên sử dụng từ "competency" thay vì từ "efficiency" ở đây.
- Trong đoạn ba, câu "job seekers can choose their employers effectively beforehand as they have plenty of resources where they can check about the experiences of past employees and verify organisation ratings" có chút lặp từ. Bạn có thể sử dụng một số từ vựng khác để có câu nói tốt hơn

Ví dụ về một số từ và thể loại từ vựng mà bạn có thể sử dụng:

- Synonyms of "interview": assessment, evaluation, selection process, job screening
- Synonyms of "employer": company, organization, corporation
- Thành ngữ và idioms: "fit the bill", "by the skin of one's teeth", "get the green light"
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"People have historically attempted to achieve a perfect society. However, it is difficult to decide what a perfect society would be like. What would be the most important element of an ideal society? What can normal people do to make society more perfect?"
Essay:
"Having a perfect society is mankind’s dream, unfortunately, this is hard to achieve as many different factors should work in an optimal proportion. I personally think that peace is the most essential factor of an ideal world, for these citizens need to follow rules and regulations of society and should develop higher level of tolerance.

Firstly, peacefulness which is extremely essential tool to lead a perfect life. This is because citizens would enjoy their lives its fullest and do not need to fear about getting attacked by others. In other words, crime rates seem to be at a minimum in such areas, for instance, theft, murders, money laundering and so on. Similarly, equality which is not only between different genders, income groups but religions also should be there.

However, maintaining peace in society is not an easy task since it is multifactorial. Firstly, despite social and economical differences members of the community need to accept the system of their country. By following this, there is a less chance to witness any break in the peacefulness of the area. Additionally, rarely do we see criminals, manipulators grow there. Instead, if people argued against the law of the land, the people would experience social unrest and conflicts. To illustrate this, when observing the world happiness index, it shows that countries, where their citizens remain within the constitution, are happier and the places are considered peaceful.

In conclusion, although building a perfect nation or society is seemed to be a utopia, I think if everyone starts following their county’s law and order would bring peace. This is the most significant factor to achieve a perfect society."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn có sử dụng một số từ vựng phù hợp với chủ đề của đề bài, bao gồm các từ như: "perfect society", "peaceful", "tolerance", "crime rates", "equality", "social unrest", "constitution", "happy".

Tuy nhiên, có một số lỗi về sử dụng từ vựng và cách diễn đạt, như:

1. "optimal proportion" - thay vì sử dụng "proportion" ở đây, bạn có thể sử dụng "balance" hoặc "harmony" để diễn tả ý tưởng của mình.

2. "lead a perfect life" - ở đây, bạn có thể sử dụng "live in a perfect society" hoặc "enjoy a perfect society" để diễn đạt ý tưởng của mình rõ ràng hơn.

3. "happy" - ở đoạn kết bài của bạn, bạn sử dụng từ "happy" để diễn tả trạng thái của dân cư. Tuy nhiên, bạn có thể sử dụng từ "content" hoặc "satisfied" để diễn tả ý tưởng của mình đầy đủ hơn.

4. "members of the community" - ở đây, bạn có thể sử dụng "citizens" hoặc "residents" để diễn đạt ý tưởng của mình rõ ràng hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"The threat of nuclear weapons maintains world peace. Nuclear power provides cheap and clean energy.
The benefits of nuclear technology far outweigh the disadvantages.
To what extent do you agree or disagree?"
Essay:
"It has been believed that the fear of the atomic bomb ensures peace around the globe. Nuclear energy has many advantages such as the provision of cheap and Eco-friendly electricity, and this outweighs the disadvantages. I fully agree with this statement.

Nuclear technology presents a vital role to give public protection to all citizens of the world. Moreover, many strong and powerful countries such as the USA, Russia, China, India have made nuclear weapons and utilize this whenever harmful situation happens between countries to save the citizens. For instance, In 1965, China-India war India has utilized a nuclear atom against china to save its people. Furthermore, these nuclear atomic bombs can destroy living creatures such as buildings in a fraction of seconds. To illustrate, In 1945, the United States dropped an atomic bomb over the city of Hiroshima and Nagasaki and killed many people during the attack.

Nuclear power plays a beneficial role in human life and it also is used for producing various energies. It helps to generate cheap and clean energy. Nuclear power plants generate electricity from smaller atoms and releasing energy. For instance, In large cities, Nuclear power plant provides sufficient energy to give electricity. Although, some countries have made water refinement energy plants to provide clean water to its citizens and it helps for living to survive. For example, Russia has made a water refinement energy plant in 1965 for its residents with low-cost money.

To conclude, this essay disagrees with the opinion of nuclear energy is beneficial rather than dangerous because using nuclear energy in the wrong way would be affected both our species and the earth itself."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn sử dụng các từ vựng phù hợp với nội dung của đề bài. Tuy nhiên, một số chỗ sử dụng từ không rõ nghĩa hoặc không phù hợp với cấu trúc câu:

1. "It has been believed that the fear of the atomic bomb ensures peace around the globe." 
Trong câu này, từ "believed" không rõ nghĩa và không phù hợp trong cấu trúc câu. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "argued" hoặc "claimed" để thay thế. 

2. "Moreover, many strong and powerful countries such as the USA, Russia, China, India have made nuclear weapons and utilize this whenever harmful situation happens between countries to save the citizens." 
Trong câu này, từ "utilize" không được sử dụng đúng cách và nên thay bằng từ khác như "deploy" hoặc "use". Ngoài ra, cần sử dụng thì chính xác "used" thay vì "utilize".

3. "For instance, In 1965, China-India war India has utilized a nuclear atom against china to save its people." 
Trong câu này, từ "nuclear atom" không phù hợp trong cấu trúc câu và không rõ nghĩa. Bạn có thể sử dụng "nuclear weapon" để thay thế. Cần sử dụng dấu phẩy sau "war". Ngoài ra, cần sử dụng thì chính xác "used" thay vì "utilized".

4. "Furthermore, these nuclear atomic bombs can destroy living creatures such as buildings in a fraction of seconds." 
Trong câu này, từ "nuclear atomic bombs" là thừa và không phù hợp trong cấu trúc câu. Bạn có thể sử dụng "nuclear bombs" để thay thế.

5. "In 1945, the United States dropped an atomic bomb over the city of Hiroshima and Nagasaki and killed many people during the attack." 
Trong câu này, từ "attack" không phù hợp trong cấu trúc câu. Bạn có thể sử dụng "bombing" để thay thế.

6. "Nuclear power plays a beneficial role in human life and it also is used for producing various energies." 
Trong câu này, từ "beneficial" không phù hợp trong cấu trúc câu. Bạn có thể sử dụng "positive" hoặc "advantageous" để thay thế.

7. "It helps to generate cheap and clean energy. Nuclear power plants generate electricity from smaller atoms and releasing energy." 
Trong câu này, cần sử dụng giới từ "by" sau "atoms" để cấu trúc câu đúng về mặt ngữ pháp: "from smaller atoms by releasing energy".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Companies should provide sports and social facilities for local communities. To what extent do you agree?"
Essay:
"Nowadays recreation, leisure and sports activities play an important role in any societies. Therefore private and public organizations should contribute in promoting sports and social activities by providing infrastructure or by conducting games and public events. In my opinion providing facilities to local societies can have many beneficial effects, so I agree with this point of view.
 On the one hand, sports have a great value for any countries. It is an enjoyable and effective way to improve physical and mental health. In addition, it can relieve stress, increas fitness and prevent the development of chronic disease,   such as heart disaese. Thus, arrangement of sports projects will boost the healthy environment in the society and also become  tthe source of motivation. Furthermore, sports activities not only reduce crime, but also decrease alcohol and drug misuse and anti-social behaviours.
On the other hand, citizens of any countries or any local comunities have their own ancient traditions and forefather culture. Companies should try to help people maintain and remember their traditional values. For example, they can host entertainment programs like cultural dance and art play. It can encourage people to participate in the social activities and enhance their skills. Furthermore, it will maintain the culture between the generations.
In conclusion, the game events and social gathering are very important to community wich create a positive and healthy environment and lead to peaceful. Moreover such events could improve people's skills and flourish their talents."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn đã sử dụng các từ vựng phong phú và ngôn ngữ chuyên ngành tốt. Tuy nhiên, có một số lỗi như sau:

- "recreation, leisure and sports activities" có thể thay thế bằng "recreational, leisure, and sporting activities" để phù hợp hơn với cách sử dụng từ tiếng Anh.

- "It is an enjoyable and effective way to improve physical and mental health." Nên sử dụng "can be" thay cho "is" để biểu thị tính khả thi của việc tăng cường sức khỏe bằng thể thao.

- "Thus, arrangement of sports projects" Nên sử dụng "arrange for" thay vì "arrangement of" hoặc "to arrange sports projects" để làm rõ hơn.

- "Furthermore, sports activities not only reduce crime, but also decrease alcohol and drug misuse and anti-social behaviours." Nếu có thể, bạn nên sử dụng từ "prevent" thay vì "reduce" để chỉ ra tính hiệu quả của quá trình này.

- "citizens of any countries or local comunities" Nên sử dụng từ "communities" (cộng đồng) thay vì "comunities".

- "Companies should try to help people maintain and remember their traditional values." Nên thêm từ "to" trước từ "maintain" để câu trở thành "Companies should try to help people to maintain and remember their traditional values."

- "It can encourage people to participate in the social activities and enhance their skills." Nên sử dụng tính từ "social" thay vì danh từ "social activities", như sau: "It can encourage people to participate in social activities and enhance their skills."

- "In conclusion, the game events and social gathering are very important to community wich create a positive and healthy environment and lead to peaceful." Nên sử dụng từ "which" thay vì "wich" và sử dụng "communities" (cộng đồng) thay vì "community", như sau: "In conclusion, the game events and social gatherings are very important to communities, creating a positive and healthy environment and leading to peace."
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people prefer to spend their lives doing the same things and avoiding change. Others, however, think that the change is always a good thing. Discuss both the views and give your own opinion. Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant example from your knowledge or experience."
Essay:
"People are different from each other in many ways. One such difference is the way of spending life. While some people like to spend their life doing one job or similar routine, others prefer changes in their lives. In my opinion a continuous change in life is the way to live. In the following essay we will discuss both views.
A famous saying is “never drink from stagnant river”. Firstly, some people get bored of same routine. They need change that can either be in job or daily routine. This helps them to take their mind off certain things and explore better options for themselves. For example it is a common trend among Irish people to seek for jobs overseas. This helps them in learning the life better and find better opportunities for themselves. Secondly, some people resort to travelling and living abroad for extended periods of time. Their idea is to take a time off from the same routine and spend some time in foreign culture and understanding different ways of life. For instance many government servants take time off after retirement to travel and enjoy their lives.
On the other hand, some people prefer to follow a strict routine. This is their way of life which has discipline. Such people are generally more career focused and cannot take the risk of discontinuity. For example, If we glance at lives of Buddha monks, their way of life is everything to them. Following strict routines help them to be strong. Similarly many sportsperson follow same routine of working certain hours of the day and focusing on health in the rest of time. Hence the choice depends on individuals thinking.
In conclusion, both views have their own advantages and disadvantages, but most of it depends on personal choices and preferences. In my opinion traveling and continuous change is the way to live in the world as it gives us more chance to explore the world and find better option for our careers."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn không có nhiều lỗi sai về từ vựng. Từ vựng sử dụng là tự nhiên và phù hợp với ngữ cảnh.

Dưới đây là một số gợi ý để cải thiện một số từ vựng và cấu trúc câu trong bài viết của bạn:

1. Lỗi cần sửa: "a continuous change"
   Gợi ý cải thiện: "constant change", "ongoing change"

2. Lỗi cần sửa: "take their mind off certain things"
   Gợi ý cải thiện: "distract themselves from certain things"

3. Lỗi cần sửa: "explore better options for themselves"
   Gợi ý cải thiện: "explore more opportunities for themselves"

4. Lỗi cần sửa: "This is their way of life which has discipline."
   Gợi ý cải thiện: "This is their disciplined way of life."

5. Lỗi cần sửa: "Following strict routines help them to be strong."
   Gợi ý cải thiện: "Following strict routines helps them to build strength."

6. Lỗi cần sửa: "Hence the choice depends on individuals thinking."
   Gợi ý cải thiện: "Hence, the choice depends on individuals' thinking."

7. Lỗi cần sửa: "In conclusion, both views have their own advantages and disadvantages"
  Gợi ý cải thiện: "In conclusion, both perspectives have their own merits and drawbacks"

Những lỗi trên không phải là lỗi nghiêm trọng và không ảnh hưởng đáng kể đến sự hiểu biết của bạn. Tuy nhiên, việc cải thiện những lỗi này sẽ mang lại một bài viết sạch sẽ và chuyên nghiệp hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Nowadays most green energy is becoming ever more prevalent in both developed and developing countries. Some argue they greatly reduce costs and are better for the environment, others believe they are a serious threat to energy security. Discuss both views and give your opinion."
Essay:
"Protecting nature is vital to environmental balance. Nowadays, nations committed to sustainability are using more renewable energy than ever before since it contributes to the preservation of the environment and also may be economically viable. However, some leaders argue that green energy could undermine (implicate) the reliability of the global energy supply as a result of its dependency on climate. This essay will discuss both views, but personally, I believe that renewable sources of energy are the future.

On the one hand, there is a concern in most developed and developing countries that green energy has supply chain risks. This is the fact that it may largely depend on unreliable conditions such as wind, wave and rain, which are clean source are of power energy and largely depend on weather conditions. This concern has increased due to world climate changes and can be a serious threat to energy security if the nation depends only on this type of energy.

On the other hand, fossil fuels are a larger threat to energy security since they are certainly finite in quantity, whereas renewable energy is effectively infinite. One day the earth’s oil can full out, there will be no energy security without green energy technologies. Furthermore, problems of unpredictability can be mitigated by improving battery technologies, building more renewable energy generators (to increase supply during ideal conditions) and improving current technologies (to increase efficiency), such as in the moving solar panel example. 

In conclusion, despite the green energy is likely to risk dependent on weather conditions, I believe that it can be installed with a minimum amount and there are no threats to our environment."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, bạn sử dụng các từ vựng phù hợp với chủ đề. Tuy nhiên, vẫn có một số từ vựng bị lặp lại quá nhiều lần và một vài lỗi về sử dụng các từ.

Các từ vựng bị lặp lại quá nhiều lần:
- "green energy": từ này xuất hiện quá nhiều lần trong bài viết của bạn.
- "renewable energy": cũng là từ vựng xuất hiện quá nhiều lần và có thể thay thế bằng một số từ vựng khác như "sustainable energy", "clean energy", "alternative energy"...

Các lỗi về sử dụng từ:
- "since it contributes to the preservation of the environment and also may be economically viable": "may be economically viable" có thể thay thế bằng các từ vứng khác như "is cost-effective", "is financially feasible" hoặc "is financially viable".
- "This is the fact that it may largely depend on unreliable conditions such as wind, wave and rain": "This is the fact that" có thể thay thế bằng "The fact is that", "The truth is that" hoặc "It is a fact that".
- "On the other hand, fossil fuels are a larger threat to energy security since they are certainly finite in quantity": "lớn hơn" có thể thay thế bằng "a greater", "a bigger", "a more significant".
- "One day the earth’s oil can full out": "full out" là một lỗi chính tả, từ này nên được sửa thành "run out".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Traffic and housing problems in major cities could be solved by moving large companies and factories and their employees to the countryside.
To what extent do you agree or disagree with this opinion?"
Essay:
"It is common belief that there are those who protest relocation of big-size companies, factories as well as their staffs to rural areas. Yet, I firmly believe that this initiative is considered as a solution to traffic congestion and a shortage of accommodation. And this essay will address and enlist the following approaches.
To commence with, transferring sizable corporations and their workers out of inner-city, lead to alleviate the current traveling overload. Each large-scale businesses have hordes of workers who are able to be considered as the chief culprit behind the traffic jam problem, especially in the rush hours. As a consequence, the shift of big companies together with their employees to rural areas would help tackle the congested roads. Additionally, toxic waste from the means of transports is the key factor influencing pollution. Therefore, shifting the companies, factories, and employees to the suburb is able to cut down on emissions into the atmosphere through the acts of lowering the extent of vehicles circulating on the streets.
On top of that, it firms as together with factories transfer to the suburban area in order to relieve the pressure on urban housing supply systems. According to the recent survey, that workers have the propensity for opting for their accommodation near their works, giving rise to the apartment demand as well as the living cost. Consequently, if there has a tremendous shift in accommodation to the suburban area, city houses and apartments price will fall and be more reasonable with city dwellers.
In conclusion, by relocating workers to rural areas to work and reside, heavy traffic conditions and shortage of accommodation in city centers could be handled. From my perspective, I am certain that the aforementioned solutions will solve the problem effectively."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn đã sử dụng một số từ vựng phù hợp và đa dạng như "initiative", "congested roads", "toxic waste", "accommodation", "propensity",... Tuy nhiên, vẫn còn một số lỗi sử dụng từ vựng cần được cải thiện.

- Câu này có sử dụng từ "populace" để chỉ người dân nhưng từ này đã không phổ biến và không được sử dụng nhiều lắm. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "residents" hoặc "citizens" thay thế.
Ví dụ: "This relocation can benefit not only the populace but also the environment."

- Trong câu viết "if there has a tremendous shift in accommodation to the suburban area", từ "a" không nên xuất hiện ở đây, nên thay bằng "is" hoặc "were" để cấu trúc câu chính xác hơn.

- Bạn có thể thay thế từ "suburban area" bằng "countryside" hoặc "rural area" để tránh lặp lại từ quá nhiều.
  
  Ví dụ: "Additionally, toxic waste from the means of transports is the key factor influencing pollution. Therefore, shifting the companies, factories, and employees to the countryside is able to cut down on emissions into the atmosphere through the acts of lowering the extent of vehicles circulating on the streets."

- Từ "hordes" có thể được thay bằng "a large number of" hoặc "numerous" để giúp câu trở nên trơn tru hơn.
  
  Ví dụ: "Each large-scale business has numerous workers who are able to be considered..."
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Is saving more important than spending in today’s world? How far do you agree with this statement? Give reasons for your answer, and provide ideas and examples from your own experience."
Essay:
"It is argued that saving is more vital than spending in our nowadays world. According to many opinions, in different aspects, expenditure brings people more benefits than saving does. In my point of view, I completely agree with that opinion and I will discuss 2 main reasons to prove my agreement.

In the first place, spending money can meet our subsistence needs. We can buy things that serve and improve our daily life. Such as purchasing a house to live, a motorbike or a car for traveling, or maybe a smartphone which is so necessary in our modern life. In addition, the acquisition of food, drinks and clothes everyday is also so important, especially to women, the one that takes care of people in a family. Moreover, monthly services’ bills such as water, electricity and Internet are needed to be paid.

As a result, being the second reason, spending can satisfy people's metal and material needs. As a consequence, that can bring us more content. We can buy whatever we want whenever we need. That is nothing but a sense of freedom and happiness.
