For example, when you go shopping or traveling, you can not deny that the sense of feeling afraid to see price when you buy things or souvenirs is so annoying. Furthermore, when you make a purchase of  a shirt, a toy that you like, a movie or music concert ticket,etc, you are happy. Being able to afford all daily needs somehow can make you proud of yourself and bring you a sense of confidence in life. And then your parents, your friends will be proud of you too. It all combined together creates a positive energy, a motivation for us to work harder and make more money to meet that feeling again.

In conclusion, it seems to me that spending money will improve our material and mental life."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, có một số từ vựng và cụm từ khá tốt như "subsistence needs", "monthly services' bills", "sense of freedom", "consequence", và "positive energy". Tuy nhiên, còn một số lỗi sai và cần cải thiện như sau:

- "metal" nên sửa thành "mental"
- "feeling afraid to see price" nên sửa thành "feeling anxious about the cost"
- "for women, the one that takes care of people in a family" nên sửa thành "for women, who are often responsible for caring for the family"
- "It all combined together creates" nên sửa thành "The combination of all these factors creates"

Bạn nên cố gắng sử dụng một số từ vựng chuyên ngành để tăng điểm cho khía cạnh này. Ví dụ: financial savings, consumer behaviour, discretionary spending, cost-benefit analysis, disposable income, and economic stability. Tuy nhiên, hãy nhớ phải sử dụng các từ vựng này một cách hợp lý và chính xác để tránh gây hiểu nhầm hoặc không rõ ràng.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people believe children should get homework everyday, while others think they should not. Discuss both sides and give your opinion."
Essay:
"Education is a very much needed exigency part of our life. If children or youngsters do not get a good education, it will be devastating for their lives. Whether or not children should receive homework every day is a matter of debate. Some people believe that children should get homework every day from school and on the other hand, some people believe that children should not get too much homework from school. 
Both views will be discussed in this essay before concluding.

Firstly, we must understand the concept of homework. The teacher is not able to cover a full course in school so that they give an assignment to children. Furthermore, most of the students are not doing their homework unless it is necessary, so it is important to give them homework. Moreover, some subjects need practice. For example, science, mathematics, and art need constant practice, if they do not, it is very difficult to understand for them. By giving homework it automatically helps to improve. Practice makes perfect.

However, it is important to give homework to youngsters but children spend 7-8 hours in school, after school if a teacher gives to much homework, it pressurizes many children. Besides this, when the children get too much homework, they are not able to do any other physical activity which is also important in their lives. And it is also caused to depreciation.
In my opinion, the concept of homework is not harmful. The problem arises when a teacher gives too much homework and when a student fails to use their time wisely. For example, if the deadline for a specific assignment is after 2 weeks, most students would leave it until the very last minute and by doing this they are putting themselves under unwanted pressure.
In conclusion, I think children should get homework for their improvement."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, từ vựng được sử dụng khá đa dạng và phù hợp với ngữ cảnh chung của bài viết. Tuy nhiên, có một số lỗi nhỏ về từ vựng mà tôi nhận thấy:

1. "exigency" - Từ này có ý nghĩa "tình trạng cấp bách" hoặc "tình huống khẩn cấp," nhưng không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh của đề bài. Bạn có thể thay thế nó bằng từ như "essential" hoặc "important."

2. "devastating" - Mặc dù từ này có nghĩa "tàn phá, phá hủy," nhưng trong câu của bạn, việc không nhận được một sự giáo dục tốt sẽ không gây ra sự tàn phá hoặc phá hủy trực tiếp. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ như "detrimental" hoặc "harmful" thay cho từ "devastating."

3. "indispensable" - Từ này có ý nghĩa "không thể thiếu," nhưng trong câu của bạn, nó không phù hợp vì bạn đã sử dụng từ "essential" trước đó. Bạn có thể thay thế nó bằng từ "crucial" hoặc "vital."

4. "physical health issues" - Một cách quan điểm chính quy là sử dụng từ "health problems" thay cho từ "issues." "Issues" ngụ ý vấn đề là không mong muốn hoặc có thể gây rối.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people think governments are responsible for peoples health, others believe its an indiviuduals responsibility. 
Discuss both views and give your opinion."
Essay:
"Healthcare remains a very crucial part of out basic amenities. The topic of whether or not people or the government should be held accountable for issues partaining to health,  remains very controversial. In my opinion, the government should be solely in charge of the health of its citizens at all times. 

On one hand, health care as well as the funding for the research into cures and vaccines are expensive. Private firms and singular entities cannot bear the burden alone. Furthermore, the cost of hospital admissions, investigations and medications would cripple the finances of the individual without governemt aid and policies. All fingers are not equal, therefore, the government plays a huge role by providing subsidized care to patients in its publicly funded facilities. For example, data from a survey carried out by the World Health Organization , in Nigeria , in 2013, revealed that many Nigerians depend entirely on the government to access excellent medical care. 

On the other hand, people are the masters of their bodies. Most diseases in the world today are preventable, that is, they are mostly caused by poor lifestyle choices. Individuals should incocate the habit of proper diet, exercise and regular medical checkups to keep fit and also  to detect illnesses at the early stages. 

In conclusion, while some are of the opinion that governments should be responsible for health, others are of the school of thought that it rests on the individual. I believe that it is the  responsibility of governments to cater for the health of all its nationals."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn sử dụng một số từ vựng phức tạp như "amenities", "inculcate" và "cripple", cũng như một số cụm từ như "burden alone", "publicly funded facilities" và "school of thought". Tuy nhiên, bạn cần sử dụng từ vựng phù hợp và chính xác hơn trong một số trường hợp. Dưới đây là một số gợi ý:

1. Sử dụng từ vựng phù hợp với ngữ cảnh: Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "amenities" cho những vật dụng cơ bản, nhưng trong trường hợp này, từ "healthcare" sẽ phù hợp hơn. Tương tự, bạn cần chú ý đến ngữ cảnh để sử dụng từ vựng hợp lý.

2. Sử dụng từ đồng nghĩa và cụm từ thay thế: Sử dụng từ đồng nghĩa và cụm từ thay thế có thể giúp tăng sự đa dạng của từ vựng và tránh lặp lại quá nhiều từ trong cùng một câu. Ví dụ, thay vì sử dụng "government aid", bạn có thể sử dụng "public assistance" hoặc "state support".

3. Tránh sử dụng từ sai hoặc chưa chính xác: Đôi khi, việc sử dụng từ sai hoặc không chính xác có thể gây hiểu nhầm và làm giảm tính chính xác của câu. Ví dụ, từ "inculcate" có thể được thay thế bằng "promote" hoặc "encourage". Bạn cũng nên chú ý đến cách sắp xếp các từ trong câu để tránh lỗi sai ngữ pháp và cú pháp.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Famous sportsmen often earn a lot of more money than people in other professions. Although sports is important in our lives, everyone should be equal and such big incomes of sport professionals are unjustified. Do you agree or disagree?"
Essay:
"Earning a huge amount of wage by eminent sports personalities, compared to other professional workers, is inappropriate because it is right of every skilled person to get capital equally despite knowing the fact that sport is insurmountable in people's lives. I am in consummate accordance with this notion as well.


There are a number of reasons to support my view and predominant one is more important to the work of other professions than sports personnel. There is no doubt that other proficient individuals not only serve the citizens of a nation, but also help to boost the economy of the country in the form of their work. Doctors, for example, treat diversified patients in every possible situation and pay their taxes on time which redounds government to facilitate its people. But players do enjoyment and play sports to earn wealth for themselves. In short, being true facilitators, other skilful workers provide more aid in many useful ways.


However, some people opine that money earned by renowned sports persons is justifiable because they suffer from severe injuries while playing, just to bring laurels for their country. So, they deserve receiving a hefty amount of earnings in return for their efforts because if they get a serious injury during performance and are not able to pursue their career in sports, they can at least utilize that money for the rest of their life. But I believe that other adepts like soldiers, should get more wages as they safeguard their nation twenty-four seven and sometimes, in unfortunate conditions, sacrifice their lives for saving their citizens. Therefore, giving more salary to popular players than other industrious humans is unjustified. 


In conclusion, although sports personalities encounter numerous difficulties, just for the pride of their country, I reaffirm that division of pay should be equal among persons pertaining to any profession, considering their hard work."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn có sử dụng từ vựng phong phú và đa dạng. Tuy nhiên, có một số lỗi và sự không phù hợp về từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn. Dưới đây là danh sách các lỗi và giải thích:

1. "inappropriate" - Từ này thường được sử dụng trong ngữ cảnh không phù hợp hoặc không thích hợp về hành vi. Trong trường hợp này, "unjustified" hoặc "unfair" sẽ là từ phù hợp hơn.

2. "insurmountable" - Từ này được sử dụng sai trong ngữ cảnh. "Insurmountable" có nghĩa là không thể vượt qua, không thể kiểm soát hoặc không thể đối phó. Trong trường hợp này, từ "important" hoặc "significant" có thể được sử dụng thay thế.

3. "consummate accordance" - Cụm từ này không phổ biến và không rõ nghĩa. Bạn có thể sử dụng thay thế bằng "strongly agree" hoặc "completely concur".

4. "redounds" - Từ này không phổ biến và không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "contributes" hoặc "supports" để thể hiện ý nghĩa tốt hơn.

5. "adepts" - Từ này không phổ biến và không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "skilled individuals" hoặc "proficient professionals" để thay thế.

6. "division of pay" - Từ này không phổ biến và không rõ ràng. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "distribution of income" để thể hiện ý nghĩa chính xác hơn.

Trừ những lỗi và từ không phù hợp như đã nêu trên, bài viết của bạn đã sử dụng từ vựng đa dạng và phong phú, theo ngữ cảnh và mang tính chính xác trong sử dụng từ. Tuy nhiên, để cải thiện thêm, bạn có thể tìm cách sử dụng các từ phổ biến hơn để tránh sự rối mắt cho người đọc và làm cho câu chuyện của bạn trở nên mạch lạc hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"The world has seen an enormous increase in flights for leisure,business and commercial purpose around the world over recent years. 
What do you think are the main advantages and disadvantages of such flights?
Do you think flight should be texted more?"
Essay:
"Exploration to many countries for enjoyment, trades and exchange phenomena for a few decades in the universe is enhancing drastically. From my perspective, the aircraft schedule should be extended more to create a smooth economical flow. This essay will discuss of the merits of the boarding on aeroplane and also describe some related demerits of this issue.

One of the positives of doing business using an aeroplane is to increase the profit of trades. Not only that the development of the exchange issues at the same time, but also it creates a lot of savings of the time issues. Compare to the past men are now very busy with their tasks. To demonstrate, they have to go to various places which distance is too long. As a result, the more time that he lessens, the more making profit can be possible. Another advantage is that, it can reduce physical pressure. For instance, if a person goes abroad he can prosper his tasks and it would be possible if he uses aeroplane for his journey.

Despite these advantages, aircraft is not a cheap issue. Moreover, a folk who is rich in his wealth can be able to use the aeroplane. This is because the costing of manufacturing plane is too high. Hence, the journey is too long to endure it for his body. As a consequence, a person must have physical stamina where he can travel to long-distance for his business works. For example, if a human wants to ordain his journey he has to prepare a lot of money. Therefore, there is no need to add any flight if a person cannot be able to purchase the aircraft journey schedule.

To sum up, using aircraft is required to construct a development of the country's financial condition and in my opinion, the enhancing of flight schedule may make a more prosper for the nation. However, fair for plain travel should be reasonable so that it can be purchasable for the all classes of the people."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn đã sử dụng một loạt từ vựng phong phú và sử dụng hợp ngữ cảnh phù hợp. Tuy nhiên, vẫn có một số lỗi và gợi ý để cải thiện từ vựng của bạn.

1. "Exploration" - thay vì từ này, bạn có thể sử dụng từ "travel" hoặc "journey" để diễn đạt ý của bạn.
Example: "Traveling to various countries for enjoyment, trades, and cultural exchange has significantly increased in recent decades."

2. "Enhancing" - từ này không hoàn toàn phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh của câu. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "increased" hoặc "grown" thay thế.
Example: "The number of flights has increased/grown significantly in recent years."

3. "Scheduled" - thay vì sử dụng "schedule", bạn có thể sử dụng "timetable" hoặc "flight schedule" để chỉ lịch trình chuyến bay.
Example: "The flight schedule should be extended to create a smooth flow of economic activities."

4. "Boarding on aeroplane" - thay vì sử dụng cụm từ này, bạn có thể sử dụng "air travel" hoặc "taking a flight" để diễn đạt ý của bạn.
Example: "One of the advantages of air travel is increasing profitability in trades."

5. "Costing" - thay vì sử dụng từ này, bạn có thể sử dụng "cost" hoặc "expense" để diễn đạt ý của bạn.
Example: "The cost of manufacturing planes is high."

6. "Endure it for his body" - từ này không phù hợp và không rõ nghĩa trong ngữ cảnh câu. Gợi ý thay thế bằng cách nói về sự mệt mỏi như "drain all his energy".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"people have difference visions about shopping online some of them encourage and others says its disadvantage outweigh their advantage, what is your opinion?"
Essay:
"Trading on the Internet has become more prevalent since the pandemic. Some traditional dealers believe it can cause detrimental impacts on the existing stores on the street so online shops should be limited rigidly. However, I believe the merits of trading online override the demerits and I will elaborate on the reasons in the following essay.

To commence, shopping online saves transportation efforts for both customers and sellers. For example, customers can browse the products they need through the website whenever they want. They do not need to travel distances to the stores in person. Similarly, the dealers do not need to stand in their stores and wait for their buyers in a fixed business hour. They only move the merchandise from the stocks to delivery when the order is made. 

Nevertheless, some traditional sellers argue that online shops have threatened the existing commercial models and raised countless trade disputes. Although the value of the products can be difficult to be estimated on the Internet, the Taiwanese government has already provided online shoppers with a complete resolution. Thus, the customers can return the products unconditionally within one week. Taking that risks into consideration, the online dealers might have risen the prices of the goods, but the price will strike the balance again in the market eventually.

In conclusion, despite some disputes in trading, online shops provide not only convenience but also  economic efficiency in transportation. As a result, I believe this shopping model should be encouraged and such a shopping habit will be widely adopted by the general public."

###
completion:
Bên dưới là đánh giá chi tiết Lexical Resource của bài viết của bạn:

1. Bạn đã sử dụng một số từ vựng chính xác để miêu tả các ý tưởng của mình như "prevalent", "rigidly", "browse", "efficiency", "adopted", "demerits", ...
2. Tuy nhiên, có một số lỗi sai về cách sử dụng từ vựng cũng như cấu trúc câu. Ví dụ như:

- "...can cause detrimental impacts on the existing stores on the street so online shops should be limited rigidly": tại đây, từ "detrimental" trong câu có nghĩa là "tác động tiêu cực" nên không thể kết hợp với "limited rigidly" được. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "controlled" hoặc "regulated" thay cho "limited rigidly".
- "...to delivery when the order is made": cần phải sửa thành "to deliver when the order is made" để đảm bảo chính xác ngữ pháp.
- "Although the value of the products can be difficult to be estimated on the Internet...": cần phải loại bỏ "to be" để câu trở thành "Although the value of the products can be difficult to estimate on the Internet". 

3. Bạn nên chú ý sử dụng từ vựng đúng với ngữ cảnh. Ví dụ, cụm từ "taking that risks into consideration" trong câu "Taking that risks into consideration, the online dealers might have risen the prices of the goods" cần phải được sửa lại thành "Taking those risks into consideration" hoặc "Taking these risks into consideration".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people that passports are essential as a way of regulating the population  of countries. Others believe they should be abolished and we should be able to travel where we like. Discuss both points of view and give your own opinion"
Essay:
"In our contemporary world, several problems have brought to attention of public, and one of them is that of having passports which is leading this issue to become matter of considerable controversy. And in today's confabulation, one school of thought surmise that identification card should be necessary for all individuals. But on the other hand, others claim that certain certificates should be abrogated and population should make travels whenever they desire without passports. And this essay will display a further discussion on this topic before reaching any conclusion. 

To begin with, this essay will fundamentally support a former view. Incipiently, with assistance of passports government can make a control as well as they can implement some rules which could help it. And in that way knowing such growing population could come as a dilemma and passports can make an opportunity to work effectively in this moments. Secondly, without ID cards crime rates can increase tremendously. As government can not be informed about a person who committed a crime. Furthermore in all passports there are would be enough details to identify the individuality of gangsters.

On the other hand there some people who are of the opinion like this kind of documents about identity should be abated in order to do flights much more frequently. Precisely, individuals can be free from stressful documentations before their flight. But it is on the other hand detrimental they can not be under the control of government without passports. As with government population can be shielded from political pressures which they are suffering in other countries.

To conclude it is advantageous for people in order to make flights in certain aspects. But collaterally it has its own disadvantages in terms of politics and as well as controlling crime."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, có một số lỗi sai về từ vựng và chúng là:

1. confabulation - Từ này không được sử dụng đúng context và có thể gây hiểu nhầm, thay vào đó bạn có thể sử dụng "discussion" hoặc "debate".
2. surmise - Từ này không phù hợp trong bài viết của bạn và có thể được thay thế bằng "believe" hoặc "think".
3. abrogated - Từ này không phù hợp trong bài viết của bạn và có thể được thay thế bằng "abolished" hoặc "eliminated".
4. gangster - Từ này không phù hợp trong bài viết của bạn và có thể được thay thế bằng "criminal" hoặc "offender".
5. flights - Trong bài viết của bạn, từ này được dùng một cách sai lệch và cần sửa thành "travel".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Young people these days tend to be less polite and respectful than in the past. Causes and solutions."
Essay:
"Lifestyle has undergone dramatic changes over couple of decades. It is irrefutable that the modern generation nowadays has become less considerate and civil than in the earlier times. Here,i would like to explore the possible causes of this situation and suggest some ways forward.

There are multifarious causes behind this phenomenon.The most important cause is the disintegration of the traditional joint family system. In today‘s nuclear families, there are no grandparents to teach moral values to children. Parents are busy working and do not spend quality time with children. Consequently, children become self-centred and uncaring for the world around them.

Further emphasizing from my point of view. Nowadays,we are part of a consumerist society. We desire to have the latest things and to get those things we are becoming workaholics. We set goals for ourselves and work hard to achieve them. As a result politeness and respect have taken a back seat. Finally, we have the influence of the western culture. There, it is considered quite normal to argue and question the elders. By contrast,others have conflicting views.

They think that it is necessary to install moral values in children at a young age. So, joint family system should be encouraged. Secondly, community welfare programmes should be part of high school curriculum. We can also take the help of media to show programmes which highlight the good points of earlier times and discourage consumerism. But, the final onus is on the people themselves. They should be willing to change.

To put it in a nutshell, I pen down saying that, in the fast-paced world of today, people have changed and become selfish and self centred, but steps can be taken to re-imbibe some virtues of the olden times."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, tổng thể đã sử dụng từ vựng phù hợp và đồng nhất với chủ đề. Tuy nhiên, một số lỗ hổng về từ vựng vẫn có thể được cải thiện để giúp bài viết của bạn trở nên chính xác và đa dạng hơn. Dưới đây là một số lỗi sai về từ vựng có thể được sửa chữa:

- "irrefutable" (không thể bác bỏ) có thể được thay thế bằng "undeniable" (không thể phủ nhận) để làm cho từ ngữ tự nhiên hơn.
- "multifarious" (đa dạng) có thể được thay thế bằng "various" hoặc "diverse" để tránh sử dụng từ ngữ quá phức tạp.
- "disintegration" (sự phân rã) có thể sử dụng "breakdown" hoặc "dissolution" để tránh lặp lại từ ngữ.
- "self-centred" (tự tâm) có thể được thay thế bằng "selfish" để tránh sử dụng từ ngữ trùng lặp.
- Cần lưu ý về việc sử dụng chính tả chính xác cho từng từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn, ví dụ "re-imbibe" có thể được viết là "reimburse" để giúp cho từ vựng được sử dụng chính xác hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people think environmental problems are too big for individuals to solve. Others, however, think that those problems can be solved unless individuals take some action. Discuss both views and give your opinion."
Essay:
"The issues related to the environment such as global warming, climate change and pollution are getting more and more severe, which has become too challenging for each citizen to handle. However, others believe that people need to take responsibility for protecting and preserving their surrounding environment, so the huge mentioned problems can be mitigated. In this essay, both views will be discussed before giving my perspective.  

It is justifiable why the idea that individuals cannot deal with  huge environmental problems is in favour. The first reason is that humans cannot control or change unprecedented harsh natural phenomena, namely floods, drought, tsunamis, and other weather patterns. The only thing they can do is to adapt and have preparation to minimize the damage caused by these problems. Besides, it should be the government’s responsibility to introduce laws imposing on their citizens on protecting the environment. The explanation is no one can change a situation without  collective power. In other words, people are willing to work together only if there is a proper guide and encouragement from their authorities. For example, how a normal city dweller stops an industrial factory from performing their working activities without releasing carbon dioxide into the air. Hence, what is needed is  regulation from the authorities to control the factory’s harmful activities to the environment. 

On the other side, there are a variety of reasons why people advocate solving  environmental problems individually. Admittedly, it is humans’ daily activities that lead to all types of pollution. To be more specific, it has been proved that the amount of CO2 emitted from private cars and motorbikes pollutes the air and the act of throwing garbage and plastic bags into the rivers pollutes water. In the same way, the increasing use of electric household appliances, especially air conditioners, contributes to intensifying the greenhouse effect which causes global warming. Therefore, if each person can adopt a green lifestyle, for example, saying no to plastic bags, using public transportation to commute or cutting down on their use of electric appliances at home, the environmental issues can be eliminated significantly. 

In conclusion, I hold the same view that environmental sustainability depends greatly on each citizen’s discipline and responsibility. However, to guarantee individuals act in protecting the Earth to work effectively, it is  governments around the world that should enact proper environment-protecting laws for their people to oblige."

###
completion:
Từ vựng của bạn đã sử dụng trong bài viết là phù hợp với chủ đề của đề bài. Tuy nhiên, để nâng cao điểm số cho mục Lexical Resource, bạn có thể sử dụng một số từ vựng phức tạp và chính xác hơn.

Dưới đây là một số lỗi về từ vựng mà bạn đã mắc phải trong bài viết của mình:

1. "too challenging for each citizen to handle" - thay vì sử dụng "citizen", bạn có thể dùng "individual" hoặc "person" để tránh lặp từ.

2. "unprecedented harsh natural phenomena" - từ "unprecedented" không hoàn toàn phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh này, bạn có thể dùng từ "severe" thay thế.

3. "collective power" - ở đây, bạn có thể sử dụng từ "collaboration" hoặc "cooperation" để miêu tả ý của mình hơn chính xác.

4. "protectiong" - bạn viết sai chính tả, cần sửa lại thành "protecting".

5. "intensifying the greenhouse effect which causes global warming" - cần xem xét từ "intensifying" vì có thể hiểu sai như "tăng" hoặc "mạnh hơn". Thay vì sử dụng "intensifying", bạn có thể dùng từ "exacerbating".

6. "eliminated significantly" - thay vì dùng "eliminated significantly", bạn có thể dùng từ "reduced significantly".

7. "enacting proper environment-protecting laws" - bạn có thể nói "enacting comprehensive environmental protection laws" để mô tả rõ hơn ý của mình.

Tổng kết lại, bài viết của bạn còn một số lỗi về từ vựng, tuy nhiên, đa phần các từ sử dụng là phù hợp với chủ đề của đề bài. Để nâng cao mức điểm của mục Lexical Resource lên, bạn nên sử dụng nhiều từ và cụm từ phức tạp hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some believe it is important for cities and towns to invest heavily in building large outdoor public spaces.

To what extent do you agree or disagree?"
Essay:
"With the development of populations in cities and towns, the living density is rising sharply in recent years. People need more outdoor space to relax and take activities, so I think it is important to invest suitably in building outdoor public areas, not heavily.

Building large outdoor public space in the city and town could provide an area for the citizen to relax and enjoy the free time. Due to the heavy working stress in the office, people need an outdoor space to relax. In addition, most public parks or outdoor activity areas are close to the huge community. Residents could easily arrive there, and walk around or play with their children. For instance, I live in the city place area, there is a huge public area in front of my apartment. There are a dog park, soccer field, and some activity equipment. I saw a lot of people went to the park when they get off work. Some people were walking their dogs, and some people play with their children. Therefore, the outdoor public field is an important relaxing place in people’s daily life. 

However, although building outdoor public is beneficial to citizen, that does not mean the government needs to invest a lot of funding into that. A suitable amount of money is acceptable. For example, the government need to research the data of public construction expense every year for all districts in the city and town. Moreover, the authority should arrange a number of investment reasonably for building public parks and activities. After they made the decision, residents have the right to vote to agree or disagree. If do so, it will be an effective way to control the cost of public construction. Therefore, the government could support the construction of the public space, but investing a reasonable amount of money is acceptable.

In conclusion, for this discussion, I agree to build more public outdoor areas in cities and towns, because people need this kind of place to relax and enjoy the leisure time. However, the government needs to control the investment. The amount of spending should be calculated in advance."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn sử dụng đa dạng các từ vựng liên quan đến chủ đề và phù hợp với mục đích của bài viết. Tuy nhiên, có một số lỗi sai về từ vựng đã xảy ra trong bài viết của bạn. Dưới đây là danh sách các lỗi sai về từ vựng:

1. "Suitably" (thích hợp) cần được thay thế bằng "appropriately" để nói rõ hơn.

2. "Free time" (thời gian rảnh) là cụm từ không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh này. Nên sử dụng "leisure time" (thời gian giải trí) thay cho "free time".

3. "Huge community" (cộng đồng lớn) có thể được thay bằng "local residents" (cư dân địa phương).

4. "Dog park" (công viên chó) có thể được thay bằng "dog exercise area" (khu vực tập thể dục cho chó).

5. "Controlling the cost of public construction" (kiểm soát chi phí xây dựng công cộng) có thể được thay bằng "managing public construction expenses" (quản lý chi phí xây dựng công cộng).
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Multicultural societies in which there are a mixture of ethnic people bring more benefits than drawbacks to a country. To what extent do you agree or disagree?"
Essay:
"Migration of people to various part of the world is becoming increasingly popular. Consequently, people end up settling in communities where they share different cultural background. Many believe there are more advantages of inhabiting in such a multicultural community than the potential setbacks that may arise. I completely agree with this view. This is because the problem that may emerge can be overcome and cultural mix leads societal development.

The fear of losing cultural heritage is one major issue that makes individuals believe that mixing with other people with different ethnicity may be a drawback for them. They think new immigrant may not respect their culture and this could lead to clashes between them. However, they are unaware that these issues have solutions. The local government or community members can organise induction programs to keep the new comers informed on the land's cultural beliefs. Pamphlets can also be distributed to each immigrant telling them about the cultures of their new society. This way people will learn and respect the culture thereby avoiding unnecessary conflict. In Africa for instance, describing a lady as fat is not conceived as being disrespectful unlike in places in the Europe where it is not tolerated. if one is aware of this one may avoid such words in an environment like that. And this will prevent any misunderstanding that may arise.

Having a clear understanding of both cultures makes it easier for people to become accommodating, but could this be the benefits? No. When people with different background live together they share knowledge and skills from the various culture. This produces new techniques employed in carrying out some specific processes such as building constructions. In addition, it also improves the lifestyle of the community and this generally results in community development.  For example, people from eastern part of Nigeria are generally good entrepreneurs and their migration to places like Lagos has made the state one of the biggest commercial cities of Africa. Indigenes have also been able to learn these skills, and this has resulted in an enormous growth in the state’s income.

In summary, there are more merit to having a multicultural society if people know how to deal with the issues that may arise. New skills acquisition and community growth are the major advantages when we embrace people with different ethnic background."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, mặc dù sử dụng từ vựng phong phú và chính xác, tôi tìm thấy một số mắc lỗi và sử dụng từ trùng lặp. Dưới đây là danh sách chi tiết:

1. "Ethnic people" - thay thế "ethnic" thành "people of different ethnicities" hoặc "people from diverse ethnic backgrounds" để tránh sử dụng từ trùng lặp.

2. "The fear of losing cultural heritage" - thay thế "fear" bằng "concern" hoặc "anxiety".

3. "Induction programs" - thay thế bằng "orientation programs".

4. "New skills acquisition" - thay thế "acquisition" bằng "development" hoặc "improvement".

5. "Societal development" - thay thế "societal" bằng "social" hoặc "community".

6. "Community members" - thay thế "members" bằng "residents" hoặc "inhabitants" để tránh sử dụng từ trùng lặp.

7. "Enormous growth" - thay thế "enormous" bằng "significant" hoặc "substantial".

8. "In Africa for instance" - thay thế "for instance" bằng "as an example" hoặc "such as".

Tất cả những lỗi sai này đều là những điểm nhỏ trong bài viết của bạn và không làm giảm đi tính chất hợp lý và mạch lạc của nó. Tuy nhiên, nếu bạn tập trung vào sử dụng từ vựng đa dạng và tránh sử dụng từ trùng lặp, bài viết của bạn sẽ trở nên tốt hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"In some countries an increasing number of children are overweight as a result of eating too much fast food. It is necessary for governments to ban selling this kind of food in schools. To what extend do you agree or disagree with this opinion?"
Essay:
"In a few nations, kids are used to eating a lot of junk food, and due to which they tend to gain weight, causing them to be obese. A few populaces think that the government can regulate the availability of such food in educational institutes. In my opinion, the solution should be full-proof.

In current times, there are various options available in the canteen that a student can replace their lunch pack with, and this can be curbed by enforcing strict guidelines from the government side so that this is regulated uniformly in all institutes. Individual schools can then take up the responsibility to upgrade their eatery menu with more healthy choices in place of junk items. For instance, even if a student wants to trade his or her lunch for something different, it would be replaced by something nutritious. 

Moreover, parents play a crucial role in educating the child regarding good food habits, and they can also keep a check on what their child eats while the child is at home. They should not encourage unhealthy food habits that can lead to health-related complications for their kids. For example, homemade food and snacks should be made available at all times so that the infant can have better alternatives to deep-fried and calorie-rich food.

To conclude, I agree that that the government should prohibit the availability of unhealthy food at schools. However, I believe that this alone would not suffice, as it is also the responsibility of parents to ensure that their child picks up appropriate food habits to stay fit and healthy."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, có sử dụng khá nhiều từ vựng đa dạng và phù hợp với đề bài, tuy nhiên, một số lỗi sai về từ vựng đã xuất hiện trong bài viết. Dưới đây là các lỗi sai về từ vựng mà bạn có trong bài viết:

1. "full-proof" - từ này không chính xác trong ngữ cảnh này, thay vào đó bạn có thể sử dụng các cụm từ như "comprehensive solution" hoặc "foolproof solution".

2. "infant" - từ này chỉ dành cho trẻ sơ sinh và không thích hợp trong văn phong bài viết. Bạn có thể thay thế bằng những từ như "child" hoặc "student".

3. "deep-fried" - từ này chưa đầy đủ trong ngữ cảnh vì nó chỉ đề cập đến một loại đồ ăn nhanh cụ thể và không thể sử dụng cho tất cả đồ ăn nhanh được bán trong trường học. Thay vào đó, bạn nên sử dụng các từ bao quát hơn như "unhealthy" hoặc "calorie-rich food".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some universities now offer their courses on the Internet so that people can study online. Is this a positive or negative development?"
Essay:
"Amidst Covid-19 spread in the world, people were asked to work from home and students had to take their classes online. According to recent discussions, people are considering continuing this trend ahead. But the question arises, Is it beneficial to study from home? Can we replace classroom studies with the ones given online?  In the forthcoming paragraphs, I will discuss the impacts of taking courses online from home.

To begin with, According to Hindu mythology in India, during the early days of education, students were asked to leave their homes and live the entire period of education with their teachers. While not being in their comfort zone, they lead a disciplined life and were transformed into scholars. On the contrary, things have transformed now. Nowadays it is observed that students wake up and join their classes online without even getting up from their beds due to which a proper concentration is not formed. 

However, students going to universities not only obtain knowledge on their courses but also develop interpersonal skills which are hard to learn online. Students get to be with other students from diverse cultures and learn a very valuable skill of friendship, these traits can be built provided all are under one roof. Additionally, professors are able to deliver their lessons smoothly without any interruptions which might occur during online classes.

To conclude, studying on the internet rather than going to universities can be seen as an overall negative development for students. Some of the merits such as saving time during travelling or saving the cost of infrastructure in universities cannot outweigh the demerits."

###
completion:
Bạn có sử dụng một số từ vựng liên quan đến chủ đề và cố gắng sử dụng một số từ đồng nghĩa để tránh lặp lại từ. Tuy nhiên, một số lỗi về từ vựng vẫn xuất hiện trong bài viết của bạn như sau:

- Amidst Covid-19 spread in the world: "Amidst" là từ khá cổ và ít được sử dụng trong tiếng Anh hiện đại. Thay vào đó, bạn nên sử dụng một cụm từ khác để diễn đạt ý này, ví dụ: "With the global spread of Covid-19".
- the merits such as saving time during travelling: Từ "merits" được sử dụng không đúng ngữ cảnh, bạn nên sử dụng từ "advantages". 
- lead a disciplined life: Bạn có ý muốn nói "live a disciplined life" chứ không phải "lead".
- transformed into scholars: Từ "transformed" không phù hợp trong trường hợp này. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "developed into scholars" hoặc "turned into scholars". 
- valuable skill of friendship: "Valuable skill of friendship" không hoàn toàn đúng ngữ nghĩa, thay vào đó bạn có thể chỉ ra rằng việc gặp gỡ bạn bè từ các quốc gia khác nhau có thể giúp phát triển các kỹ năng giao tiếp và đa dạng hóa kiến thức.
- professors are able to deliver their lessons smoothly without any interruptions: Từ "interruptions" không hoàn toàn đúng vì giảng viên có thể gặp khó khăn trong việc quản lý lớp học và sử dụng công nghệ để chuyển đổi hoạt động giảng dạy. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "distractions" hoặc "technical difficulties".

Mặc dù bạn đã sử dụng một số từ mới trong bài viết của mình, nhưng vẫn còn một số lỗi như trên mà được lưu ý để bạn có thể cải thiện khả năng sử dụng từ vựng của mình.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people say that the government should not put money on building theatres and sports stadiums. They should spend more money on medical care and education. Do you  agree or disagree?"
Essay:
"Education and medical treatment are an indispensable element of society. Many people argue that the judiciary should not invest money on construction of theatres and sports stadiums. Instead they should use the money on medical amenities and education. I concur with them. My inclination is justified further.
To begin with the first cause of agreement, it seems that day by day detrimental accidents are increasing. This is to say, if victims do not obtain proper treatment immediately then one would lose his life. Besides excellent medical care would enhance the longevity of people. This is because, citizens will not face critical incidents. For example, people in developed countries have longer life due to magnificent medical care.
As we ponder further, another aspect is that education is a vital factor to secure a job in this cutthroat era. By this I mean that, one with advanced education would find job effortlessly than others. The rearmost coherent factor to be considered is that better education would certainly boost up the nation’s economy. To substantiate, Canada has wider economy due to superb education and medical service rendered by local juridic.
On the contrary, some people would vote in favour of creation of theatres and stadiums. The top-notch argument they do is that those buildings produce recreation in humans. This is because, people would get relief from routine overstressed work by attending events in theatres. Moreover, this would promote, competitive gaming events in the country in which many people can participate. For, instance, London has many domestic cricket events due to innumerable sports stadiums.
To conclude, it can be finally commented that although theatres and stadiums are recreational sources, education, and medical amenities would certainly exacerbate territory’s economy. In addition, advanced medical care would increase life span of individuals."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn sử dụng một loạt từ vựng phong phú và đa dạng trong một phạm vi từ vựng IELTS phù hợp. Tuy nhiên, vẫn còn một số lỗi sai về từ vựng và cấu trúc cần được sửa chữa.

1. "the judiciary" nghĩa là "bộ tư pháp" chứ không phải "chính phủ". Bạn có thể sử dụng "government" để diễn đạt ý kiến của mình.

2. "day by day" nên được thay bằng "increasingly" hoặc "gradually". "Day by day" không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh này.

3. "detrimental accidents" chưa rõ nghĩa. Bạn có thể thay thành "serious accidents" hoặc "fatal accidents".

4. "will not face critical incidents" chưa chính xác. Bạn có thể nói "will be less vulnerable to critical incidents" hoặc "will experience a decrease in critical incidents".

5. "wider economy" không chính xác. Bạn có thể sử dụng "stronger economy" hoặc "growing economy".

6. "rendered by local juridic" không chính xác. Bạn có thể nói "provided by the local government" hoặc "offered by the local administration".

7. "creation of theatres and stadiums" có thể thay bằng "construction of theatres and sports stadiums" để diễn đạt ý của bạn một cách chính xác hơn.

8. "top-notch argument" có thể thay bằng "main argument" hoặc "key argument".

9. "promote, competitive gaming events" chưa chính xác. Bạn có thể nói "promote competitive sports events" để diễn đạt ý của bạn rõ ràng hơn.

10. "certainly exacerbate territory's economy" có thể thay bằng "definitely contribute to the country's economy" để sử dụng từ ngữ chính xác hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some children recieve almost no encouragement from their parents regarding their performance at school, while other children recieve too much pressure from their over enthusiastic parents which can have a negative impacts on the child.
Why do you think some parents put too much pressure on their children to perform well at school?
What do you think the role of a parents should be in their child education?"
Essay:
"The parents are playing a very essential role behind the success of their offsprings.Fewer guardians do not interfere with toddler school activities.Whereas, some parents show over attitude regarding students' action which have bad effects on the minor development.So, I intend to explore the reasons behind this practice along with parents' responsibility in order to youngsters study.
To regard with cause of why parents put an excess of pressure on children.Firstly, it is true that the parents always think about children better future.Therefore, they force their children to obtain high grades.However, due to this practice, children do not able to maintain focus on performance just because of parents fear.As a result, they choose the wrong path in the term of success like doing the cheating, give money to teachers for high marking and sometimes, skips their classes and exams.Further point is that, childhood is a very crucial stage in the whole life.At that time, toddler decided where they want to make future with the help of parents.Therefore, with love and care children can share their feelings with parents.Yet, due to pressure, they may choose bad society rather than successful life.As a result, bonding with family members may be become weak.
Moving further, parents should take steps wisely while keeping negative and positive outcomes in mind.Moreover, parents select corporal punishment, but somewhere it has negative impacts.Therefore, parents should make strong relationship with children, which act as children may explore their feelings without any fear and worry.By this, parents can make right decision with the aid of adolescent interest.Another point is that, the parents guide children regarding fruitful effects of education along with make schedule for playing and studying which may be proved very effective in order to kid may make mind fresh and sharp.
In conclusion, parents should always treat children in well manner which by this they can avoid bad society and also run into positive path."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, sử dụng từ vựng khá đa dạng và phù hợp với chủ đề. Tuy nhiên, cũng có một số lỗi liên quan đến sự sử dụng không chính xác hoặc không trọn vẹn các từ.

Một số lỗi cụ thể bao gồm:

- "Fewer guardians" - Thay vì sử dụng "fewer", bạn nên sử dụng "some" hoặc "a few" để diễn đạt ý muốn của mình.
- "over attitude" - Thay vì sử dụng cụm từ này, bạn có thể sử dụng "overbearing" hoặc "overly demanding" để diễn đạt ý muốn của mình.
- "toddlers' school activities" - Ở đây, từ "toddlers" không hoàn toàn phù hợp với ngữ cảnh vì đề bài chỉ đề cập đến trẻ con học trường. Bạn có thể thay thế nó bằng "children's school activities" hoặc "students' school activities".
- "due to pressure, they may choose bad society" - Từ "society" không phù hợp trong trường hợp này. Bạn có thể sử dụng "company" hoặc "peer group" để diễn đạt ý muốn của mình.
- "parents select corporal punishment" - Trong trường hợp này, từ "corporal punishment" không phù hợp và có thể gây nhầm lẫn. Bạn có thể sử dụng "disciplinary action" thay vì "corporal punishment".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"It is important for children to learn the difference between right and wrong at an early age. Punishment is necessary to help them learn this distinction.
To what extend do you agree or disagree with this opinion?
What sort of punishment should teachers and parents use to teach good behavior to children?"
Essay:
"It is considered that punishments need to be applied to make youngsters learn between good and bad. I strongly agree with this and will write on the kind of punishment to be allowed in this essay.

On one hand, I strongly agree that kids should be faced with consequences on the quest to teaching them rights and wrongs because it sends a deep message to them. That is to say, simply explaining and giving pieces of advice to children is not enough as they most times take them for granted but when they are punished for their actions, it gives them a better directive and makes them change their ways. For example, a mathematics teacher in a secondary school confirmed that punishing students for failure to do homework made them punctual at doing it because of fear of consequences. Therefore, youngsters should be reprimanded in other for them to learn between good or bad.

On the other hand, parents and teachers in schools should engage in non-violent sanctions in trying to shape children's character. That is, discipline that kids are scared of having will pass a piece of clearer information such as; taking their break time in school, restricting from televisions and phones, will make them learn more. For instance, a child who was not taken along for a regular family hangout as a result of their wrong deed will definitely not repeat the act again. So, punishing kids with things they are afraid to lose is the best rather than any physical action.

In conclusion, punishing a child t make them learn is good as it sends a clearer message, nevertheless, a non-violent kind of teaching should be employed in doing so."

###
completion:
Từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn là khá đủ và đa dạng nhưng còn một số lỗi sai. Dưới đây là các lỗi sai được tìm thấy trong bài viết của bạn:

1. "...punishments need to be applied to make youngsters learn between good and bad." - Thay vì "learn between good and bad" thì bạn có thể sử dụng "learn the difference between right and wrong" để tránh lặp từ và sử dụng cụm từ chính xác hơn.

2. "That is to say, simply explaining and giving pieces of advice to children is not enough as they most times take them for granted..." - Thay vì "most times" bạn có thể sử dụng "often" để giảm thiểu sự không chính xác trong từ vựng.

3. "...punishing students for failure to do homework made them punctual at doing it because of fear of consequences." - Thay vì "punctual" (chính xác nhưng không phù hợp trong trường hợp này) bạn nên sử dụng "more diligent" để diễn đạt ý của bạn một cách chính xác hơn.

4. "...discipline that kids are scared of having will pass a piece of clearer information such as; taking their break time in school, restricting from televisions and phones..." - Thay vì "pass a piece of clearer information" bạn nên sử dụng "convey a clearer message" để sử dụng từ vựng chính xác hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"More and more companies are allowing employees to work at home. Do you think this is a positive or negative development?"
Essay:
"Nowadays, the technology has altered our working style and gave the chance to the employees to do their job duties from home. While some people claim that this has a positive impact for both the companies and the workforce, others argue it has a negative effect on the companies. I agree to some extent with working from home as it has some advantages such as flexibility and disadvantages such as less productivity. This essay will discuss both sides of the arguments and provide a conclusion with my opinion.

To begin with, there are several advantages linked with working from home. Firstly, working from home reduces the time wasted during the commute. As a result, they will start their work with full power and energy without feel exhausted from the traffic. For example, the workers do not need to awake very early in the morning to go to the office, and they will start working from home with a fresh mind. Secondly, Working from home gives the employee the flexibility to manage their family matters without impacting their performance. By doing this, the workforce will be able to balance between their personal life and professional career.

On the other hand, working from home has some negative factors. To commence with, employees will lose their motivation during working from home, and they might not give the work the needed importance. As a result, the production might be reduced and the delivery of the tasks will be delayed. In addition, working from office enhance the workforce collaboration and the social life. Due to this, working from home will increase the tension between the employees and impact the task that requires more collaboration between the team members. For instance, some activities need a face to face meeting for brainstorming and discussion, which require all the team members to be in the office.

To sum up, there is no doubt that working from home has advantages such as flexibility, but it is linked with many disadvantages that impact the productivity of the employees. However, I profoundly believe that the advantages of working from home will be an added value to the companies and the employees, if it is regulated by processes and rules to control it."

###
completion:
Từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn là đa dạng và phong phú. Bạn đã sử dụng một số từ vựng chính xác và cụm từ trong ngữ cảnh đúng. Tuy nhiên, vẫn có một số lỗi và cách cải thiện để cải thiện chất lượng từ vựng của bạn:

1. Paragraph 1:
- "claim" (nên sử dụng "argue" thay cho "claim"): While some people argue that this has a positive impact...
- "impact on the companies" (nên sử dụng "effect on the companies" thay cho "impact on the companies"): ...it has a negative effect on the companies.

2. Paragraph 2:
- "linked with" (nên sử dụng "associated with" hoặc "connected with" thay vì "linked with"): There are several advantages associated with working from home.
- "reduce the time wasted" (nên sử dụng "save time" thay cho "reduce the time wasted"): ...working from home saves time wasted during the commute.

3. Paragraph 3:
- "employees will lose their motivation" (nên sử dụng "employees may lose their motivation" thay cho "employees will lose their motivation"): ...employees may lose their motivation during working from home.
- "impact the task" (nên sử dụng "affect the task" thay cho "impact the task"): ...and affect tasks that require more collaboration between team members.

4. Conclusion:
- "the advantages of working from home will be an added value to the companies" (nên sử dụng "the advantages of working from home can provide added value to the companies" thay cho "the advantages of working from home will be an added value to the companies"): ...the advantages of working from home can provide added value to the companies.

Ngoài các điểm trên, bài viết của bạn có một vài cụm từ không thật sự hợp ngữ cảnh hoặc có cách diễn đạt không tự nhiên. Dưới đây là một số gợi ý chỉnh sửa nhằm cải thiện sự diễn đạt tự nhiên của bài viết:

- Paragraph 1: ...some people argue that this has a positive impact on both the companies and the workforce.
- Paragraph 2: Firstly, working from home saves time on commuting, allowing employees to start their work with full energy. For example, workers do not need to wake up early and brave the traffic just to get to the office. Instead, they can work from home with a fresh mind.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Countries are becoming more and more similar because people are able to buy the same products anywhere in the world.
Do you think this is a positive or negative development?
Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience."
Essay:
"With developing of the world's connection and the ability to access any production regardless of the location of a person, the becoming of some countries similar to each other is not a new topic to be argued. Regarding this phenomenon, I think it is a positive developmend due to the decreasing of discrimination level and formation of one "nation".

First and foremost, having an opportunity to acquire the same stuff notwithstanding the location will lead to the declining of discrimination in the world. By this, I mean that access of anyone to the products that are trended in developed countries will not make people from the third-world places be marginalized. If everyone's appearance is quite the same, people will have less reasons to judge each other. For instance, nowadays, a plethora of famouse brends , be it Bershka or Zara, have their product around the world. Thus, people do not have to travel to America to buy a new pair of jeans from H&M because they have it in their own country.

Another point to consider is that being similar to each other can form one intiger society. If all of the countries have quite the same way of wearing clothes, consuming products, it can lead to the reaching of one of the Sustainable Development Goals formated by UNESCO. The main idea of SDG is to be Global Citizens, since we are living in(on) one planet. Therefore, people should not think that they are belonging to one particular country and think beyond the borders. If those happen, people can solve any problem that currently occures in the world.

In conclusion, I am convinced that purchasing of the same products all over the world which makes more contries have less (fewer) differences between each other can be seen as a positive development. In conseqence, this leads people to not discriminate and be one unit."

###
completion:
Bài viết của bạn đã sử dụng một số từ và cụm từ phù hợp với ngữ cảnh, tuy nhiên cũng còn một số lỗi và phần nào thiếu đi sự mạch lạc cũng như đa dạng từ vựng trong lĩnh vực này. Dưới đây là một số gợi ý để tăng cường và cải thiện Lexical Resource trong bài viết của bạn:

1. "the becoming of some countries similar to each other" có thể thay thế bằng "the increasing similarity between countries" hoặc "the trend of countries becoming more alike".

2. "the declining of discrimination level" có thể thay thế bằng "the reduction of discrimination" hoặc "the decrease in discriminatory practices".

3. "the products that are trended in developed countries" có thể thay bằng "the products that are popular in developed countries" hoặc "the products that are in high demand in developed countries".

4. "people do not have to travel to America" có thể thay bằng "people are not required to travel to America" hoặc "people no longer need to travel to America".

5. "purchasing of the same products" có thể thay thế bằng "the availability of identical products" hoặc "the global accessibility of identical products".

6. "leads people to not discriminate" có thể thay thế bằng "promotes non-discriminatory attitudes" hoặc "encourages inclusive behavior".

7. "be one unit" có thể thay thế bằng "form a cohesive whole" hoặc "establish a unified front".

Trên đây chỉ là những gợi ý nhỏ để bạn cải thiện từ vựng và tránh lặp lại sử dụng các cụm từ. Tuy nhiên, bài viết của bạn hiện tại đã sử dụng một số từ và cụm từ phù hợp với ngữ cảnh và không làm mất đi ý nghĩa của bài viết.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Many people believe that big businesses in addition to generating profits should be involved in and responsible for the social life of the community. To what extent do you agree or disagree? Give your opinion."
Essay:
"Large companies have always attempted to come into money; however, the issue of businesses' social compulsory responsibilities is a controversial issue among people. Personally, I entirely agree with the viewpoint that businesses have to do more for the community than make money, and I will explain why in this essay.

If large companies should take participate in social life in society, by fair and impartial looking, it could have some two-way profits for both businesses and the communities. This is the fundamental idea which its reasons are categorized into three main parts. First, Since people might not apprehend that all large companies are run with the sole purpose of marketing as much advantage as possible for their own, businesses could gain people's trust and foster them to invest their money in their projects. As an example, companies could replace their prioritization from economic growth with gaining people's satisfaction. 

Second, marketing development is the other advantageous consequence. It is notable, for instance, that it could offer a chance for discovering young people's talents who could not be a going concern on their own. Since businesses have to emphasize innovation and creativity in order to survive in a competitive world, they could hire talented young people, which is profitable for both sides. Third, it is generally accepted that thriving the community is imperative for a successful business. In other words, it seems that most of the prosperous activities flourish in a bustling atmosphere. So, if large companies are involved in society, they could indirectly create effective circumstances for their companies' future of business.

In summary, it might be said that expecting social obligations for large businesses in society is unacceptable because it is the government's responsibility for social supports, and companies should not take charge of it. However, it seems that the effects of this approach appear to be overwhelmingly positive, and its two-way beneficial impacts of the large companies and the communities are undeniable."

###
completion:
Về tổng thể, bài viết của bạn đã sử dụng một lượng từ vựng đa dạng và phù hợp với chủ đề yêu cầu của đề bài. Tuy nhiên, một số lỗi sai cụ thể trong từ vựng vẫn được phát hiện trong bài viết của bạn. Ví dụ như: 

- "come into money" (đoạn 1): cụm từ này không phù hợp với ngữ cảnh của bài viết, thay vì nó, bạn có thể sử dụng "make money" hoặc "earn profits".
- "circumstances" (đoạn 2): cụm từ này không phù hợp với cấu trúc câu và ý nghĩa của đoạn văn, hãy sử dụng "conditions" thay thế cho từ "circumstances".
- "imperative" (đoạn 2): từ này có nghĩa là "bắt buộc, cần thiết", nhưng trong ngữ cảnh của đoạn văn, từ này không được sử dụng chính xác với nghĩa mong muốn. Bạn có thể sử dụng "crucial" hoặc "essential" để truyền tải ý nghĩa đúng hơn.
- "unacceptable" (đoạn 3): từ này không phù hợp trong văn phong của bài viết, bạn có thể sử dụng "inappropriate" hoặc "unsuitable" để miêu tả suy nghĩ của người khác đối với vấn đề này.

Ngoài ra, trong một số trường hợp, bạn có thể sử dụng một số từ vựng cơ bản và trừu tượng quá nhiều. Ví dụ, "prosperous activities" trong đoạn 2 có thể được thay thế bằng "successful businesses" hoặc "thriving industries".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Nowadays museums have become more and more important. What are the purposes of places such as museums and how should they be funded?"
Essay:
"Currently, people are prone to be fading away and even be jeopardized by conventional architectures. Hence, there are several purposes for museums and galleries and a series of steps being taken are expected to preserve and strengthen the importance of these traditional buildings.
At the outset, the main function of museums and galleries is to demonstrate local citizens the fact regarding their ancestors’ lifestyle, traditional heritages, as well as local cultures. In other words, it is also one of the best means to educate children by the way that it creates a favorable condition for teenagers to gain deeper insight into the sacrifice of our predecessors and cultivate patriotism. Meanwhile, by enhancing the statue of museums domestic economy and countries’ image will be promoted because of the traveling industry which could appeal to a surge growth number of worldwide tourists by the charm of local architectures.
Encountering these potential targets, the governments have to take steps to preserve and upgrade these traditional values. Firstly, Governments could invest a large amount of money on social media such as TV or newspaper to promote museums and galleries image to emphasize the merits the traditional buildings bring and restore the appearance of it. Moreover, it could raise a citizen’s awareness of traditional identities. Besides, in terms of educating the next generation well, the government should spare no efforts to set up an educational fund. Authorities, for instance, could organize adolescences to visit it, and advocate that only by face-to-face could they appreciate the real values of culture and spirits in their country, and enjoy the historical and aesthetic atmosphere in the conventional architectures.
In my conclusion, without these conventional architectures, we would lose valuable treasures and are likely to be at a loss under the background of globalization when overseas cultures intrude. Consequently, nothing is more important to make a considerable investment fund on traditional buildings."

###
completion:
Các từ và cụm từ trong bài viết của bạn đa phần phù hợp với ngữ cảnh và ý nghĩa của từng câu. Tuy nhiên, tôi đã tìm thấy một số lỗi sai về từ vựng và cấu trúc câu. Dưới đây là danh sách các lỗi và giải thích:

1. "prone to be fading away" - sử dụng "prone to" không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh này. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "at risk of fading away" hoặc "vulnerable to fading away".

2. "jeopardized by conventional architectures" - từ "jeopardized" có nghĩa là đặt vào nguy hiểm, thiếu an toàn. Tuy nhiên, trong ngữ cảnh này, bạn có thể sử dụng "threatened by" thay vì "jeopardized by".

3. "demonstrate local citizens" - thay vì "demonstrate", bạn nên sử dụng "show" hoặc "display" để diễn đạt ý nghĩa một cách chính xác hơn.

4. "by the way that it creates a favorable condition" - cấu trúc câu này không cần thiết và gây rối, bạn có thể thay bằng "by creating a favorable condition".

5. "cultivate patriotism" - từ "cultivate" có nghĩa là trồng trọt, nuôi dưỡng. Trong ngữ cảnh này, bạn có thể sử dụng "foster patriotism" hoặc "promote patriotism" thay vì "cultivate patriotism".

6. "enhancing the statue of museums" - từ "statue" có nghĩa là tượng, trong khi trong ngữ cảnh này, bạn muốn nói về tầm quan trọng của các bảo tàng. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "enhancing the importance/role/significance of museums".

7. "domestic economy and countries' image will be promoted" - cấu trúc câu này không chính xác. Bạn có thể sửa lại thành "the domestic economy and the image of the country will be promoted".

8. "due to the traveling industry which could appeal to a surge growth number of worldwide tourists" - câu này cần được phục chế lại để trở nên rõ ràng và logic hơn. Bạn có thể sửa thành "due to the tourism industry, museums can attract a larger number of international tourists, contributing to a surge in economic growth".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"SOME PEOPLE BELIEVE THAT EVENTUALLY ALL JOBS WILL BE DONE BY ARTIFICIALLY INTELLIGENT ROBOTS. WHAT IS YOUR OPINION?"
Essay:
"These days with the advent of new technologies such as AI, a lot of people have lost their businesses and have been replaced by them. Someone may say that this process will continue, resulting in the loose of all the jobs. While others say that there are professions that only living humans can do. I agree with the latter opinion and process this view in this essay.

Most importantly, professions dealing with feelings are difficult to be managed by AI. It is a privilege for human beings to be moved, shocked or angry and needless to say, those emotions can not be understood by artificially made things. For example, jobs such as mental counsellors can not be replaced. This is because there are no patterns or concrete solutions that can be applied to a mental problem. Problems regarding sentiments are always different and so the solutions are uncountable like stars. It is impossible for AI to deal with it using a pattern programmed previously. 

On the other hand, someone may say that if we give all the accumulated information about a job, AI will be able to run the work. I agree to some extent but the more jobs AI steals, the more works people will nurture. AI is special in that it can use effectively all the past information. However, it is unable to make new things because it lacks creativity. Therefore, only humans are able to make innovations and innovative jobs can not be replaced by humans. 

In conclusion, AI will never replace all jobs because it can not understand feelings and give birth to innovations.
"

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, tôi chỉ tìm thấy một vài lỗi nhỏ về từ vựng, và có thể được cải thiện như sau:

1. Thay vì sử dụng từ "privilege" (đặc quyền), bạn có thể sử dụng từ "ability" (khả năng) để diễn đạt ý của mình một cách chính xác hơn.
Cải thiện: "It is an ability for human beings to be moved, shocked or angry..."

2. Thay vì sử dụng cụm từ "problems regarding sentiments" (vấn đề liên quan đến tình cảm) bạn có thể sử dụng từ "emotional issues" (vấn đề cảm xúc) để mô tả một cách chính xác hơn.
Cải thiện: "...there are no patterns or concrete solutions that can be applied to emotional issues."

3. Thay vì lặp lại cụm từ "artificially made things", bạn có thể sử dụng từ "artificial entities" (thực thể nhân tạo) để tăng tính đa dạng trong từ vựng của bạn.
Cải thiện: "...those emotions cannot be understood by artificial entities."
 END
