"it is common knowledge that tourism today creates numerous problems, such as pollution because of flights, traffic congestion, and water pollution. From my point of view there is no need to impose extra taxes on flights or accommodation.

on the one hand there is no denying fact that extra taxes on flights or accommodation will decrease tourism. definitely there are many individuals who are not wealthy and they save money for going and exploring new countries, however, there is no guarantee that it can be helpful, for instance one of my friends is not rich and at that time he had to go to another country but unfortunately the price for tickets were higher than it used to be and what is more accommodation was not cheap either, but he had no choice, therefore,therefore he paid for all of it, consequently if there is a desire or there is a necessity now matter how much will a person has to pay he will do it eventually

on the other hand, if governments impose extra taxes many humans will lose their interest, or if there is no necessity they will not spend a huge amount of money only on travelling, ,however it will not solve problems with pollution. for example pollution is not done by only tourism, many residents pollute our society they throw away their garbage in water or in the streets. Additionally many countries's economies are rich due to tourism, and if one-day people stop going to other countries those countries sooner or later will have many issues.

in conclusion, in my opinion governments should not impose extra taxes because it will cause more problems than now there are"

###
completion:
Lỗi về từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn không nhiều. Dưới đây là một số gợi ý để phát triển từ vựng của bạn:

1. Sử dụng từ vựng tiếng Anh một cách chính xác:
- Thay vì "it is common knowledge," bạn có thể sử dụng "it is widely known" hoặc "it is widely recognized."
- Thay vì "there is no denying fact," bạn có thể sử dụng "there is no denying the fact" hoặc "there is no denying the truth."
- Thay vì "many humans," bạn có thể sử dụng "many individuals" hoặc "many people."

2. Mở rộng từ vựng của bạn:
- Hãy sử dụng một loạt các từ đồng nghĩa để tránh lặp lại từ quá nhiều. Ví dụ: sử dụng từ "problems" có thể thay bằng "issues," "challenges," "drawbacks," hoặc "complications."
- Thêm vào đó, hãy cố gắng sử dụng các từ vựng chuyên ngành liên quan đến chủ đề du lịch và môi trường. Ví dụ: "tourist industry," "environmental impact," "ecosystem," "sustainable tourism," "carbon footprint," "conservation efforts," và "green initiatives."
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Women can do everything that men can and they even do it better. They also can do many things that men cannot. But it is a fact that their work is not appreciated as much as men's, although they have to sacrififice a lot for their family and career. It is said: "A woman's place is in the home." What do you think?"
Essay:
"Although in recent time, a lot of people is ignoring women's talent and skills. However, they have even better skills and dedication than men and it can happen only in the women's case of sacrificing their career for the wellbeing of the family because of the conventional thoughts about women. I personally disagree with the viewpoint that women's only job is to being home. 

To start with, if we erase the traditional past ideas and perceptions about women, we can understand that women has better skills than men and in any sectors of life they can perform and shine even better than men. Nonetheless, their skills and hardworks often remain unrecognizable because it is hardly accepted and appreciated by their male counterparts. Therefore, women sometimes feel less motivated and even reluctant to persue their career and explore their talent. Mostly in the rural area for example, women confine themselves in the four walls of home and do not want to participate in the society and economy.

However, women's achievement are very rarely celebrated by men because the patriarchal society always posseses a dominating attitudes towards women and they know very well that if women have a plenty of opportunities, they can also be their better partner not only in real life but also in the society.  Hence, they ignore their capabilities and try to demotivate them. 

In conclusion, we can come to the point that, we should not ignore the capability and interests of women to make them a better and skilled partner in the society."

###
completion:
Về mặt tài nguyên từ vựng, bài viết của bạn đã sử dụng một số từ ngữ phù hợp và tương đối chính xác. Tuy nhiên, vẫn có một số lỗi và cách dùng từ không thích hợp. Dưới đây là danh sách các lỗi và giải thích:

1. "in recent time" - Thay vì sử dụng "in recent time," bạn có thể sử dụng "recently" để diễn đạt ý "gần đây." Ví dụ: "Recently, people have been ignoring women's talent and skills."

2. "better skills and dedication than men" - Điều này là đúng và phù hợp với chủ đề. Tuy nhiên, bạn có thể sử dụng một số từ ngữ mạnh mẽ hơn để tạo sự rõ ràng và đáng tin cậy hơn. Ví dụ: "superior skills and unwavering dedication."

3. "women's only job is to being home" - Trong câu này, từ "being" không được sử dụng một cách chính xác. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "be" hoặc "stay" để diễn đạt ý "ở nhà." Ví dụ: "A woman's place is to be/stay at home."

4. "perform and shine even better than men" - Câu này chính xác và diễn đạt ý của bạn một cách rõ ràng.

5. "hardworks often remain unrecognizable" - Trong trường hợp này, từ "hardworks" không được sử dụng đúng từ nghĩa. Bạn có thể sử dụng "hard work" làm danh từ số ít. Ví dụ: "Their hard work often remains unrecognizable."

6. "they ignore their capabilities and try to demotivate them" - Từ "them" trong câu này không rõ ràng, bạn cần xác định nó đề cập đến ai. Ví dụ: "they ignore their capabilities and try to demotivate women."

7. "we should not ignore the capability and interests of women" - Câu này chính xác và diễn đạt ý của bạn một cách rõ ràng.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"currently there is a trend towards the use o alternative medicine. However, at best these mothods are ineffective, and at worst they may be dangerous.

To what extent do you agree with this statement?"
Essay:
"The economy of most countries is based on the medical industry. Pharmaceutical communities and the medical industry  will always accompany our societies. Although, the latest years a huge development occurs in different methods such as pills made from plants and herbs, and some new physical techniques used by alternative doctors.

Firstly, I strongly believe, that alternative methods may be better for human health, as they give you solutions with no artificial techniques. In addition, not all illnesses can disappear through these different processes. 

Secondly, pharmaceutical labs and medicine communities, don't give access to pills or schemes that can be helpful, and as a result, people die from various types of cancer. I know that in Switzerland there is a place for alternative methods against various types of cancer. So, people can apply for therapy, but the cost is very high and insurance companies and governments don't give help. Also, you have to stay there, for two or three months, and this will be repeated every year, until the end. 

I strongly believe that alternative medicine must use carefully, and if there is a choice of making a combination with subsisting one, to give better results. 

However, doctors, biologists, chemistries and pharmaceutical industries have to take advantage of each two issues and make a step forward for something that will give new fordable opportunities for everyone’s health."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, có một số lỗi về từ vựng và cách sử dụng không chính xác. Dưới đây là danh sách các lỗi sai và giải thích:

1. "huge development occurs" - Cụm từ này không hoàn toàn tương xứng với từ "phát triển". Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "significant progress" hoặc "substantial advancement" để truyền tải ý nghĩa một sự cải thiện đáng kể trong các phương pháp y tế thay thế.

2. "not all illnesses can disappear through these different processes" - Từ "disappear" không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh này. Thay vào đó, hãy sử dụng "be cured" hoặc "be treated" để truyền đạt ý nghĩa rằng không phải bệnh nào cũng có thể được chữa trị bằng các phương pháp y tế thay thế.

3. "give new fordable opportunities" - Từ "fordable" không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh này. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "affordable" để nói về cơ hội y tế mà mọi người có thể truy cập được mà không quá tốn kém.

4. "subsisting one" - Từ "subsisting" không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh này. Thay vào đó, hãy sử dụng "conventional" để chỉ các phương pháp y học truyền thống.

5. "doctors, biologists, chemistries, and pharmaceutical industries" - Từ "chemistries" không phù hợp ở đây. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể dùng từ "chemists" để chỉ những chuyên gia trong ngành hóa học.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"The older people who need employment have to compete with younger ones. What problems can this create? What are some solutions?"
Essay:
"In recent years, competition is increasing between young people and the old who are searching for same job. It causes some negative consequences and steps should be taken to tackle this problem.

There are some problems occur when the young and old are struggling to get the job. First of all, elderly people are not very adaptive and creative as youngers are and they do not very energetic to do work like younger. They may find some difficulties with usage of technology and to fulfill the requirements of company which could affect on their health and they might suffer both physically and psychologically. Older people have more difficulties to find a job even when they have same qualifications as younger and have experience also. While, some employers prefer older people with higher working experience rather than younger who have just graduated and having no work experience and good communication skills.

To solve this problem government should take some initiative in effective way. Government should encourages self-employment for fresh graduates so they can create job opportunities themselves. Then the retirement age should be decreased which reduce the pressure of competition the young have to face. Another possible way is to allocate more money to pension system because who find their pension sufficient for a living will not have to find a work. Moreover, younger people and government should support older person to use new technologies so they can do work well.

In conclusion, some problems occur in competition of youth and old to get job like technology and experience related but it can be solved by taking some measures like decrease retirement age and increase pension."

###
completion:
Từ vựng trong bài viết của bạn là tương đối phong phú và đúng ngữ cảnh. Tuy nhiên, có một số mắc lỗi nhỏ liên quan đến từ vựng và cách sử dụng từ vựng. Dưới đây là một số lỗi và giải thích:

1. "elderly people" - Một cách tốt hơn để diễn đạt ý này là sử dụng cụm từ "older individuals" hoặc "senior citizens".
2. "do work" - Thay vì sử dụng cụm từ này, bạn có thể sử dụng "perform tasks", "carry out work" hoặc "fulfill job responsibilities" để biểu đạt ý của bạn một cách chính xác hơn.
3. "increase pension" - Thay vì sử dụng cụm từ này, bạn có thể sử dụng "enhance pension benefits" hoặc "improve pension system" để diễn đạt ý của bạn một cách chính xác và đa dạng hơn.
4. "self-employment for fresh graduates" - Một cách tốt hơn là sử dụng cụm từ "entrepreneurship opportunities for recent graduates" để diễn đạt ý của bạn rõ ràng hơn.
5. "decrease retirement age" - Dùng cụm từ "lower the retirement age" sẽ phù hợp hơn trong ngữ cảnh này.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"In some countries, more and more people are becoming interested in finding out about the history of the houses or building they live in. 

What are reasons for this? 

How can people research this?"
Essay:
"There is a growing number of people who start to care about the history of their houses, flats or apartments in numerous nations nowadays. In the following essay, I will discuss what may contribute to this phenomenon and how people gain information about it.

To begin with, there are several factors that have responsibility for the society’s increasing interests in the history of the buildings where they live in. Firstly, house plays an important role in maintaining us keeping away from dangerous, in other words, house ensures our safety. As a result, it is of importance for individuals to understand that what had happened in the past before they choose the house or flat that they are going to live in. Secondly, with the knowledge of their houses and buildings, it is possible to make the residents to be proud of their community and become willing to participate in public decision, and enhance a sense of community.

As for the ways to gain an insight into the research, the elderly and the Internet are the two main resources to get information. From the aspect of the old, they have experienced a lot of experiences, and also have a possibility to suffer from some accidents that happened several years ago. If people want to acquire the first information about the house, building or accommodation, having an interview with elderly is a good manner. Searching on the Internet is another way to learn about the history, and it is also an efficient way.

	In conclusion, knowing the history of our houses or buildings enables us to enforce the sense of community, furthermore, it can help the society to be more careful to make a choice before buying houses, flats or departments."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, tự vựng đã được sử dụng một cách tương đối chính xác và phù hợp với chủ đề. Dưới đây là một số lỗi nhỏ và cách sửa chữa:

1. "house plays an important role in maintaining us keeping away from dangerous" - Đây là một ngữ cảnh không chính xác của từ "maintain". Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "house plays an important role in ensuring our safety" để diễn đạt ý nghĩa chính xác hơn.

2. "make the residents to be proud" - Thay vì sử dụng "make the residents to be proud", bạn có thể sử dụng "instill a sense of pride in the residents" hoặc "make the residents feel proud" để sử dụng từ ngữ phù hợp với ngữ cảnh.

3. "information about the house, building or accommodation" - Thay vì sử dụng "accommodation", bạn có thể sử dụng từ "property" hoặc "dwelling" để mô tả ngôi nhà, tòa nhà hoặc nơi ở.

4. "gain an insight into the research" - Thay vì sử dụng "gain an insight into the research", bạn có thể sử dụng "obtain information about the history" để diễn đạt ý nghĩa chính xác hơn.

5. "elderly" - Từ này khá phủ định và có thể gây ra sự nhầm lẫn hoặc không tôn trọng. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "older residents" hoặc "retired individuals" để diễn đạt ý nghĩa chính xác và văn minh hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people decide to start their own busniess instead of working hour for a company or organization. Do the advantages for people working for their own business outweigh the disadvantages?"
Essay:
"Nowadays, the majority of individuals are inspired to be self-employed rather than being an employee in either a company or organization. I personally believe the benefits such as flexible working hours and opportunity to earn much more profit far outweigh any potential drawbacks.

To begin with, there is a plethora of advantages of being a self-employed businessman. Despite some struggles at the beginning, the start-uppers may become successful and create job opportunities for other people. Furthermore, the amount of time spent on work depends on willingness of the boss. Whether they work hard and long, and consequently earn lots of money, or they might shorten their working hours and as a result reduce their income, whereas in large companies, people only have an hourly salary, and it does not matter, whether they do their best at work or have worked extra, they will have the appointed salary. Moreover, there  are some people who can not work under someone's control, they want to have financial freedom and become independent, working on theirselves.

On the negative side, the self-employed individuals may face some difficulties at the real beginning of developing their business. Although, the bosses need to work extra in order to become successful at the opening stage of their business, however as their companies grow, the risks of losing everything might cause health problems for individuals. For instance, the recent investigation has demonstrated that, 9 out of ten companies become bankrupt in the first five-year period. Apart from this, people working for themselves can not enjoy all the perks and facilities, which are provided in world-scale companies, such as Amazon or Apple, which provide their employees with bonuses, paid vacations, health insurance and etc.

In conclusion, in spite of factors such as creating a successful empire and also, feel relaxed and confident, it is worth to begin a new job, however there are some disadvantages, which I consider as unimportant."

###
completion:
1. "Start-uppers" - Trong văn viết, thay vì từ này, bạn có thể sử dụng "entrepreneurs" để diễn đạt người khởi sự kinh doanh.

2. "Plethora" - Từ này có nghĩa là một số lượng lớn, nhưng nó không chính xác hoặc phù hợp với ngữ cảnh bạn đang sử dụng. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng các từ được sử dụng phổ biến hơn như "a wide range/variety of" hoặc "numerous."

3. "Create job opportunities" - Thay vì sử dụng cụm từ này, bạn có thể sử dụng "generate employment" hoặc "provide employment opportunities" để diễn đạt ý tưởng một cách chính xác hơn.

4. "Work on theirselves" - Đây là một lỗi ngữ pháp. Đúng là "work on themselves" để diễn đạt ý tưởng làm việc độc lập.

5. "Perks and facilities" - Từ "perks" dùng để chỉ các phúc lợi, phần thưởng ngoài lương và "facilities" chỉ các cơ sở vật chất. Cả hai từ này có ý nghĩa đúng, nhưng không phù hợp với ngữ cảnh của câu. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể dùng cụm từ "additional benefits and amenities" hoặc "extra incentives and resources."
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Today more people are overweight than ever before.What in your opinion are the primary causes of this? What are the main effects of this epidemic?"
Essay:
"Being overweight is becoming more widespread among many people these days. This essay will examine the causes as well as the effects  related to this tendency.

There are a variety of different causes for this matter . To begin with, the foremost causes of gaining weight are inactive lifestyles and unhealthy leisure activities. Technology is increasingly developing to help people less physically demanding at work. For example, my father after a stressful day at the company,  will relax by surfing Facebook, and YouTube instead of walking and exercising Another contributing factor to mention is using fast food in place of a main meal. These foods are prone to bacterial contamination, and contain a lot of preservatives. For example, if we eat too much fast food, a large amount of fat and preservation are absobe into the body causing diseases

Unexpectedly, there are some to be taken into consideration.  The first and most important is to cause blood pressure diseases. Another effect no less important is easy to cause inferiority. For example, an overweight person needs to put more effort to complete some tasks than a person with a normal weight

In conclusion,  overweight is a big problem that affects a lot of people nowadays. It’s mainly caused by  lifestyles and unhealthy leisure activities. From what has been discussed, it is advised that should be a healthy lifestyle"

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, ngữ pháp của bạn có đôi chỗ cần sửa đổi và điều chỉnh. Dưới đây là các lỗi sai và giải thích của chúng:

1. Inactive lifestyles and unhealthy leisure activities: không có lỗi trong từ vựng này, nhưng bạn có thể cải thiện bằng cách thay đổi cấu trúc câu để giúp việc trình bày của bạn trở nên phong phú hơn. Ví dụ: "The primary causes leading to weight gain are sedentary lifestyles and unhealthy leisure activities."

2. Relax by surfing Facebook, and YouTube instead of walking and exercising: lỗi sai ngữ pháp, cần xóa dấu phẩy sau "Facebook" và sử dụng "or" thay vì "and". Ví dụ: "Relax by surfing Facebook or YouTube instead of walking and exercising.

3. Another contributing factor to mention is using fast food in place of a main meal: từ vựng phù hợp, không có lỗi. Tuy nhiên, cấu trúc câu có thể cải thiện bằng cách sử dụng các từ ngữ kết nối mạch lạc hơn. Ví dụ: "Another significant factor to consider is the substitution of fast food for a regular meal."

4. These foods are prone to bacterial contamination, and contain a lot of preservatives: cần xóa dấu phẩy sau "contamination" và sử dụng "that" thay cho "and". Ví dụ: "These foods are prone to bacterial contamination that contains a lot of preservatives."

5. Overweight is a big problem that affects a lot of people nowadays: từ vựng đúng, không có lỗi. Để cải thiện cấu trúc câu, bạn có thể sử dụng các từ ngữ kết nối như "Furthermore" để tạo sự liên kết và mạch lạc hơn. Ví dụ: "Furthermore, obesity is a significant issue that affects a large number of people in the present day."

Tổng thể, các từ và cụm từ mà bạn đã sử dụng trong bài viết có ý nghĩa phù hợp và thích hợp với ngữ cảnh. Tuy nhiên, để nâng cao điểm số Lexical Resource, bạn nên cố gắng sử dụng một loạt từ vựng và cấu trúc câu phức tạp để thể hiện sự linh hoạt và sự behội ích ngôn ngữ của bạn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"It is important for children to learn the diffrence between right and wrong ar an early age. Punishment is necessary to help them learn this distinction.

To what wxtent do you agree or disagree with this opinion.

what sort of punishment should parents and teachers be allowed to use to teach good behavior to children"
Essay:
"It is essential for toddlers and kids to learn the difference to what is acceptable and what it is not at early age. Some people believe that given them a punishment is vital to help them to grow and learn the difference. I strongly agree with this mentallity because children will become adults and need to follow society's rules and parents and teachers should remove toys or phones that children love to punish them to allow them learn good behaviour.

Children need to learn the difference between right and wrong at very early age because they will become adults who need to follow society's rules. Firstly, when children learn at early age that means  not following rules, this will led them to no valuable items such as toys, cellphones or watchin TV. As result, they learn the importance of following parent's rules. Also, they experience what means to be rejected by parents or teachers because they did not follow instructions, so these type of behaviour is similar with adult's rules. Foe instance, in The United Statesm if people do not follow trafic rules, they might get a ticket and need to pay a fine, and if they do not pay the bill, they might go to prison.

Parents and teachers should punish children when they do not follow instructions, and one way is to removing valuable itmes such as cellpones or not having the privilige to watch a TV program. To begin with, learning the importance of follow directions at early age, allow them to think the difference of not be part of a system. However when children do not follow direccions, they need to suffer some consequences like going to bed without dessert, so they might feel pain for not enjoy life like the rest of the children. To illustrate, in most countries, parents punish their children by giving them thinking time when they do not obey at home, and this help children to have time and think for a way to apologize and learn from having a bad behaviour.

To conclude, it is vital for children to learn what is acceptable or what is not at early age to allow them to learn how human beings behave in a society because later on these children will be adults as well. More importantly, parents and teachers should help to disciplinate these kids at home and at schools, so they can have a better understanding of the importance of beahave well. If children are not punish at early age, they migh encounter difficult to adapt to society."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, tổng thể Lexical Resource của bạn khá tốt. Bạn sử dụng rộng các từ vựng và cụm từ phù hợp với chủ đề. Tuy nhiên, còn một số lỗi và cải thiện có thể được thực hiện. Dưới đây liệt kê các lỗi và giải thích chi tiết:

1. "mentallity" - Lỗi chính tả. Từ đúng là "mentality".

2. "led them to no valuable items" - Cấu trúc câu không chính xác. Đúng là "led them to lose valuable items" hoặc "resulted in them losing valuable items."

3. "watchin TV" - Lỗi chính tả. Từ đúng là "watching TV".

4. "Foe instance" - Lỗi chính tả. Từ đúng là "For instance".

5. "The United Statesm" - Lỗi chính tả. Từ đúng là "The United States".

6. "punish their children by giving them thinking time" - Cụm từ không chính xác. Đúng là "punish their children by giving them time to reflect".

7. "beahave well" - Lỗi chính tả. Từ đúng là "behave well".
 END

- Thay "building" bằng "structure" hoặc "edifice"
- Thay "flat" bằng "apartment"

2. Sử dụng collocation và kết hợp từ ngữ:
- Thay "finding out about" bằng "exploring" hoặc "researching"
- Thay "interested in" bằng "fascinated by" hoặc "captivated by"
- Sử dụng cụm từ như "historic buildings", "architectural heritage", "ancestral homes", "cultural significance" để nâng cao mức độ chuyên ngành của bài viết

Dưới đây là một số ví dụ về cách thay đổi ngôn ngữ:

Gốc: "In some countries, more and more people are becoming interested in finding out about the history of the houses or buildings they live in." 
Đề xuất: "In several nations, an increasing number of individuals are fascinated by the historical background of their residences or edifices."

Gốc: "To begin with, the house plays an important role in keeping us away from danger, in other words, the house ensures our safety."
Đề xuất: "First and foremost, the dwelling assumes a pivotal role in preserving our well-being, in other words, it safeguards our safety."

Gốc: "Secondly, with the knowledge of their houses and buildings, it is possible to make residents proud of their community and become willing to participate in public decisions, and enhance a sense of community."
Đề xuất: "Furthermore, familiarity with their residences and structures can instill a sense of pride in inhabitants and foster community engagement, thus bolstering a sense of communal identity."
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people think that everyone has the right to have access to university education, and that governments should make it free for all students no matter what financial background they have. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this opinion."
Essay:
"Nowadays, especially in a knowledge-based society, the acquisition of a tertiary degree plays a vital role in finding good jobs so some people think that universal university education should be implemented, besides the government should cover higher education tuition of students regardless of their socio-economic backgrounds. In my opinion, I believe that these changes can bring a number of advantages ; however, their drawbacks are more significant.

It is acknowledged that the availability of tertiary education without tuition fees can have several positive impacts on  individuals and society. This is because thanks to such education available, more people have the opportunity to study specialized knowledge, thus they probably enhance their lives with a tertiary degree to get a job with a high salary and it also contributesto  a more educated workforce to countries. Moreover, the provision of free-of-charge education could create a balanced opportunity for all students, especially for poor students who cannot afford to study at university due to prohibitively expensive tuition fees. As a result, these changes may improve the country's economy and bridge the gap between the rich and the poor.

However, this line of reasoning is flawed because of the long-term dire consequence on the country’s development of these changes. To be specific, everyone entitled to university will reduce the competition among individuals so it will make them less motivated to try and improve their academic ability to pursue university education.Besides, the free-college policy can cause students who study at university lose the motivation to study hard. Consequently, the bachelor’s degree will lose its value and even the quality of education in university can be affected significantly, resulting in a reduction in the ability of the workforce which has a key role in the development of a country . In addition, the part of the budget allocated to other aspects such as the transport system, economy and health system will be spent on education, leading to tax hikes and social welfare reduction, meaning the standard of living of residents will be affected.

In conclusion, I believe that the government should not implement the availability of tertiary education without tuition fees because of its risks."

###
completion:
Tài nguyên từ vựng của bạn trong bài viết đã rất tốt và bạn đã sử dụng một loạt các từ và cụm từ phù hợp để truyền đạt ý kiến ​​của mình. Dưới đây là một số gợi ý để cải thiện sự sử dụng từ vựng:

1. Trong câu "This is because thanks to such education available, more people have the opportunity to study specialized knowledge", bạn có thể sử dụng từ "accessible" thay vì "available" để truyền đạt ý nghĩa một cách chính xác hơn.

2. Trong câu "thus they probably enhance their lives with a tertiary degree to get a job with a high salary", từ "probably" không phù hợp ở đây. Bạn có thể thay thế nó bằng từ "likely" hoặc "potentially" để giữ cho ý nghĩa của câu không bị mất đi.

3. Trong câu "it also contributesto a more educated workforce to countries", từ "contribute" nên được sửa thành "contributes" để phù hợp với chủ ngữ "it".
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some pepole say that teenagers should work part-time and earn money. This way they will learn basic lessons about work and becom disciplined. Others argue that teenagers should not sacrifice their rest and after-school activities to work .

Discusee both views and give your opinion."
Essay:
"In recent conditions, there are two different arguments about the young generation. The first argument is the young generation should work part-time and earn money, so they can learn new knowledge from that. And the other view is that teenagers should focus on their school. These two perspectives have  advantages and disadvantages.

The teenagers who work part-time will get new experiences that will improve their abilities and knowledge. They will respect the value of money and will become disciplined. Otherwise, it can make the young generation can not focus on their school. They feel tired with their part-time and then at their school they only sleep. From this view, teenagers can not enjoy their school activities.

Maybe the student will lose their life at their school.

The other perspective is about the student must focus on their school activities. They can learn a lot from their lecturer. Many college do not permit their student to work part-time because they want their student to focus on their curriculum. This view may be a warning because the student will only get a theory of life not the practical.

 The student also needs the practical for their sustained life.

In my opinion, we can combine the two perspectives. The young generation sometimes gets to know the part-time at the season and then focus on their school. So it will be balanced in their life.

We can conclude that perspective about the activity the teenager was debatable but they can be combined to complete each other"

###
completion:
1. "In recent conditions" - Thay vì sử dụng "in recent conditions", hãy sử dụng "in recent times" hoặc "in recent years" để diễn đạt ý của bạn một cách chính xác hơn.

2. "The first argument is the young generation should work part-time and earn money" - Thay vì "the young generation should work part-time and earn money", tốt hơn nên sử dụng "teenagers should work part-time and earn money" để đảm bảo tính chính xác và nhất quán.

3. "so they can learn new knowledge from that" - Thay vì "new knowledge from that", hãy sử dụng "new skills and knowledge" để mô tả chính xác hơn về những gì người trẻ có thể học được từ công việc bán thời gian.

4. "Otherwise, it can make the young generation can not focus on their school" - Thay vì "make the young generation can not focus on their school", hãy sử dụng "prevent/hamper the young generation from focusing on their school" để diễn đạt ý của bạn một cách chính xác hơn.

5. "From this view, teenagers can not enjoy their school activities" - Thay vì "from this view, teenagers can not enjoy their school activities", hãy sử dụng "from this perspective, teenagers may not be able to fully enjoy their school activities" để diễn đạt ý của bạn một cách rõ ràng và chính xác hơn.

6. "Maybe the student will lose their life at their school" - Thay vì "lose their life at their school", hãy sử dụng "miss out on their school life" để diễn đạt ý của bạn một cách chính xác hơn.

7. "Many college do not permit their student to work part-time" - Thay vì "Many college do not permit their student to work part-time", hãy sử dụng "Many colleges do not permit their students to work part-time" để đảm bảo tính chính xác ngữ pháp và cấu trúc câu.

8. "They can learn a lot from their lecturer" - Thay vì "from their lecturer", hãy sử dụng "from their teachers/ professors" để diễn đạt ý của bạn một cách chính xác hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"it is generally believed that some people are born with certain talents for instance for sports or music and others not.Discuss both view and your opinion"
Essay:
"Some believe talent is the priority for success, but others believe talent does not play a role in success. Also, education and perseverance are more important than that. I agree with both groups.

All human beings are born with different talents, which can be said that a large part of them is transmitted through genetics, but it cannot be said that it includes all cases. Many talents of every human being are unknown and should be known through experience in different fields. If you know your talents, you can quickly develop them and be more creative.

Others believe in the beneficial effect of education. If you do not have any knowledge or talent in various fields such as music or art, with regular effort and good and educated teachers, you have a greater chance of success. Although trying can be much more challenging, its effect is more permanent. Frequent and regular effort can be much better than empty talent because you know and strengthen your weaknesses with practice.

In short, talent plays a significant role as long as you know them. The following condition is attractive, automatically making you practice or develop yourself, and these three things will lead to progress. Like Homayoun Shajarian, who, in addition to his talent and interest in music, his father's teachings and other teachers made him practice for years, and finally, after many years, he released his album and surprised everyone."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, từ vựng và cụm từ được sử dụng khá tốt. Tuy nhiên, vẫn có một số lỗi nhỏ cần chú ý. Dưới đây là danh sách các lỗi sai và giải thích:

1. "but others believe talent does not play a role in success": Ở đây, từ "play a role" kết hợp với giới từ "in" không phù hợp. Thay vào đó, bạn nên sử dụng "have a role" hoặc "play a part" mà không cần giới từ "in".

2. "regular effort and good and educated teachers, you have a greater chance of success": Trong câu này, có sự lặp lại không cần thiết của từ "and". Bạn có thể xóa bỏ "and" tại sau từ "good" để câu trở nên phong phú hơn.

3. "Frequent and regular effort can be much better than empty talent because you know and strengthen your weaknesses with practice": Ở đây, từ "empty" không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh này. Bạn có thể sử dụng từ "natural" hoặc "innate" để diễn đạt ý muốn của bạn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people believe that children should study all subjects at school, while others think they should only study subjects they are good at or find interesting. Discuss both views and give your opinion.

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience."
Essay:
"more and more people reckon that juveniles have to learn whole school courses. however, others argue that they should only teach subjects they are enjoying in and that they find themself in. i believe that young students at that age should explore all subjects. then, they will know which subject attracts them more.

on the one hand, several people think that they should follow contemporary education method. which is to allow the children to choose what he good in only. in fact, this method is not effective. as, the young student doesn't aware of what is most appropriate for him and mostly, children are tending to choose the things which bring a happy feeling. for instance, a study  published at New York University recently concluded that most of the young students at that age 90 per cent are choosing the wrong option. therefore, all educational options must be obligated.

 

on the other hand, other people argue that juveniles must learn all courses. as, is really crucial to be aware of all subjects and discover what they are really good in and what they are deserve in the future. in other words, exploring the whole subject also give them sufficient information about everything around them. As a result they will in a good understanding level in every course core. for example, In ,China they commit  young children to learn English language. As a result about 90 per cent of Chinese able to speak English fluently. moreover, this is a kind of merit, because major  occupation seeking for employee who speaks English language.

To conclude, in my opinion, I reckon all subjects must be obligatory as  It is really significant to commit the young pupil to explore all subjects initially. then, when he grows he will find the real course he wants to engage. more over obligated subjects are beneficial but in the future. since the young person doesn't has sufficient experience to choose what is  best for him."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, có một số lỗi sai liên quan đến từ vựng và cách sử dụng chính xác các từ, cụm từ trong ngữ cảnh. Dưới đây là danh sách những lỗi sai và giải thích của chúng:

1. "reconk" (thay vì "reckon") - Đây là một lỗi chính tả. Từ đúng là "reckon" để diễn đạt ý nghĩa "tin rằng" hoặc "cho rằng".
2. "juvenile" - Từ này sử dụng không chính xác để thay thế cho "children". Thay vào đó, bạn nên sử dụng từ "children".
3. "he good in" (thay vì "they are good at") - Lỗi sai trong cấu trúc câu. Để diễn đạt ý nghĩa "giỏi môn học nào đó", bạn nên sử dụng cấu trúc "be good at" thay vì "good in".
4. "bring a happy feeling" (thay vì "give a pleasurable feeling") - Từ "bring" không phù hợp trong trường hợp này. Bạn nên sử dụng từ "give" để diễn đạt ý nghĩa "đem lại".
5. "then, when he grows" (thay vì "then, as they grow") - Sử dụng "he" để thay thế cho "they" là không chính xác. Bạn nên sử dụng "they" để ám chỉ số ít và ám chỉ không rõ giới tính.

Ngoài ra, có một vài từ, cụm từ trong bài viết không hoàn toàn phù hợp với ngữ cảnh hoặc không được sử dụng một cách chính xác. Ví dụ, bạn đã sử dụng từ "merit" để diễn đạt ý nghĩa "lợi ích" trong câu "this is a kind of merit". Tuy nhiên, từ "merit" ít được sử dụng theo cách này và bạn có thể sử dụng từ "advantage" hoặc "benefit" để thể hiện ý nghĩa tốt hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people prefer one-on-one lessons, while others prefer groups. Discuss both views and give your opinion."
Essay:
"According to some folks, private lessons are more efficient; however, a group of people think that public tutoring is more beneficial. This essay will elaborate on both views and my opinion favoring the latter proposition.

On the one hand, individuals choose personal classes for an array of reasons. The first and foremost key reason is that they better understand any topic or subject. It is due to their comfort level with asking any questions they have. They do not feel comfortable and are rather shy to ask their teachers to repeat a lesson if they do not get a proper idea about that topic when other students are there because they think those people will make fun of them for a silly question. They are not bothered by this type of problem if they enroll in private classes; therefore, they can ask multiple times, and by doing this, they will have an in-depth understanding of the lesson, which will help them during their exams in achieving higher grades. For instance, it is observed that the toppers who have secured higher ranks had private classes to prepare for their examinations. Moreover, it is undoubtedly true that personal coaches can appropriately train their learners. They can focus individually and perfectly, even on simple methods, since they have more time to guide them. Most parents, for instance, choose private sports trainers for their kids to make sure about the decent personal techniques provided by the trainers.

On the other hand, some hold a view that group training has adequate merits for various reasons. Firstly, they will get a chance to learn from the other’s doubts. In simple words, if a number of trainees are involved in coaching, there are chances of several queries from individuals, and to solve their doubts, an educator will have to go for back-and-forth. Through this activity, all learners will have better knowledge about the topic because of a plethora of revisions. Secondly, it is affordable for most people. It is undoubtedly true that public tutorials charge less than private ones, and hence most guardians of juveniles who have low income can afford them. Thirdly, it can improve the basic skills of group class takers. To put it simply, one can have abundant chances to communicate with fellow members, and also they can help each other to clear their doubts. By doing this, they will have the skill of teamwork, which will help them in the long run.

In conclusion to the aforementioned statements, it can be stated that both views have some merits; however, in my opinion, people should select the group classes because it is more advantaegous than the private classes."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, chỉ có một số lỗi nhỏ về từ vựng và một số từ, cụm từ không phù hợp với ngữ cảnh. Dưới đây là danh sách các lỗi lớn nhỏ mà tôi đã phát hiện:

1. "according to some folks" - Bạn đã sử dụng cụm từ này để chỉ ra ý kiến của một số người, nhưng cụm từ này không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh bài viết của bạn. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "some people" hoặc "some individuals".

2. "better understand any topic or subject" - Thay vì "any topic or subject", nên sử dụng cụm từ "a topic or subject" để diễn đạt ý của bạn một cách chính xác hơn.

3. "For instance, it is observed that the toppers who have secured higher ranks had private classes to prepare for their examinations." - Câu này có thể được diễn đạt một cách tốt hơn. Thay vì "it is observed", hãy nói rõ nguồn thông tin cụ thể hoặc chỉ ra rằng đó là ý kiến cá nhân của bạn.

4. "they can help each other to clear their doubts" - Thay vì "clear their doubts", sử dụng "resolve their doubts" hoặc "answer their questions" để đưa ra ý của bạn một cách chính xác hơn.

5. "In conclusion to the aforementioned statements" - Thay vì "in conclusion to", hãy sử dụng cụm từ "to conclude" để kết luận một cách rõ ràng hơn.

Các lỗi trên chỉ là những lỗi nhỏ và không ảnh hưởng nhiều đến sự hiểu ngữ nghĩa tổng thể của bài viết. Tuy nhiên, hãy chú ý cho đến từ vựng và cụm từ một cách chính xác để đảm bảo rằng bạn truyền đạt ý kiến của mình một cách chính xác và hiệu quả.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"In many countries, schools have severe problems with student behavior. What do you think are the causes of this What solutions can you suggest"
Essay:
"In many nations, school struggle with serious issues regarding misbehaviour of pupils. In my opinion, there are several reasons why indiscipline behaviour increase among students including, overcrowded classrooms in school, violence on the social media, however, there some measures to tackle this issue namely, build more school, banned violence in social media. 

On the one hand, the primary reason for misbehaviour of students is crowded on classrooms in the school. This is because teachers face challenges to maintain discipline among of children reuslt of increase the number of students in the classrooms. For example, in some school in Saudi Arabia teachers teach over 50 students , which means teachers unable to deal with a huge number of students. Violence in the social media is another reason why unacceptable behaviour increase among students. This is due to the face that, children watch  violent images on social media platform namely, Facebook, and  Twitter. Therefore, children will copy what they see on the social media and  apply it on the classrooms on school. 

On the other hand, there are many actions can taken by the government to addressing this problem. The first effective measure, the government should provide more funding for education sector  in order to build more school, which this step can contribute to reduce the number of students on classrooms. As a result, it  will become more easy for teachers to maintain  discipline among pupils. Prohibited violent images on social media is another efficient measure to mitigate misbehaviour of pupils. For instance, the government should introduce harsh laws to banned violent images on social media.

To sum up, From my perspective , there are different  reasons why school suffer from unacceptable behaviour among pupils namely , overcrowded classrooms in school, violent images on the social media, however, there some solutions to cope with  this problem  like , build more school, Prohibited images violence in social media."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, có một số lỗi từ vựng và sự không phù hợp với ngữ cảnh. Dưới đây là danh sách các lỗi và giải thích:

1. "banned": Trong bài viết, bạn sử dụng "banned" như một động từ. Tuy nhiên, từ đúng nên sử dụng là "ban" trong trường hợp này. "Banned" là dạng quá khứ và phân từ phức của "ban", không đúng với ngữ cảnh hiện tại.
   - Ví dụ lỗi: "The government should introduce harsh laws to banned violent images on social media."
   - Sửa lỗi: "The government should introduce harsh laws to ban violent images on social media."

2. "violent images": Trong bài viết, bạn sử dụng thuật ngữ "violent images" để nói về nội dung bạo lực trên mạng xã hội. Tuy nhiên, trong ngữ cảnh này, từ "violent content" sẽ phù hợp hơn để bao gồm cả hình ảnh, video và bài viết có nội dung bạo lực.
   - Ví dụ lỗi: "children watch violent images on social media platform namely, Facebook, and Twitter."
   - Sửa lỗi: "children watch violent content on social media platforms namely, Facebook, and Twitter."

3. "disabled violence": Trong bài viết, bạn sử dụng cụm từ "disabled violence" để nói về cấm bạo lực. Tuy nhiên, cụm từ này không chính xác trong ngữ cảnh. Đúng hơn nên sử dụng "prohibit violence" để diễn đạt ý bạn muốn truyền tải.
   - Lỗi không đúng: "Prohibited violent images on social media."
   - Sửa lỗi: "Prohibit violent images on social media."
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people think that the best way to reduce the crime is to give longer prison sentences. Others ,however,believe there are better alternative ways of reducing crime. Discuss both views"
Essay:
"In the last decade the number of crimes has increased fiercely together with the punishments for different atrocities.This essay will focus on evaluating peoples’ views on this topic.

   It is often said that lawbreakers tend to commit crimes inasmuch as they are not utterly punished,without taking in the consideration the surroundings.Moreover,it is not a secret that a large number of delinquents,offenders, end up in the prison because of breaking the law subsequently  they get arrested.Besides,some of them committed felonies,such as homicides,sexual assault,terrorism,animal cruelty,kidnapping ,so they must be imprisoned for a long time and hence in extreme poor conditions.In this way,the criminals can not present any danger to the society,consequently the crime rate is expected to decrease.

  Notwithstanding the aspects and deep controversial opinions,the history shows us some techniques of dealing with criminals;for instance,in Eastern Europe ,people accused of crime would be sentenced to death by such means as burning alive,drowning,beating to death.In this particular way,they could not present any danger to the society.Although, this type of punishment was abolished in 1983, a great part of volunteers,writers,citizens around the world are currently thinking about the idea of bringing back death penalty.Not only does it provide a definite way to prevent crimes and keep the world a safe place,but it also leads to an economical growth for the country,since the offenders  are fed from  the state budget together with the medical care and other supplies provided.Conversely ,some people are seldom imprisoned for a crime they didn’t commit ,as a result,they are prone to capital punishment regardless their innocence.

   To sum up the message of the essay,people take different looks towards particular situations;therefore ,it is better to prevent than to fight against."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, có một số lỗi và vấn đề liên quan đến từ vựng và cụm từ sử dụng không phù hợp. Dưới đây là một số ví dụ:

1. "committed felonies" - Thay vì sử dụng cụm từ này, bạn có thể sử dụng "committed serious crimes" hoặc "committed major offences" để tránh lặp từ "commit" và sử dụng từ vựng chính xác hơn.

2. "conversely, some people are seldom imprisoned for a crime they didn’t commit" - Từ "seldom" không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh này. Bạn có thể thay thế bằng "occasionally" hoặc "rarely" để diễn đạt ý của mình một cách chính xác hơn.

3. "the offenders are fed from the state budget" - Từ "fed" không phù hợp trong ngữ cảnh này. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "supported" hoặc "maintained" để truyền đạt ý rằng nhà nước chi trả cho việc nuôi dưỡng tội phạm trong nhà tù.

4. "people accused of crime would be sentenced to death by such means as burning alive, drowning, beating to death" - Cụm từ "means as" không chính xác. Bạn có thể sử dụng cụm từ "methods such as" hoặc "forms of punishment including" để diễn đạt ý của mình một cách chính xác hơn.

5. "a great part of volunteers" - Thay vì sử dụng "a great part of", bạn có thể sử dụng "a significant number of" hoặc "many" để tránh lặp lại từ "great".

6. "lead to an economical growth" - Thay vì sử dụng "an economical growth", bạn có thể sử dụng "economic growth" để biểu đạt ý của mình một cách chính xác hơn.

Những lỗi và vấn đề nêu trên chỉ đại diện cho một số vấn đề về từ vựng và cụm từ trong bài viết của bạn. Để nâng cao sự chính xác và đa dạng từ vựng, bạn cần lưu ý ôn lại ngữ pháp và từ vựng, cũng như đọc nhiều tài liệu văn bản để có sự sử dụng từ vựng một cách chính xác và tự tin hơn.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Some people believe that air travelshould be restricted because it causes serious pollution and up the world's fuel resources. to what extent do you agree or disagree?"
Essay:
"It has always been argued that travelling by aeroplane ought to be banned as it creates pollution and consumes more fossil fuels. I totally disagree with this given statement and this essay shall shed light upon my perspective in the subsequent paragraphs along with a reasoned conclusion. 

Foremost, the fundamental reason behind my disagreement is that nowadays, the majority of people prefer to travel by aeroplane as it saves time for travelling, so it is important for each and every person because they may spend their time on other essential work. For instance, a survey conducted by Harward University revealed that around the globe air travelling is popular among the population as it takes less time to reach any particular place than other transportation. 

Besides this, growth in the economy of nations. If people travel by aeroplane to the foreign countries for explore the different types of locations, the region may earn huge amounts of capital where people would prefer to go there. Fie example, an article published by The Tribune newspaper showed that Thailand is developing their country with the assistance of air travelling as there are more tourist spots available. Hence, it is fruitful for the country's improvement. 

To conclude, although air travelling puts an adverse on the atmosphere because it creates pollution, there are a few advantages it is not save time but increases the economic rate."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, có một số lỗi về từ vựng và sử dụng cụm từ không hợp ngữ cảnh. Dưới đây là một số lỗi cụ thể:

1. "It has always been argued": Từ "argued" đã được sử dụng sai ở đây. Thay vào đấy, bạn có thể sử dụng từ "suggested" hoặc "claimed" để diễn đạt ý của mình.

2. "Given statement": Từ cụm này không hợp ngữ cảnh vì không cần thiết. Bạn có thể đơn giản hóa câu bằng cách nói "I totally disagree with this statement".

3. "Shed light upon": Mặc dù cụm từ này không sai về mặt ngữ nghĩa, nó được coi là một cụm từ cứng và hơi không phổ biến trong tiếng Anh. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng từ "discuss" hoặc "explore" để diễn đạt ý một cách tự nhiên hơn.

4. "Population as it takes less time to reach any particular place than other transportation": Cụm từ này không được sắp xếp một cách chính xác và không rõ ràng. Bạn có thể diễn đạt ý của mình dễ dàng hơn bằng cách sử dụng cụm từ "travelling by airplane is faster than other forms of transportation, allowing people to reach their destinations more quickly."

5. "Fie example": Từ "fie" được sử dụng không chính xác ở đây. Bạn có thể sử dụng "for example" hoặc "for instance" để đưa ra ví dụ.

6. "The Tribune newspaper": Tên báo chính xác là "Tribune" mà không có giới hạn "the". 

7. "Adverse on the atmosphere": Từ "adverse" không phù hợp với ngữ cảnh này. Thay vào đó, bạn có thể sử dụng "negative impact on the atmosphere" hoặc "harmful effects on the environment".

Lưu ý rằng một số lỗi chúng tôi đã liệt kê ở trên có thể chỉ là những điểm cần được cải thiện nhỏ. Trong tổng quan, bài viết của bạn đã sử dụng một loạt từ vựng và cụm từ hợp lý để truyền đạt ý kiến của mình.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"Big salary is much more important than job satisfaction.

Do you agree or disagree?

Provide relevant examples if necessary."
Essay:
"A great number of us believe that a huge, tempting salary is more valuable than being content with our jobs. Indeed, the special time of enjoyment and contentment is when we spend our stacks of cash extravagantly during the holidays. The vast majority does not think for a second that jobs could make them happy. Generations of workers have their minds programmed to bear one thought; that you either have financial welfare or satisfaction with your occupation. Be that as it may, I completely disagree with this common view. One should certainly be enjoying their work, which should simultaneously be their passion. The following paragraphs will explore my personal perspective.

It is undeniable that stability is ensured once an adult secures a position in a high-paying corporation. Precisely, the basic office job which pays the bills, keeps the children’s tummies full, and affords good education. However, why would an individual follow a career path predetermined for them, in which their success has a definite limit? Moreover, most workers are depressed by how they spend their 9 AM-5 PM hours, but are brainwashed into believing it is the best way. In such a scenario, we must take a step back, and question what makes life worth living. A huge portion of one’s week lacks any hint of joy, and that is a conscious choice on their part. While those 40 hours are naturally filled with hard work, one is free to choose whether it is for a desk job for a company that does not care about employees, or for a passion.

Furthermore, large companies justify cruel treatment to their employees due to the amount of money they are paid. The most important lesson I have learnt in my lifetime is that no amount of cash can buy dignity. Thus, everyone should be treated with the utmost respect and consideration. In addition to that, when you have motivation and drive to achieve your dream occupation, you are more likely to. Certainly, you will not be glowing with determination in a position you dislike. Thus, once you do succeed in your preferred path, you kill two birds with one stone. On top of that, remember that life is not worth living without bliss. The fear to dismiss a conventional method is prevalent among society. Nonetheless, anyone brave enough to contradict the rules never regrets it.

In conclusion, it is true that conventional ways guarantee basic life needs and some other things every now and then. Nevertheless, no individual should be held captive by a corporation that redeems them as expendable. Turning your fantasies to reality require resilience and patience, but it is worth it. Thereafter, colors become vibrant as they once were in childhood. Ultimately, I disagree with the perspective of the majority. Bliss is undoubtedly of more value than income."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, không có quá nhiều lỗi về từ vựng. Tuy nhiên, tôi muốn nhắc nhở bạn về một số từ và cụm từ có thể sử dụng để tránh lặp lại và làm cho bài viết của bạn mang tính đa dạng hơn. Dưới đây là một số gợi ý và giải thích:

1. "tempting salary" - Bạn có thể thay thế cụm từ này bằng "attractive salary" hoặc "enticing salary" để thể hiện ý tưởng muốn diễn đạt mà không sử dụng từ giống nhau nhiều lần.

2. "contentment" - Bạn đã sử dụng từ này một lần trong bài viết và không có lỗi về ngữ pháp hoặc ngữ cảnh. Tuy nhiên, để làm cho từ vựng của bạn đa dạng hơn, bạn có thể sử dụng các từ như "satisfaction" hoặc "fulfillment" thay thế.

3. "enjoyment" - Từ này được sử dụng một lần trong bài viết và không có lỗi sai về từ vựng hoặc ngữ cảnh.

4. "stacks of cash" - Cụm từ này có ý nghĩa tương tự với "a lot of money" hoặc "piles of money". Bạn có thể thay thế để làm cho từ vựng của bạn đa dạng hơn.

5. "passion" - Bạn đã sử dụng từ này một lần trong bài viết và không có lỗi sai về từ vựng hoặc ngữ cảnh.

6. "dignity" - Từ này được sử dụng một lần trong bài viết và không có lỗi sai về từ vựng hoặc ngữ cảnh.

7. "motivation and drive" - Cụm từ này có ý nghĩa tương tự với "ambition" hoặc "determination". Bạn có thể sử dụng các từ này để khắc phục sự lặp lại trong bài viết.

Overall, bài viết của bạn đã sử dụng từ vựng phù hợp và đa dạng một cách chính xác. Có một số lựa chọn từ và cụm từ mà bạn có thể thay đổi để tăng tính đa dạng và tránh lặp lại.
 END

prompt:
Topic:
"In many countries students are engaged in some sort of paid work . Some people regard this as completely wrong, while others consider it as valuable work experience, important for learning and taking responsibilities. What is your opinion?"
Essay:
"The task at hand is asking you to give an opinion on the question if students should part-take in paid work. Working for money is the wrong approach in some people's eyes, whereas it's crucial for learning and taking responsibility for others. Personally, I strongly agree with the latter and think it is very valuable. It gives you a better understanding of the reality in the workplace, as well as helping you to immediately apply theoretical concepts in practice and learn from the experience.

Firstly, working while studying gives you great insight that you cannot always deliver work of perfect quality and that you sometimes have to take shortcuts. I've also seen this at my workplace a lot of times. There were strict deadlines set up and we had to descope work in order to hit the delivery date. Coming back to the question, this is important learning and teaches you about taking responsibility.

In addition, it fosters you to apply theoretical concepts learned in university to real-life work situations. This case happens a lot to me, since I am working three days a week next to my studies.

Usually, I am able to use programming design patterns, which I practised in school, in a much larger codebase at work. Connecting to the question, doing paid work helps me to increase my understanding of concepts and pushes me to learn more.

To conclude, my opinion on the topic is that I value getting paid for work very much. This is mostly due to the reason that it helps me to understand the work-life better and it allows me to immediately try out the concepts learned in school, which further strengthens my understanding."

###
completion:
Trong bài viết của bạn, có một số từ và cụm từ dùng không chính xác hoặc không phù hợp với ngữ cảnh. Dưới đây là một số ví dụ và giải thích:

- Sửa: "participate in paid work"
